[Jane]101-jane met [the doctor]940-the doctor 's eyes and smiled reassuringly ; then turned without any hesitation and did as [Flower]144-flower asked . The prescription had already done [her]144-flower good .

At the last words of the song [[the doctor]940-the doctor 's wife]1008-the doctor 's wife bent over and laid a tender little kiss just above [his]940-the doctor temple , where the thick dark hair was streaked with silver . But [the doctor]940-the doctor 's mind was intent on [Jane]101-jane , and before the final chords were struck [he]940-the doctor knew [he]940-the doctor had diagnosed [her]101-jane case correctly . " But [she]101-jane had better go abroad , "[940-the doctor] [he]940-the doctor thought . " It will take [her]101-jane mind off [herself]101-jane altogether , giving [her]101-jane a larger view of things in general , and a better proportioned view of things in particular . And [the boy]2764-the boy wo n't change ; or , if [he]2764-the boy does , [Jane]101-jane will be proved right , to [her]101-jane own satisfaction . But , if this is [HER]101-jane side , good heavens , what must [HIS]2764-the boy be ! [I]107-deryck had wondered what was sapping all [his]2764-the boy buoyant youthfulness . To care for [Jane]101-jane would be an education ; but to have made [Jane]101-jane care ! And then to have lost [her]101-jane ! [He]2764-the boy must have nerves of steel , to be facing life at all . What is this cross [they]2765-they are both learning to kiss , and holding up between [them]2765-they ? Perhaps [Niagara]33-niagara will sweep it away , and [she]101-jane will cable [him]2764-the boy from there . "[107-deryck]

Then [the doctor]940-the doctor took the dear little hand resting on [his]940-the doctor shoulder and kissed it softly , while [Jane]101-jane 's back was still turned . For [the doctor]940-the doctor had had past experience of the cross , and now the pearls were very precious .

So [Jane]101-jane took the prescription , and two years went by in the taking ; and here [she]101-jane was , on [the top of [the Great Pyramid]2742-the great pyramid]1019-the top of the great pyramid , and , moreover , [she]101-jane had done it in record time , and laughed as [she]101-jane thought of how [she]101-jane should report the fact to [Deryck]107-deryck .

[[Her]101-jane Arabs]1021-her arabs lay around , very hot and shiny , and content . Large backsheesh was assured , and [they]1021-her arabs looked up at [her]101-jane with pleased possessive eyes , as an achievement of [their]1021-her arabs own ; hardly realising how large a part [her]101-jane finely developed athletic powers and elastic limbs had played in the speed of the ascent .

And [Jane]101-jane stood there , sound in wind and limb , and with the exhilarating sense , always helpful to the mind , of a bodily feat accomplished .

[She]101-jane was looking [her]101-jane best in [her]101-jane Norfolk coat and skirt of brown tweed with hints of green and orange in it , plenty of useful pockets piped with leather , leather buttons , and a broad band of leather round the bottom of the skirt . [A connoisseur]1022-a connoisseur would have named at once the one and only firm from which that costume could have come , and [the hatter who supplied the soft green Tyrolian hat for [Jane]101-jane]1023-the hatter who supplied the soft green tyrolian hat for jane scorned pith helmets which matched it so admirably . But [Schehati]196-schehati was [no connoisseur of clothing]1024-no connoisseur of clothing , though [a pretty shrewd judge of ways and manners]1025-a pretty shrewd judge of ways and manners , and [he]107-deryck summed up [Jane]101-jane thus : " [Nice gentleman - lady]2766-nice gentleman - lady ! Give [good backsheesh]2767-good backsheesh , and not sit down halfway and say : ` No top ' ! But [real lady]2768-real lady - [gentleman]2769-gentleman ! Give backsheesh with kind face , and not send poor [Arab]211-arab to [Assouan]42-assouan . "[196-schehati]

[Jane]101-jane was deeply tanned by the Eastern sun . Burning a splendid brown , and enjoying the process , [she]101-jane had no need of veils or parasols ; and [her]101-jane strong eyes faced the golden light of [the desert]1026-the desert without the aid of smoked glasses . [She]101-jane had once heard [Garth]111-garth remark that a sight which made [him]111-garth feel really ill , was the back view of [a woman in a motor - veil]1027-a woman in a motor - veil , and [Jane]101-jane had laughingly agreed , for to [her]101-jane veils of any kind had always seemed superfluous . The heavy coils of [her]101-jane brown hair never blew about into fascinating little curls and wisps , but remained where , with a few well - directed hairpins , [she]101-jane each morning solidly placed them .

[Jane]101-jane had never looked better than [she]101-jane did on this March day , standing on [the summit of [the Great Pyramid]27-the great pyramid]941-the summit of the great pyramid . Strong , brown , and well - knit , a reliable mind in a capable body , the undeniable plainness of [her]101-jane face redeemed by its kindly expression of interest and enjoyment ; [her]101-jane wide , pleasant smile revealing [her]101-jane fine white teeth , witnesses to [her]101-jane perfect soundness and health , within and without .

" [Nice gentleman - lady]2766-nice gentleman - lady , "[101-jane] murmured [Schehati]196-schehati again : and had [Jane]101-jane overheard the remark it would not have offended [her]101-jane ; for , though [she]101-jane held [a masculine woman]1029-a masculine woman only one degree less in abhorrence than [an effeminate man]1030-an effeminate man , [she]101-jane would have taken [Schehati]196-schehati 's compound noun as a tribute to the fact that [she]101-jane was well - groomed and independent , knowing [her]101-jane own mind , and , when [she]101-jane started out to go to a place , reaching [it]1031-it in the shortest possible time , without fidget , fuss , or flurry . These three feminine attributes were held in scorn by [Jane]101-jane , who knew [herself]101-jane so deeply womanly that [she]101-jane could afford in minor ways to be frankly unfeminine .

[The doctor]940-the doctor 's prescription had worked admirably . That look of falling to pieces and ageing prematurely a general dilapidation of mind and body which it had grieved and startled [him]940-the doctor to see in [Jane]101-jane as [she]101-jane sat before [him]940-the doctor on the music - stool , was gone completely . [She]101-jane looked [a calm , pleasant thirty ; ready to go happily on , year by year , towards an equally agreeable and delightful forty]1033-a calm , pleasant thirty ; ready to go happily on , year by year , towards an equally agreeable and delightful forty ; and not afraid of fifty , when that time should come . [Her]101-jane clear eyes looked frankly out upon [the world]2266-the world , and [her]101-jane sane mind formed sound opinions and pronounced fair judgments , tempered by the kindliness of an unusually large and generous heart .

Just now [she]101-jane was considering the view and finding it very good . Its strong contrasts held [her]101-jane .

On one side lay [the fertile Delta]1035-the fertile delta , with [its]1035-the fertile delta groves of waving palm , orange , and olive trees , growing in rich profusion on [the banks of [the Nile]43-the nile]1036-the banks of the nile , a broad band of gleaming silver . On the other , [the Desert]44-the desert , with [its]44-the desert far - distant horizon , stretching away in undulations of golden sand ; not a tree , not a leaf , not a blade of grass , but boundless liberty , [an ocean of solid golden glory]1037-an ocean of solid golden glory . For the sun was setting , and the sky flamed into colour .

" A parting of the ways , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane ; " [a place of choice]2771-a place of choice . How difficult to know which to choose liberty or fruitfulness . [One]474-one would have to consult [the Sphinx wise old guardian of the ages , [silent keeper of Time]2774-silent keeper of time 's secrets , gazing on into the future as It has always gazed , while future became present , and present glided into past]2773-the sphinx wise old guardian of the ages , silent keeper of time 's secrets , gazing on into the future as it has always gazed , while future became present , and present glided into past . Come , [Schehati]196-schehati , let [us]2775-us descend . Oh , yes , [I]111-garth will certainly sit upon the stone on which [the King]2552-the king sat when [he]2552-the king was [Prince of [Wales]45-wales]2777-prince of wales . Thank [you]196-schehati for mentioning it . It will supply a delightful topic of conversation next time [I]111-garth am honoured by a few minutes of [[his]2552-the king gracious Majesty]2778-his gracious majesty 's attention , and will save [me]111-garth from floundering into trite remarks about the weather . And now take [me]111-garth to [the Sphinx]212-the sphinx , [Schehati]196-schehati . There is a question [I]111-garth would ask of [It]212-the sphinx , just as the sun dips below the horizon . "[111-garth]

CHAPTER XIII

THE ANSWER OF [THE SPHINX]212-the sphinx

Moonlight in [the desert]1026-the desert .

[Jane]101-jane ordered [her]101-jane after - dinner coffee on [the piazza of [the hotel]1040-the hotel]1039-the piazza of the hotel , that [she]101-jane might lose as little as possible of the mystic loveliness of the night . [The pyramids]2759-the pyramids appeared so huge and solid , in the clear white light ; and [the Sphinx]212-the sphinx gathered unto itself more mystery .

[Jane]101-jane promised [herself]101-jane a stroll round by moonlight presently . Meanwhile [she]101-jane lay back in a low wicker chair , comfortably upholstered , sipping [her]101-jane coffee , and giving [herself]101-jane up to the sense of dreamy content which , in a healthy body , is apt to follow vigorous exertion .

Very tender and quiet thoughts of [Garth]111-garth came to [her]101-jane this evening , perhaps brought about by the associations of moonlight .

" The moon shines bright : in such a night as this , When the sweet wind did gently kiss the trees , And [they]1043-they did make no noise "[111-garth] Ah ! [the great poet]1042-the great poet knew the effect upon the heart of a vivid reminder to the senses . [Jane]101-jane now passed beneath the spell .

To begin with , [Garth]111-garth 's voice seemed singing everywhere :

" Enable with perpetual light The dulness of [our]2779-our blinded sight . "[101-jane] Then from out the deep blue and silvery light , [Garth]111-garth 's dear adoring eyes seemed watching [her]101-jane . [Jane]101-jane closed [her]101-jane own , to see them better . To - night [she]101-jane did not feel like shrinking from [them]1043-they , they were so full of love .

No shade of critical regard was in them . Ah ! had [she]101-jane wronged [him]111-garth with [her]101-jane fears for the future ? [Her]101-jane heart seemed full of trust to - night , full of confidence in [him]111-garth and in [herself]101-jane . It seemed to [her]101-jane that if [he]111-garth were [here]2151-here [she]101-jane could go out with [him]111-garth into this brilliant moonlight , seat [herself]101-jane upon some ancient fallen stone , and let [him]111-garth kneel in front of [her]101-jane and gaze and gaze in [his]111-garth persistent way , as much as [he]111-garth pleased . In thought there seemed to - night no shrinking from those dear eyes . [She]101-jane felt [she]101-jane would say : " It is all [your]111-garth own , [Garth]111-garth , to look at when [you]111-garth will . For [your]111-garth sake , [I]101-jane could wish it beautiful ; but if it is as [you]111-garth like it , [[my]101-jane own Dear]2780-my own dear , why should [I]101-jane hide it from [you]111-garth ? "[101-jane]

What had brought about this change of mind ? Had [Deryck]107-deryck 's prescription done its full work ? Was this a saner point of view than the one [she]101-jane had felt constrained to take when [she]101-jane arrived , through so much agony of renunciation , at [her]101-jane decision ? Instead of going up [the Nile]43-the nile , and then to [Constantinople]47-constantinople and [Athens]48-athens , should [she]101-jane take [the steamer which sailed]1045-the steamer which sailed from [Alexandria]49-alexandria to - morrow , be in [London]6-london a week hence , send for [Garth]111-garth , make full confession , and let [him]111-garth decide as to [their]1046-their future ?

That [he]111-garth loved [her]101-jane still , it never occurred to [Jane]101-jane to doubt . At the very thought of sending for [him]111-garth and telling [him]111-garth the simple truth , [he]111-garth seemed so near [her]101-jane once more , that [she]101-jane could feel the clasp of [his]111-garth arms , and [his]111-garth head upon [her]101-jane heart . And those dear shining eyes ! Oh , [Garth]111-garth , [Garth]111-garth !

" One thing is clear to [me]101-jane to - night , "[101-jane] thought [Jane]101-jane . " If [he]111-garth still needs [me]101-jane wants [me]101-jane [I]101-jane can not live any longer away from [him]111-garth . [I]101-jane must go to [him]111-garth . "[101-jane] [She]101-jane opened [her]101-jane eyes and looked towards [the Sphinx]212-the sphinx . Then [she]101-jane closed [her]101-jane eyes again and clasped [her]101-jane hands upon [her]101-jane bosom .

" [I]1059-the chaperon of the party will risk it , "[1059-the chaperon of the party] [she]101-jane said ; and deep joy awoke within [her]101-jane heart .

[A party of English people]1047-a party of english people came from [the dining - room]1048-the dining - room on to [the piazza]1049-the piazza with a clatter . [Jane]101-jane would have done the same , but [she]101-jane really felt too comfortable to move , and afraid of losing the sweet sense of [Garth]111-garth 's nearness . So [she]101-jane remained where [she]101-jane was .

[The elderly man]1057-the elderly man held in [his]1057-the elderly man hand a letter and a copy of the MORNING POST , just received from [England]28-england . [Jane]101-jane smiled a fierce smile into the moonlight . Passionate love of animal life , intense regard for all life , even of the tiniest insect , was as much a religion with [her]101-jane as the worship of beauty was with [Garth]111-garth . [She]101-jane never could pretend sorrow over these accounts of shooting accidents , or falls in [the hunting - field]1064-the hunting - field . [She]101-jane felt no regret , and pretended none . So now [she]101-jane smiled fiercely to [herself]101-jane , thinking : " One pair of eyes the less to look along a gun and frustrate the despairing dash for [home]381-home and little ones of a terrified little mother rabbit . "[1067-the military - looking man]

" No , "[1071-the owner of the letter] replied [the owner of the letter]1071-the owner of the letter , " and that seems such hard luck . [He]1067-the military - looking man had given up shooting altogether a year or two ago . [He]1067-the military - looking man never really enjoyed it , because [he]1067-the military - looking man so loved the beauty of life and hated death in every form . [He]1067-the military - looking man has [a lovely place in [the North]2787-the north]2786-a lovely place in the north , and was up there painting . [One of [the lads]2789-the lads]2788-one of the lads , apparently startled , let off [his]2788-one of the lads gun . The charge struck a tree a few yards off , and the shot glanced . CHAPTER XIV

IN [DERYCK]107-deryck 'S SAFE CONTROL

[The white cliffs of [Dover]53-dover]1087-the white cliffs of dover gradually became more solid and distinct , until at length [they]1087-the white cliffs of dover rose from [the sea]1088-the sea , a strong white wall , emblem of the undeniable purity of [England]28-england , the stainless honour and integrity of [her]101-jane throne , [[her]101-jane church]1089-her church , [[her]101-jane parliament]1090-her parliament , [[her]101-jane courts of justice]1091-her courts of justice , and [her]101-jane dealings at [home]381-home and abroad , whether with [friend]871-friend or [foe]1094-foe . " Strength and whiteness , "[101-jane] thought [Jane]101-jane as [she]101-jane paced [[the steamer]1095-the steamer 's deck]1096-the steamer 's deck ; and after a two years ' absence [her]101-jane heart went out to [[her]101-jane native land]1097-her native land . Then [Dover Castle]54-dover castle caught [her]101-jane eye , so beautiful in the pearly light of that spring afternoon . [Her]101-jane mind leaped to enjoyment , then fell back stunned by the blow of quick remembrance , and [Jane]101-jane shut [her]101-jane eyes .

All beautiful sights brought this pang to [her]101-jane heart since the reading of that paragraph on [the piazza of [the Mena House Hotel]1099-the mena house hotel]1098-the piazza of the mena house hotel .

An hour after [she]101-jane had read it , [she]101-jane was driving down [the long straight road]1100-the long straight road to [Cairo]39-cairo ; embarked at [Alexandria]49-alexandria the next day ; landed at [Brindisi]55-brindisi , and this night and day travelling had brought [her]101-jane at last within sight of [the shores of [England]28-england]1101-the shores of england . In a few minutes [she]101-jane would set foot upon [them]1101-the shores of england , and then there would be but two more stages to [her]101-jane journey . For , from the moment [she]101-jane started , [Jane]101-jane never doubted [her]101-jane ultimate destination , [the room where pain and darkness and despair]1102-the room where pain and darkness and despair must be waging so terrible a conflict against the moral courage , the mental sanity , and the instinctive hold on life of [the man [she]101-jane loved]1103-the man she loved .

That [she]101-jane was going to [him]1103-the man she loved , [Jane]101-jane knew ; but [she]101-jane felt utterly unable to arrange how or in what way [her]101-jane going could be managed . That it was a complicated problem , [her]101-jane common sense told [her]101-jane ; though [her]101-jane yearning arms and aching bosom cried out : " O [God]145-god , is it not simple ? Blind and alone ! [MY]1108-the efficient porter Garth ! "[1108-the efficient porter]

But [she]101-jane knew an unbiased judgment , steadier than [her]101-jane own , must solve the problem ; and that [her]101-jane surest way to [Garth]111-garth lay through [[the doctor]940-the doctor 's consulting - room]1105-the doctor 's consulting - room . So [she]101-jane telegraphed to [Deryck]107-deryck from [Paris]7-paris , and at present [her]101-jane mind saw no further than [Wimpole Street]29-wimpole street .

At [Dover]53-dover [she]101-jane bought a paper , and hastily scanned its pages as [she]101-jane walked along [the platform]2165-the platform in the wake of [the capable porter who had taken possession of [her]101-jane rugs and hand baggage]1107-the capable porter who had taken possession of her rugs and hand baggage . In the personal column [she]101-jane found the very paragraph [she]101-jane sought .

" [We]2810-we regret to announce that [Mr. Garth Dalmain]111-garth still lies in a most precarious condition at [[his]111-garth house on [Deeside]56-deeside]2811-his house on deeside , [Aberdeenshire]57-aberdeenshire , as a result of the shooting accident a fortnight ago . [His]111-garth sight is hopelessly gone , but the injured parts were progressing favourably , and all fear of brain complications seemed over . During the last few days , however , a serious reaction from shock has set in , and it has been considered necessary to summon [Sir Deryck Brand]107-deryck , [the well - known nerve specialist]2812-the well - known nerve specialist , in consultation with [the oculist]2813-the oculist and [the local practitioner in charge of the case]2814-the local practitioner in charge of the case . There is a feeling of wide - spread regret and sympathy in those social and artistic circles where [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth was so well - known and so deservedly popular . "[1108-the efficient porter]

" Oh , thank [you]1108-the efficient porter , [m'lady]2815-m'lady , "[1108-the efficient porter] said [the efficient porter]1108-the efficient porter when [he]1108-the efficient porter had ascertained , by a rapid glance into [his]1108-the efficient porter palm , that [Jane]101-jane 's half - crown was not a penny . [He]1108-the efficient porter had [a sick young wife at [home]381-home]1109-a sick young wife at home , who had been ordered extra nourishment , and just as the rush on board began , [he]1108-the efficient porter had put up a simple prayer to [the Heavenly Father]1111-the heavenly father " who knoweth that [ye]2816-ye have need of these things , "[1108-the efficient porter] asking that [he]1108-the efficient porter might catch the eye of [a generous traveller]1112-a generous traveller . " Seven pence ' apenny of this stuff ai n't much for carrying all that along , [I]1117-a telegraph boy DON'T think ! "[1117-a telegraph boy] grumbled [[his]1108-the efficient porter mate]1115-his mate ; and [[Jane]101-jane 's young porter]1116-jane 's young porter experienced the double joy of faith confirmed , and willing service generously rewarded .

[A telegraph boy]1117-a telegraph boy walked along [the train]738-the train , saying : " Honrubble Jain Champyun "[101-jane] at intervals . [Jane]101-jane heard [her]1117-a telegraph boy name , and [her]101-jane arm shot out of the window .

" Here , [[my]940-the doctor boy]2679-my boy ! It is for [me]940-the doctor . "[940-the doctor]

" Welcome [home]381-home . Just back from [Scotland]58-scotland . Will meet [you]1116-jane 's young porter [Charing Cross]59-charing cross , and give [you]1116-jane 's young porter all the time [you]1116-jane 's young porter want . Have coffee at [Dover]53-dover . [DERYCK]107-deryck . "[101-jane]

[Jane]101-jane gave one hard , tearless sob of thankfulness and relief . [She]101-jane had been so lonely .

Then [she]101-jane turned to the window . " Here , [somebody]2054-somebody ! Fetch [me]101-jane a cup of coffee , will [you]2054-somebody ? "[101-jane]

Coffee was the last thing [she]101-jane wanted ; but it never occurred to [any one]411-any one to disobey [the doctor]940-the doctor , even at a distance .

[The young porter]1122-the young porter , who still stood sentry at the door of [[Jane]101-jane 's compartment]1123-jane 's compartment , dashed off to [the refreshment room]1124-the refreshment room ; and , just as [the train]738-the train began to move , handed a cup of steaming coffee and a plate of bread - and - butter in at the window .

" Oh , thank [you]2054-somebody , [[my]101-jane good fellow]2820-my good fellow , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane , putting the plate on the seat , while [she]101-jane dived into [her]101-jane pocket . " Here ! [you]2054-somebody have done very well for [me]1127-the porter . No , never mind the change . Coffee at a moment 's notice should fetch a fancy price . Good - bye . "[1127-the porter]

[The train]738-the train moved on , and [the porter]1127-the porter stood looking after it with tears in [his]1127-the porter eyes . "[1127-the porter] Now , as [he]1127-the porter pocketed the second , [he]1127-the porter added the other two things mentioned by [the parish doctor]1128-the parish doctor : " Soup and jelly "[1127-the porter] ; and [his]1127-the porter heart glowed . " [[Your]101-jane heavenly Father]2821-your heavenly father knoweth that [ye]101-jane have need of these things . "[101-jane]

And [Jane]101-jane , seated in a comfortable corner , choked back the tears of relief which threatened to fall , drank [her]101-jane coffee , and was thereby more revived than [she]101-jane could have thought possible . [She]101-jane , also , had need of many things . Not of [half - crowns]1129-half - crowns ; of those [she]101-jane had plenty . But above all else [she]101-jane needed just now [a wise , strong , helpful friend]1130-a wise , strong , helpful friend , and [Deryck]107-deryck had not failed [her]101-jane .

[She]101-jane read [his]107-deryck telegram through once more , and smiled . How like [him]107-deryck to think of the coffee ; and oh , how like [him]107-deryck to be coming to [the station]746-the station .

[She]101-jane took off [her]101-jane hat and leaned back against the cushions . [She]101-jane had been travelling night and day , in one feverish whirl of haste , and at last [she]101-jane had brought [herself]101-jane within reach of [Deryck]107-deryck 's hand and [Deryck]107-deryck 's safe control . The turmoil of [her]101-jane soul was stilled ; a great calm took its place , and [Jane]101-jane dropped quietly off to sleep . " [[Your]101-jane heavenly Father]2821-your heavenly father knoweth that [ye]101-jane have need of these things . "[1137-an enthusiastic lady patient]

Washed and brushed and greatly refreshed , [Jane]101-jane stood at the window of [[her]101-jane compartment]1132-her compartment as [the train]738-the train steamed into [Charing Cross]59-charing cross .

[The doctor]940-the doctor was stationed exactly opposite the door when [[her]101-jane carriage]1135-her carriage came to a standstill ; mere chance , and yet , to [Jane]101-jane , it seemed so like [him]940-the doctor to have taken up [his]940-the doctor position precisely at the right spot on [that long platform]1136-that long platform . [An enthusiastic lady patient]1137-an enthusiastic lady patient had once said of [Deryck Brand]107-deryck , with more accuracy of definition than of grammar : " [You]101-jane know , [he]940-the doctor is always so very JUST THERE . "[107-deryck] And this characteristic of [the doctor]940-the doctor had made [him]940-the doctor to [many a very present help]1139-many a very present help in time of trouble .

[He]940-the doctor was through [the line of [porters]1141-porters]1140-the line of porters and had [his]940-the doctor hand upon the handle of [Jane]101-jane 's door in a moment . Standing at the window , [she]101-jane took one look at the firm lean face , now alight with welcome , and read in the kind , steadfast eyes of [[her]101-jane childhood 's friend]1142-her childhood 's friend a perfect sympathy and comprehension . Then [she]101-jane saw behind [him]940-the doctor [[[her]101-jane aunt]543-her aunt 's footman]1144-her aunt 's footman , and [[her]101-jane own maid , who had been given a place in [[the duchess]304-the duchess 's household]1147-the duchess 's household]1145-her own maid , who had been given a place in the duchess 's household . In another moment [she]101-jane was on [the platform]2165-the platform and [her]101-jane hand was in [Deryck]107-deryck 's .

" That is right , [dear]2179-dear , "[107-deryck] [he]107-deryck said . " All fit and well , [I]940-the doctor can see . Now hand over [your]2179-dear keys . [I]940-the doctor suppose [you]2179-dear have nothing contraband ? [I]940-the doctor telephoned [the duchess]304-the duchess to send [some of [[her]304-the duchess people]2366-her people]2825-some of her people to meet [your]2179-dear luggage , and not to expect [you]2179-dear [herself]304-the duchess until dinner time , as [you]2179-dear were taking tea with [us]2827-us . Was that right ? This way . Come outside the barrier . What [a rabble]2828-a rabble ! All wanting to break every possible rule and regulation , and each trying to be [the first person in the front row]2829-the first person in the front row . Really the patience and good temper of [railway officials]2830-railway officials should teach [the rest of mankind]2831-the rest of mankind a lesson . "[940-the doctor]

[The doctor]940-the doctor , talking all the time , piloted [Jane]101-jane through [the crowd]1150-the crowd ; opened the door of [a neat electric brougham]1151-a neat electric brougham , helped [her]101-jane in , took [his]940-the doctor seat beside [her]101-jane , and [they]1152-they glided swiftly out into [the Strand]60-the strand , and turned towards [Trafalgar Square]61-trafalgar square .

" Well , "[940-the doctor] said [the doctor]940-the doctor , " [Niagara]33-niagara is a big thing is n't it ? When [people]533-people say to [me]940-the doctor , ' Were [you]2179-dear not disappointed in [Niagara]33-niagara ? [WE]1152-they were ! ' [I]940-the doctor feel tempted to wish , for one homicidal moment , that [the earth]2833-the earth would open [her]2833-the earth mouth and swallow [them]533-people up . [People who can be disappointed in Niagara , and talk about it]2834-people who can be disappointed in niagara , and talk about it , should no longer be allowed to crawl on the face of [the earth]2833-the earth . And how about the ' Little Mother ' ? Is n't [she]2833-the earth worth knowing ? [I]940-the doctor hope [she]2833-the earth sent [me]940-the doctor [her]2833-the earth love . And [New York harbour]62-new york harbour ! Did [you]2179-dear ever see anything to equal it , as [you]2179-dear steam away in the sunset ? "[940-the doctor]

[Jane]101-jane gave a sudden sob ; then turned to [him]1154-he , dry - eyed .

" Is there no hope , [Deryck]107-deryck ? "[940-the doctor]

[The doctor]940-the doctor laid [his]940-the doctor hand on [hers]101-jane . " [He]1154-he will always be blind , [dear]2179-dear . But life holds other things beside sight . [We]2837-we must never say : ' No hope . ' "[940-the doctor]

" Will [he]1154-he live ? "[940-the doctor]

" There is no reason [he]1154-he should not live . But how far life will be worth living , largely depends upon what can be done for [him]1154-he , [poor chap]2792-poor chap , during the next few months . [He]1154-he is more shattered mentally than physically . "[101-jane]

[Jane]101-jane pulled off [her]101-jane gloves , swallowed suddenly , then gripped [the doctor]940-the doctor 's knee . " [Deryck]107-deryck [I]940-the doctor love [him]1154-he . "[940-the doctor]

[The doctor]940-the doctor remained silent for a few moments , as if pondering this tremendous fact . Then [he]940-the doctor lifted the fine , capable hand resting upon [his]940-the doctor knee and kissed it with a beautiful reverence , a gesture expressing the homage of [the man]1158-the man to the brave truthfulness of [the woman]400-the woman .

" In that case , [dear]2179-dear , "[940-the doctor] [he]940-the doctor said , " the future holds in store so great a good for [Garth Dalmain]111-garth that [I]940-the doctor think [he]1154-he may dispense with sight . Meanwhile [you]2179-dear have much to say to [me]940-the doctor , and it is , of course , [your]2179-dear right to hear every detail of [his]1154-he case that [I]940-the doctor can give . And here [we]2840-we are at [Wimpole Street]29-wimpole street . Now come into [[my]940-the doctor consulting - room]2747-my consulting - room . [Stoddart]208-stoddart has orders that [we]2840-we are on no account to be disturbed . "[940-the doctor]

CHAPTER XV

[THE CONSULTATION]1160-the consultation

[[The doctor]940-the doctor 's room]1162-the doctor 's room was very quiet . [Jane]101-jane leaned back in [his]940-the doctor dark green leather arm - chair , [her]101-jane feet on a footstool , [her]101-jane hands gripping the arms on either side .

[The doctor]940-the doctor sat at [his]940-the doctor table , in the round pivot - chair [he]940-the doctor always used , a chair which enabled [him]940-the doctor to swing round suddenly and face [a patient]1164-a patient , or to turn away very quietly and bend over [his]940-the doctor table .

Just now [he]940-the doctor was not looking at [Jane]101-jane . [He]940-the doctor had been giving [her]101-jane a detailed account of [his]940-the doctor visit to [Castle Gleneesh]12-castle gleneesh , which [he]940-the doctor had left only on the previous evening . [He]940-the doctor had spent five hours with [Garth]111-garth . It seemed kindest to tell [her]101-jane all ; but [he]940-the doctor was looking straight before [him]940-the doctor as [he]940-the doctor talked , because [he]940-the doctor knew that at last the tears were running unchecked down [Jane]101-jane 's cheeks , and [he]940-the doctor wished [her]101-jane to think [he]940-the doctor did not notice them .

" [You]101-jane understand , [dear]2179-dear , "[940-the doctor] [he]940-the doctor was saying , " the actual wounds are going on well . Strangely enough , though the retina of each eye was pierced , and the sight is irrecoverably gone , there was very little damage done to surrounding parts , and the brain is quite uninjured . The present danger arises from the shock to the nervous system and from the extreme mental anguish caused by the realisation of [his]940-the doctor loss . The physical suffering during the first days and nights must have been terrible . [Poor fellow]2781-poor fellow , [he]940-the doctor looks shattered by it . But [his]940-the doctor constitution is excellent , and [his]940-the doctor life has been so clean , healthy , and normal , that [he]940-the doctor had every chance of making a good recovery , were it not that as the pain abated and [his]940-the doctor blindness became more a thing to be daily and hourly realised , [his]940-the doctor mental torture was so excessive . Sight has meant so infinitely much to [him]940-the doctor , beauty of form , beauty of colour . [The artist in [him]940-the doctor]2844-the artist in him was so all - pervading . [They]2845-they tell [me]940-the doctor [he]940-the doctor said very little . [He]940-the doctor is [a brave man]2846-a brave man and [a strong one]2847-a strong one . But [his]940-the doctor temperature began to vary alarmingly ; [he]940-the doctor showed symptoms of mental trouble , of which [I]940-the doctor need not give [you]2848-you technical details ; and [a nerve specialist]2849-a nerve specialist seemed more necessary than [an oculist]2850-an oculist . Therefore [he]940-the doctor is now in [my]940-the doctor hands . "[940-the doctor]

[The doctor]940-the doctor paused , straightened a few books lying on the table , and drew a small bowl of violets closer to [him]940-the doctor . [He]940-the doctor studied these attentively for a few moments , then put them back where [[his]940-the doctor wife]1166-his wife had placed them and went on speaking .

" [I]940-the doctor am satisfied on the whole . [He]940-the doctor needed a friendly voice to penetrate the darkness . [He]940-the doctor needed a hand to grasp [his]940-the doctor , in faithful comprehension . [He]940-the doctor did not want pity , and those who talked of [his]940-the doctor loss without understanding it , or being able to measure its immensity , maddened [him]940-the doctor . [He]940-the doctor needed [a fellow - man]2851-a fellow - man to come to [him]940-the doctor and say : ' It is a fight an awful , desperate fight . But by [God]145-god 's grace [you]940-the doctor will win through to victory . It would be far easier to die ; but to die would be to lose ; [you]940-the doctor must live to win . It is utterly beyond all human strength ; but by [God]145-god 's grace [you]940-the doctor will come through conqueror . ' All this [I]940-the doctor said to [him]940-the doctor , [Jeanette]205-jeanette , and a good deal more ; and then a strangely beautiful thing happened . [I]940-the doctor can tell [you]940-the doctor , and of course [I]940-the doctor could tell [Flower]144-flower , but to [no one else on earth]2852-no one else on earth would [I]940-the doctor repeat it . The difficulty had been to obtain from [him]940-the doctor any response whatever . [He]940-the doctor did not seem able to rouse sufficiently to notice anything going on around [him]940-the doctor . But those words , ' by [God]145-god 's grace , ' appeared to take hold of [him]940-the doctor and find immediate echo in [his]940-the doctor inner consciousness . [I]940-the doctor heard [him]940-the doctor repeat them once or twice , and then change them to ' with the abundance of [Thy]145-god grace . ' Then [he]940-the doctor turned [his]940-the doctor head slowly on the pillow , and what [one]474-one could see of [his]940-the doctor face seemed transformed . [He]940-the doctor said : ' Now [I]940-the doctor remember it , and the music is this ' ; and [his]940-the doctor hands moved on the bedclothes , as if forming chords . Then , in a very low voice , but quite clearly , [he]940-the doctor repeated the second verse of the VENI , [CREATOR SPIRITUS]215-creator spiritus . [I]940-the doctor knew it , because [I]940-the doctor used to sing it as a chorister in [[[my]940-the doctor father]2854-my father 's church at [home]381-home]2855-my father 's church at home . [You]940-the doctor remember ? "[940-the doctor]

" ' Enable with perpetual light The dulness of [our]2857-our blinded sight . Anoint and cheer [our]2857-our soiled face With the abundance of [Thy]2858-thy grace . Keep far [[our]2857-our foes]2675-our foes ; give peace at [home]381-home ; Where [Thou]2858-thy art [Guide]190-guide , no ill can come . ' "[940-the doctor] " It was the most touching thing [I]940-the doctor ever heard . "[940-the doctor]

[The doctor]940-the doctor paused , for [Jane]101-jane had buried [her]101-jane face in [her]101-jane hands and was sobbing convulsively . When [her]101-jane sobs grew less violent , [the doctor]940-the doctor 's quiet voice continued : " [You]940-the doctor see , this gave [me]101-jane something to go upon . When a crash such as this happens , all [a man]575-a man has left to hold on to is [his]575-a man religion . According as [his]575-a man spiritual side has been developed , will [his]575-a man physical side stand the strain . [Dalmain]111-garth has more of the real thing than [any one]411-any one would think who only knew [him]111-garth superficially . Well , after that [we]2863-we talked quite definitely , and [I]101-jane persuaded [him]111-garth to agree to one or two important arrangements . [You]940-the doctor know , [he]111-garth has [no relations of [his]111-garth own]2864-no relations of his own , to speak of ; [just a few cousins , who have never been very friendly]2865-just a few cousins , who have never been very friendly . [He]111-garth is quite alone up there ; for , though [he]111-garth has hosts of [friends]2139-friends , this is a time when [friends]2139-friends would have to be very intimate to be admitted ; and though [he]111-garth seemed so boyish and easy to know , [I]101-jane begin to doubt whether [any of [us]2863-we]2868-any of us knew the real Garth the soul of [the man]1158-the man , deep down beneath the surface . "[101-jane]

[Jane]101-jane lifted [her]101-jane head . " [I]940-the doctor did , "[940-the doctor] [she]101-jane said simply .

" Ah , "[940-the doctor] said [the doctor]940-the doctor , " [I]940-the doctor see . Well , as [I]940-the doctor said , [ordinary friends]2870-ordinary friends could not be admitted . [Lady Ingleby]112-lady ingleby went , in [her]112-lady ingleby sweet impulsive way , without letting [them]2870-ordinary friends know [she]112-lady ingleby was coming ; travelled all the way up from [Shenstone]16-shenstone with [no maid]2871-no maid , and nothing but a handbag , and arrived at the door in a fly . [Robert Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie , [the local medical man]2872-the local medical man , who is [an inveterate misogynist]2873-an inveterate misogynist , feared at first [she]112-lady ingleby was [an unsuspected wife of [Dal 's]116-dal]2874-an unsuspected wife of dal 's . [I]940-the doctor gather [they]2870-ordinary friends had a somewhat funny scene . But [Lady Ingleby]112-lady ingleby soon got round [old Robbie]217-dr. rob , and came near to charming [him]217-dr. rob as whom does [she]112-lady ingleby not ? But of course [they]2870-ordinary friends did not dare let [her]112-lady ingleby into [[Dal]116-dal 's room]2877-dal 's room ; so [her]112-lady ingleby ministry of consolation appears to have consisted in letting [[Dal]116-dal 's old housekeeper]2878-dal 's old housekeeper weep on [her]112-lady ingleby beautiful shoulder . It was somewhat of a comedy , hearing about it , when [one]474-one happened to know [them]2870-ordinary friends all , better than [they]2870-ordinary friends knew [each other]573-each other . But to return to practical details . [He]116-dal has had [a fully trained male nurse]2881-a fully trained male nurse and [[his]116-dal own valet]2882-his own valet to wait on [him]116-dal . [He]116-dal absolutely refused [one of [[our]2884-our London hospital nurses]2885-our london hospital nurses , who might have brought a little gentle comfort and womanly sympathy to [[his]116-dal sick - room]2886-his sick - room]2883-one of our london hospital nurses , who might have brought a little gentle comfort and womanly sympathy to his sick - room . [He]116-dal said [he]116-dal could not stand being touched by [a woman]403-a woman ; so there it remained . [A competent man]2888-a competent man was found instead . But [we]2884-our can now dispense with [him]116-dal , and [I]940-the doctor have insisted upon sending up [a lady nurse]2889-a lady nurse of [my]940-the doctor own choosing ; not so much to wait on [him]116-dal , or do any of [a sick - nurse]2890-a sick - nurse 's ordinary duties [[his]116-dal own man]2891-his own man can do these , and [he]116-dal seems [a capable fellow]2892-a capable fellow but to sit with [him]116-dal , read to [him]116-dal , attend to [his]116-dal correspondence , there are piles of unopened letters [he]116-dal ought to hear , in fact help [him]116-dal to take up life again in [his]116-dal blindness . It will need training ; it will require tact ; and this afternoon [I]940-the doctor engaged exactly [the right person]2893-the right person . [She]2893-the right person is [a gentlewoman]2894-a gentlewoman by birth , has nursed for [me]940-the doctor before , and is well up in the special knowledge of mental things which this case requires . Also [she]2893-the right person is [a pretty , dainty little thing]2895-a pretty , dainty little thing ; just [the kind of elegant young woman poor [Dal]116-dal would have liked to have about [him]116-dal when [he]116-dal could see]2896-the kind of elegant young woman poor dal would have liked to have about him when he could see . [He]116-dal was such [a fastidious chap about appearances]2897-a fastidious chap about appearances , and such [a connoisseur of good looks]2898-a connoisseur of good looks . [I]940-the doctor have written a descriptive account of [her]2893-the right person to [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie , and [he]216-dr. mackenzie will prepare [[his]216-dr. mackenzie patient]2899-his patient for [her]2893-the right person arrival . [She]2893-the right person is to go up the day after to - morrow . [We]2900-we are lucky to get [her]2893-the right person , for [she]2893-the right person is quite first - rate , and [she]2893-the right person has only just finished with a long consumptive case , now on the mend and ordered abroad . So [you]2901-you see , [Jeanette]205-jeanette , all is shaping well . And now , [[my]940-the doctor dear girl]2718-my dear girl , [you]2901-you have a story of [your]2901-you own to tell [me]940-the doctor , and [my]940-the doctor whole attention shall be at [your]2901-you disposal . But first of all [I]940-the doctor am going to ring for tea , and [you]2901-you and [I]940-the doctor will have it quietly down here , if [you]2901-you will excuse [me]940-the doctor for a few minutes while [I]940-the doctor go [upstairs]2412-upstairs and speak to [Flower]144-flower . "[940-the doctor]

It seemed so natural to [Jane]101-jane to be pouring out [the doctor]940-the doctor 's tea , and to watch [him]940-the doctor putting a liberal allowance of salt on the thin bread - and - butter , and then folding it over with the careful accuracy which had always characterised [his]940-the doctor smallest action . In the essentials [he]940-the doctor had changed so little since the days when as a youth of twenty spending [his]940-the doctor vacations at [the rectory]1171-the rectory [he]940-the doctor used to give [the lonely girl at [the manor]418-the manor]1172-the lonely girl at the manor so much pleasure by coming up to [her]1172-the lonely girl at the manor school - room tea ; and when it proved possible to dispose of [[her]1172-the lonely girl at the manor governess]1174-her governess 's chaperonage and be by [themselves]1175-their , what delightful times [they]1175-their used to have , sitting on the hearth - rug , roasting chestnuts and discussing the many subjects which were of mutual interest . [Jane]101-jane could still remember the painful pleasure of turning hot chestnuts on the bars with [her]101-jane fingers , and how [she]101-jane hastened to do them [herself]101-jane , lest [he]940-the doctor should be burned . [She]101-jane had always secretly liked and admired [his]940-the doctor hands , with the brown thin fingers , so delicate in their touch and yet full of such gentle strength . [She]101-jane used to love watching [them]1176-them while [he]940-the doctor sharpened [her]101-jane pencils or drew wonderful diagrams in [her]101-jane exercise books ; thinking how in years to come , when [he]940-the doctor performed important operations , human lives would depend upon [their]1175-their skill and dexterity . In those early years [he]940-the doctor had seemed so much older than [she]101-jane . And then came the time when [she]101-jane shot up rapidly into young womanhood and [their]1175-their eyes were on a level and [their]1175-their ages seemed the same . Then , as the years went on , [Jane]101-jane began to feel older than [he]940-the doctor , and took to calling [him]940-the doctor " [Boy]218-boy "[101-jane] to emphasise this fact . And then came [Flower]144-flower ; and complications . And [Jane]101-jane had to see [his]940-the doctor face grow thin and worn , and [his]940-the doctor hair whiten on the temples . And [she]101-jane yearned over [him]940-the doctor , yet dared not offer sympathy . At last things came right for [the doctor]940-the doctor , and all the highest good seemed [his]940-the doctor ; in [his]940-the doctor profession ; in [his]940-the doctor standing among [men]657-men ; and , above all , in [his]940-the doctor heart life , which [Flower]144-flower had always held between [her]144-flower two sweet hands . And [Jane]101-jane rejoiced , but felt still more lonely now [she]101-jane had [no companion in loneliness]1179-no companion in loneliness . And still [their]1180-their friendship held , with [Flower]144-flower admitted as [a third a wistful , grateful third]1181-a third a wistful , grateful third , anxious to learn from [the woman whose friendship meant so much to [[her]144-flower husband]1183-her husband , how to succeed where [she]144-flower had hitherto failed]1182-the woman whose friendship meant so much to her husband , how to succeed where she had hitherto failed . And [Jane]101-jane 's faithful heart was generous and loyal to both , though in sight of [their]1180-their perfect happiness [her]101-jane loneliness grew .

And now , in [her]101-jane own hour of need , it had to be [Deryck]107-deryck only ; and [the doctor]940-the doctor knew this , and had arranged accordingly ; for at last [his]107-deryck chance had come , to repay the faithful devotion of a lifetime . The conversation of that afternoon would be the supreme test of [their]1180-their friendship . And so , with [a specialist]1185-a specialist 's appreciation of the mental effect of the most trivial external details , [the doctor]940-the doctor had ordered muffins , and a kettle on the fire , and had asked [Jane]101-jane to make the tea .

By the time the kettle boiled , [they]1180-their had remembered the chestnuts , and were laughing about poor old [Fraulein]102-fraulein 's efforts to keep them in order , and the strategies by which [they]1180-their used to evade [her]102-fraulein vigilance . And the years rolled back , and [Jane]101-jane felt [herself]101-jane very much at [home]381-home with the chum of [her]101-jane childhood .

Nevertheless , there was a moment of tension when [the doctor]940-the doctor drew back the tea - table and [they]1180-their faced each other in easy - chairs on either side of the fireplace . [Each]1189-each noticed how characteristic was the attitude of [the other]476-the other .

[Jane]101-jane sat forward , [her]101-jane feet firmly planted on the hearth - rug , [her]101-jane arms on [her]101-jane knees , and [her]101-jane hands clasped in front of [her]101-jane .

[The doctor]940-the doctor leaned back , one knee crossed over the other , [his]940-the doctor elbows on the arms of [his]940-the doctor chair , the tips of [his]940-the doctor fingers meeting , in absolute stillness of body and intense concentration of mind .

The silence between [them]1180-their was like a deep , calm pool .

[Jane]101-jane took the first plunge .

" [Deryck]107-deryck , [I]940-the doctor am going to tell [you]107-deryck everything . [I]940-the doctor am going to speak of [my]940-the doctor heart , and mind , and feelings , exactly as if they were bones , and muscles , and lungs . [I]940-the doctor want [you]107-deryck to combine the offices of [doctor]2904-doctor and [confessor]2905-confessor in one . "[940-the doctor]

[The doctor]940-the doctor had been contemplating [his]940-the doctor finger - tips . [He]940-the doctor now glanced swiftly at [Jane]101-jane , and nodded ; then turned [his]940-the doctor head and looked into the fire .

" [Deryck]107-deryck , mine has been a somewhat lonely existence . [I]940-the doctor have never been essential to the life of [another]2906-another , and [no one]2059-no one has ever touched the real depths of [mine]940-the doctor . [I]940-the doctor have known [they]2908-they were there , but [I]940-the doctor have known [they]2908-they were unsounded . "[940-the doctor]

[The doctor]940-the doctor opened [his]940-the doctor lips , as if to speak ; then closed them in a firmer line than before , and merely nodded [his]940-the doctor head silently .

" [I]940-the doctor had never been loved with that love which makes one absolutely first to [a person]2909-a person , nor had [I]940-the doctor ever so loved . [I]940-the doctor had cared very much ; but caring is not loving . Oh , [Boy]2714-boy , [I]940-the doctor know that now ! "[940-the doctor]

[The doctor]940-the doctor 's profile showed rather white against the dark - green background of [his]940-the doctor chair ; but [he]940-the doctor smiled as [he]940-the doctor answered : " Quite true , [dear]2179-dear . There is a distinction , and a difference . "[940-the doctor]

" [I]101-jane had heaps of [friends]2139-friends , and amongst [them]2139-friends [a good many nice men , mostly rather younger than [myself]101-jane]2913-a good many nice men , mostly rather younger than myself , who called [me]101-jane ' [Miss Champion]118-miss champion . ' to [my]101-jane face , and ' good old [Jane]101-jane ' behind [my]101-jane back . "[101-jane]

[The doctor]940-the doctor smiled . [He]940-the doctor had as often heard the expression , and could recall the whole - hearted affection and admiration in the tones of [those who used it]1196-those who used it .

" [Men]657-men as a rule , "[101-jane] Continued [Jane]101-jane , " get on better with [me]940-the doctor than do [women]2410-women . Being large and solid , and usually calling a spade ' a spade ; ' and not ' a garden implement , ' [women]2410-women consider [me]940-the doctor strong - minded , and are inclined to be afraid of [me]940-the doctor . [The boys]2917-the boys know [they]2917-the boys can trust [me]940-the doctor ; [they]2917-the boys make a confidante of [me]940-the doctor , looking upon [me]940-the doctor as [a sort of [convenient elder sister who knows less about [them]2917-the boys than [an elder sister]2920-an elder sister would know]2919-convenient elder sister who knows less about them than an elder sister would know , and is probably more ready to be interested in those things which [they]2917-the boys choose to tell . Among [[my]940-the doctor men friends]2921-my men friends]2918-a sort of convenient elder sister who knows less about them than an elder sister would know , and is probably more ready to be interested in those things which they choose to tell . among my men friends , [Deryck]107-deryck , was [Garth Dalmain]111-garth . "[940-the doctor]

[Jane]101-jane paused , and [the doctor]940-the doctor waited silently for [her]101-jane to continue .

" [I]940-the doctor was always interested in [him]111-garth , partly because [he]111-garth was so original and vivid in [his]111-garth way of talking , and partly because "[940-the doctor] a bright flush suddenly crept up into the tanned cheeks-"well , though [I]940-the doctor did not realise it then , [I]940-the doctor suppose [I]940-the doctor found [his]111-garth extraordinary beauty rather fascinating . And then , [our]2922-we circumstances were so much alike , [both orphans]2923-both orphans , and well off ; responsible to [no one]2059-no one for [our]2922-we actions ; with heaps of [mutual friends]2925-mutual friends , and constantly staying at [the same houses]2207-the same houses . [We]2922-we drifted into a pleasant intimacy , and of all [[my]940-the doctor friends]2927-my friends , [he]111-garth was the one who made [me]940-the doctor feel most like ` [a man]575-a man and [a brother]2929-a brother . ' [We]2922-we discussed [women]2410-women by the dozen , all [his]111-garth special admirations in turn , and the effect of [their]2410-women beauty upon [him]111-garth , and [I]940-the doctor watched with interest to see who , at last , would fix [his]111-garth roving fancy . But on one eventful day all this was changed in half an hour . [We]2922-we were both staying at [Overdene]1-overdene . There was a big house party , and [Aunt Georgina]157-aunt georgina had arranged a concert to which half [the neighbourhood]417-the neighbourhood was coming . " Ah , "[940-the doctor] said [the doctor]940-the doctor .

" [I]940-the doctor sang The Rosary the song [Flower]144-flower asked for the last time [I]940-the doctor was [here]2151-here . Do [you]940-the doctor remember ? "[940-the doctor]

" After that , all was changed between [Garth]111-garth and [me]940-the doctor . [I]940-the doctor did not understand it at first . [I]940-the doctor knew the music had moved [him]111-garth deeply , beauty of sound having upon [him]111-garth much the same effect as beauty of colour ; but [I]940-the doctor thought the effect would pass in the night . But the days went on , and there was always this strange sweet difference ; not anything [others]410-others would notice ; but [I]940-the doctor suddenly became conscious that , for the first time in [my]940-the doctor whole life , [I]940-the doctor was essential to [somebody]2054-somebody . [I]940-the doctor could not enter [a room]708-a room without realising that [he]111-garth was instantly aware of [my]940-the doctor presence ; [I]940-the doctor could not leave [a room]708-a room without knowing that [he]111-garth would at once feel and regret [my]940-the doctor absence . The one fact filled and completed all things ; the other left a blank which could not be removed . [I]940-the doctor knew this , and yet incredible though it may appear [I]940-the doctor did not realise it meant LOVE . [I]940-the doctor put it down to that ; yet when [he]111-garth looked at [me]940-the doctor [his]111-garth eyes seemed to touch as well as see [me]940-the doctor , and it was a very tender and wonderful touch . [Jane]101-jane paused , and looked into the glowing heart of the fire .

" Yes , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane . " And [he]111-garth could not fight this , just because it was partly true . [He]111-garth had been all the time as completely without self - consciousness , as [I]940-the doctor had been morbidly full of it . [His]111-garth whole thought had been of [me]940-the doctor . [Mine]940-the doctor had been of [him]111-garth and of [myself]940-the doctor . "[940-the doctor]

" [Jane]101-jane , "[940-the doctor] said [the doctor]940-the doctor , " of all that [you]101-jane have suffered since that hour , [you]101-jane deserved every pang . "[101-jane]

[Jane]101-jane bent [her]101-jane head . " [I]101-jane know , "[101-jane] [she]101-jane said .

" [You]101-jane were false to [yourself]101-jane , and not true to [[your]101-jane lover]3008-your lover . [You]101-jane robbed and defrauded both . Can not [you]101-jane now see [your]101-jane mistake ? To take it on the lowest ground , [Dalmain]111-garth , worshipper of beauty as [he]111-garth was , had had a surfeit of pretty faces . [He]111-garth was like [[the confectioner]3009-the confectioner 's boy who when first engaged is allowed to eat all the cakes and sweets [he]111-garth likes , and who eats so many in the first week , that ever after [he]111-garth wants only plain bread - and - butter]3010-the confectioner 's boy who when first engaged is allowed to eat all the cakes and sweets he likes , and who eats so many in the first week , that ever after he wants only plain bread - and - butter . [YOU]101-jane were [Dal]116-dal 's bread - and - butter . [I]101-jane am sorry if [you]101-jane do not like the simile . "[101-jane]

[Jane]101-jane smiled . " [I]940-the doctor do like the simile , "[940-the doctor] [she]101-jane said .

" Ah , but [you]101-jane were far more than this , [[my]101-jane dear girl]2718-my dear girl . [You]101-jane were [his]111-garth ideal of womanhood . [He]111-garth believed in [your]101-jane strength and tenderness , [your]101-jane graciousness and truth . [You]101-jane shattered this ideal ; [you]101-jane failed this faith in [you]101-jane . [His]111-garth fanciful , artistic , eclectic nature with all its unused possibilities of faithful and passionate devotion , had found its haven in [your]101-jane love ; and in twelve hours [you]101-jane turned it adrift . [Jane]101-jane it was a crime . The magnificent strength of [the fellow]3012-the fellow is shown by the way [he]111-garth took it . [His]111-garth progress in [his]111-garth art was not arrested . All [his]111-garth best work has been done since . [He]111-garth has made no bad mad marriage , in mockery of [his]111-garth own pain ; and [no grand loveless one]3013-no grand loveless one , to spite [you]101-jane . [He]111-garth might have done both [I]101-jane mean either . And when [I]101-jane realise that [the poor fellow [I]101-jane was with]3014-the poor fellow i was with yesterday making such a brave fight in the dark , and turning [his]111-garth head on the pillow to say with a gleam of hope on [his]111-garth drawn face : ` Where [Thou]3015-thou art [Guide]190-guide , no ill can come ' had already been put through all this by [you]101-jane [Jane]101-jane , if [you]101-jane were [a man]575-a man , [I]101-jane 'd horsewhip [you]101-jane ! "[101-jane] said [the doctor]940-the doctor .

[Jane]101-jane squared [her]101-jane shoulders and lifted [her]101-jane head with more of [her]101-jane old spirit than [she]101-jane had yet shown .

" [You]101-jane have lashed [me]101-jane well , [Boy]2714-boy , "[101-jane] [she]101-jane said , " as only words spoken in faithful indignation can lash . And [I]940-the doctor feel the better for the pain . And now [I]940-the doctor think [I]940-the doctor ought to tell [you]101-jane that while [I]940-the doctor was on the top of [the Great Pyramid]2742-the great pyramid [I]940-the doctor suddenly saw the matter from a different standpoint . [You]101-jane remember that view , with its sharp line of demarcation ? On one side [the river]315-the river , and verdure , vegetation , fruitfulness , a veritable ' garden enclosed ' ; on the other , vast space as far as the eye could reach ; golden liberty , away to the horizon , but no sign of vegetation , no hope of cultivation , just barren , arid , loneliness . [I]940-the doctor felt this was an exact picture of [my]940-the doctor life as [I]940-the doctor live it now . [Garth]111-garth 's love , flowing through it , as [the river]315-the river , could have made it [a veritable ' garden of the Lord]3021-a veritable ' garden of the lord . ' It would have meant less liberty , but it would also have meant no loneliness . And , after all , the liberty to live for self alone becomes in time a weary bondage . Then [I]940-the doctor realised that [I]940-the doctor had condemned [him]111-garth also to this hard desert life . [I]940-the doctor came down and took counsel of [the old Sphinx]212-the sphinx . [Those]212-the sphinx calm , wise eyes , looking on into futurity , seemed to say : ' [They]3022-they only live who love . ' That evening [I]940-the doctor resolved to give up the Nile trip , return [home]381-home immediately , send for [Garth]111-garth , admit all to [him]111-garth , asking [him]111-garth to let [us]3024-us both begin again just where [we]3024-us were three years ago in the moonlight on [the terrace at [Shenstone]16-shenstone]3025-the terrace at shenstone . Ten minutes after [I]940-the doctor had formed this decision , [I]940-the doctor heard of [his]111-garth accident . "[940-the doctor]

[The doctor]940-the doctor shaded [his]940-the doctor face with [his]940-the doctor hand . " The wheels of time , "[940-the doctor] [he]940-the doctor said in a low voice , " move forward always ; backward , never . "[101-jane]

" Oh , [Deryck]107-deryck , "[144-flower] cried [Jane]101-jane , ' sometimes [they]1221-they do . [You]101-jane and [Flower]144-flower know that sometimes [they]1221-they do . "[940-the doctor]

"[940-the doctor] Then [he]940-the doctor added quickly : " But , unquestionably , it helps to mend matters , so far as [your]101-jane own mental attitude is concerned , that before [you]101-jane knew of [Dalmain]111-garth 's blindness [you]101-jane should have admitted [yourself]101-jane wrong , and made up [your]101-jane mind to trust [him]111-garth . "[101-jane]

"[940-the doctor]

Then , as [Jane]101-jane , apparently satisfied with the expression , did not attempt to qualify it , [he]940-the doctor rose and stirred the fire ; standing over it for a few moments in silent thought . When [he]940-the doctor sat down again , [his]940-the doctor voice was very quiet , but there was an alertness about [his]940-the doctor expression which roused [Jane]101-jane . [She]101-jane felt that the crisis of [their]1224-their conversation had been reached .

"[940-the doctor]

A smile of ineffable tenderness parted [Jane]101-jane 's lips . [The doctor]940-the doctor saw it , but turned away immediately . It was not for [him]940-the doctor , or for [any man]2113-any man , to see that look . The eyes which should have seen it were sightless evermore .

" What then , [Deryck]107-deryck ? [Love]219-love will know best what then . All barriers will be swept away , and [Garth]111-garth and [I]940-the doctor will be together . "[940-the doctor]

[The doctor]940-the doctor 's finger - tips met very exactly before [he]940-the doctor spoke again ; and when [he]940-the doctor did speak , [his]940-the doctor tone was very level and very kind .

" Ah , [Jane]101-jane , "[940-the doctor] [he]940-the doctor said , " that is [the woman]400-the woman 's point of view . It is certainly the simplest , and perhaps the best . If [you]101-jane go to [Garth]111-garth with the simple offer of [your]101-jane love the treasure [he]111-garth asked three years ago and failed to win [he]111-garth will naturally conclude the love now given is mainly pity ; and [Garth Dalmain]111-garth is not [the man to be content with pity]3035-the man to be content with pity , where [he]111-garth has thought to win love , and failed . Nor would [he]111-garth allow [any woman least of all [his]111-garth crown of womanhood]3036-any woman least of all his crown of womanhood to tie [herself]3036-any woman least of all his crown of womanhood to [his]111-garth blindness unless [he]111-garth were sure such binding was [her]3036-any woman least of all his crown of womanhood deepest joy . And how could [you]101-jane expect [him]111-garth to believe this in face of the fact that , when [he]111-garth was all [a woman]403-a woman 's heart could desire , [you]101-jane refused [him]111-garth and sent [him]111-garth from [you]101-jane ? ' [[My]940-the doctor dear girl]2718-my dear girl , that is how matters stand from [the man]1158-the man 's point of view ; from [his]1158-the man , [I]940-the doctor make no doubt , even more than from [mine]940-the doctor ; for [I]940-the doctor recognise in [Garth Dalmain]111-garth [a stronger man]3040-a stronger man than [myself]940-the doctor . [Jane]101-jane 's pale , startled face went to [the doctor]940-the doctor 's heart .

" But [Deryck]107-deryck [he]111-garth loves "[940-the doctor]

" Oh , [Boy]2714-boy , help [me]940-the doctor ! Find a way ! Tell [me]940-the doctor what to do ! "[940-the doctor] Despair was in [Jane]101-jane 's eyes .

Just before [I]101-jane left [him]216-dr. mackenzie , [Dalmain]111-garth asked after [you]2718-my dear girl . [He]111-garth sandwiched [you]2718-my dear girl most carefully in between [the duchess]304-the duchess and [Flower]144-flower ; but [he]111-garth could not keep the blood out of [his]111-garth thin cheeks , and [he]111-garth gripped the bedclothes in [his]111-garth effort to keep [his]111-garth voice steady . [He]111-garth asked where [you]2718-my dear girl were . [I]101-jane said , [I]101-jane believed , in [Egypt]9-egypt . When [you]2718-my dear girl were coming [home]381-home . [I]101-jane told [him]111-garth [I]101-jane had heard [you]2718-my dear girl intended returning to [Jerusalem]64-jerusalem for [Easter]222-easter , and [I]101-jane supposed [we]3063-we might expect [you]2718-my dear girl [home]381-home at the end of April or early in May. [He]111-garth inquired how [you]2718-my dear girl were . [I]101-jane replied that [you]2718-my dear girl were not [a good correspondent]3065-a good correspondent , but [I]101-jane gathered from occasional cables and post - cards that [you]2718-my dear girl were very fit and having a good time . [I]101-jane then volunteered the statement that it was [I]101-jane who had sent [you]2718-my dear girl abroad because [you]2718-my dear girl were going all to pieces . [He]111-garth made a quick movement with [his]111-garth hand as if [he]111-garth would have struck [me]101-jane for using the expression . Then [he]111-garth said : ' Going to pieces ? [SHE]3066-she ! ' in a tone of most utter contempt for [me]101-jane and [my]101-jane opinions . Then [he]111-garth hastily made minute inquiries for [Flower]144-flower . [He]111-garth had already asked about [the duchess]304-the duchess all the questions [he]111-garth intended asking about [you]2718-my dear girl . When [he]111-garth had ascertained that [Flower]144-flower was at [home]381-home and well , and had sent [him]111-garth [her]144-flower affectionate sympathy , [he]111-garth begged [me]101-jane to glance through a pile of letters which were waiting until [he]111-garth felt able to have them read to [him]111-garth , and to tell [him]111-garth any of the handwritings known to [me]101-jane . All [the world]2266-the world seemed to have sent [him]111-garth letters of sympathy , [poor chap]2792-poor chap . [I]101-jane told [him]111-garth a dozen or so of the names [I]101-jane knew , a royal handwriting among them . [He]111-garth asked whether there were any from abroad . There were two or three . [I]101-jane knew [them]3071-them all , and named [them]3071-them . [He]111-garth could not bear to hear any of [them]3071-them read ; even the royal letter remained unopened , though [he]111-garth asked to have it in [his]111-garth hand , and fingered the tiny crimson crown . Then [he]111-garth asked . ' Is there one from [the duchess]304-the duchess ? ' There was . [He]111-garth wished to hear that one , so [I]101-jane opened and read it . It was very characteristic of [her]304-the duchess Grace ; full of kindly sympathy , heartily yet tactfully expressed . Half - way through [she]304-the duchess said : ' [Jane]101-jane will be upset . [I]101-jane shall write and tell [her]101-jane next time [she]101-jane sends [me]101-jane an address . At present [I]101-jane have no idea in which quarter of the globe [[my]101-jane dear niece]3073-my dear niece is to be found . Last time [I]101-jane heard of [her]101-jane [she]101-jane seemed in a fair way towards marrying [a little Jap]3074-a little jap and settling in [Japan]37-japan . ' With intuitive tact of a very high order , [I]101-jane omitted this entire passage about marrying [the Jap]3083-the jap . When [[your]3080-you aunt]3084-your aunt 's letter was finished , [he]3079-a husband asked point blank whether there was one from [you]3080-you . "[101-jane]

" Oh , [Deryck]107-deryck , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane brokenly , " [I]101-jane ca n't bear it ! [I]101-jane must go to [him]3079-a husband ! "[101-jane]

The telephone bell on [the doctor]940-the doctor 's table whirred sharply . [He]940-the doctor went over and took up the receiver .

" [Jeanette]205-jeanette , "[940-the doctor] [he]940-the doctor said , " [I]940-the doctor do not believe in chance . But [I]940-the doctor do believe in a Higher Control , which makes and unmakes [our]3090-our plans . [You]101-jane shall go . "[940-the doctor]

CHAPTER XVI

[THE DOCTOR]940-the doctor FINDS A WAY

" And now as to ways and means , "[940-the doctor] said [the doctor]940-the doctor , when [Jane]101-jane felt better . " [You]101-jane must leave by the night mail from [Euston]66-euston , the day after to - morrow . Can [you]101-jane be ready ? "[101-jane]

" [I]940-the doctor am ready , "[940-the doctor] said [Jane]101-jane .

" [You]101-jane must go as [Nurse Rosemary Gray]228-nurse rosemary . "[101-jane]

" [I]101-jane do n't like that , "[101-jane] [Jane]101-jane interposed . " [I]940-the doctor should prefer a fictitious name . Suppose the real [Rosemary Gray]228-nurse rosemary turned up , or [some one who knows [her]228-nurse rosemary]3091-some one who knows her . "[940-the doctor]

" [[My]101-jane , [dear girl]3093-dear girl]3092-my , dear girl , [she]228-nurse rosemary is half - way to [Australia]65-australia by now , and [you]101-jane will see [no one up there]3094-no one up there but [the household]419-the household and [the doctor]940-the doctor . [Any one who turned up]3097-any one who turned up would be more likely to know [you]101-jane . [We]3098-we must take these risks . Besides , in case of complications arising , [I]101-jane will give [you]101-jane a note , which [you]101-jane can produce at once , explaining the situation , and stating that in agreeing to fill the breach [you]101-jane consented at [my]101-jane request to take the name in order to prevent any necessity for explanations to [the patient]3099-the patient , which at this particular juncture would be most prejudicial . [I]101-jane can honestly say this , it being even more true than appears . So [you]101-jane must dress the part , [Jane]101-jane , and endeavour to look the part , so far as [your]101-jane five foot eleven will permit ; for please remember that [I]101-jane have described [you]101-jane to [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie as ' a pretty , dainty little thing , refined and elegant , and considerably more capable than [she]3099-the patient looks . ' "[101-jane]

" [Dicky]162-dicky ! [He]216-dr. mackenzie will instantly realise that [I]940-the doctor am not the person mentioned in [your]101-jane letter . "[940-the doctor]

" Not so , [dear]2179-dear . Remember [we]3098-we have to do with [a Scotchman]3101-a scotchman , and [a Scotchman]3101-a scotchman never realises anything ' instantly . ' [The Gaelic]225-the gaelic mind works slowly , though it works exceeding sure . [He]216-dr. mackenzie will be exceeding sure , when [he]216-dr. mackenzie has contemplated [you]101-jane for a while , that [I]101-jane am a ' ve rra [poor judge o ' women]3103-poor judge o ' women , ' and that [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary is [a far finer woman than [I]101-jane described]3104-a far finer woman than i described . But [he]216-dr. mackenzie will have already created for [Dalmain]111-garth , from [my]101-jane letter , a mental picture of [[his]216-dr. mackenzie nurse]3105-his nurse ; which is all that really matters . [We]3098-we must trust to [Providence]226-providence that [old Robbie]217-dr. rob does not proceed to amend it by the original . Try to forestall any such conversation . If [the good doctor]3106-the good doctor seems to mistrust [you]101-jane , take [him]216-dr. mackenzie on one side , show [him]216-dr. mackenzie [my]101-jane letter , and tell [him]216-dr. mackenzie the simple truth . But [I]101-jane do not suppose this will be necessary . With [the patient]3099-the patient , [you]101-jane must remember the extreme sensitiveness of [a blind man]3108-a blind man 's hearing . Tread lightly . Do not give [him]216-dr. mackenzie any opportunity to judge of [your]101-jane height . Try to remember that [you]101-jane are not supposed to be able to reach the top shelf of an eight - foot bookcase without the aid of steps or a chair . And when [the patient]3099-the patient begins to stand and walk , try to keep [him]3099-the patient from finding out that [[his]3099-the patient nurse]3105-his nurse is slightly taller than [himself]3099-the patient . This should not be difficult ; one of [his]3099-the patient fixed ideas being that in [his]3099-the patient blindness [he]3099-the patient will not be touched by [a woman]403-a woman . [[His]3099-the patient valet]3112-his valet will lead [him]3099-the patient about . And , [Jane]101-jane , [I]101-jane can not imagine [any one who has ever had [your]101-jane hand in [his]3113-any one who has ever had your hand in his]3113-any one who has ever had your hand in his , failing to recognise it . So [I]101-jane advise [you]101-jane , from the first , to avoid shaking hands . But all these precautions do not obviate the greatest difficulty of all , [your]101-jane voice . Do [you]101-jane suppose , for a moment , [he]3099-the patient will not recognise that ? "[101-jane]

" [I]101-jane shall take the bull by the horns in that case , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane , " and [you]940-the doctor must help [me]940-the doctor . "[940-the doctor]

[The doctor]940-the doctor smiled . " [[My]940-the doctor dear]2068-my dear Nurse [Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , "[940-the doctor] [he]940-the doctor said , " [you]228-nurse rosemary must not be surprised if [[our]3115-our patient]3057-our patient detects a remarkable similarity between [your]228-nurse rosemary voice and that of [a mutual friend of [his]3057-our patient and [mine]940-the doctor]3117-a mutual friend of his and mine . [They]1243-i rose and faced [each other]573-each other on the hearth - rug .

" [Boy]2714-boy , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane with emotion , " [you]2714-boy have been so good to [me]940-the doctor , and so faithful . Whatever happens , [I]940-the doctor shall be grateful always . "[940-the doctor]

" [Hush]227-hush , "[940-the doctor] said [the doctor]940-the doctor . " No need for gratitude when long - standing debts are paid .
