CHAPTER XVII

ENTER [NURSE ROSEMARY

Nurse Rosemary Gray]228-nurse rosemary had arrived at [Gleneesh]13-gleneesh .

When [she]228-nurse rosemary and [her]228-nurse rosemary " box "[111-garth] were deposited on [the platform of [the little wayside railway station]1249-the little wayside railway station]1248-the platform of the little wayside railway station , [she]228-nurse rosemary felt [she]228-nurse rosemary had indeed dropped from the clouds ; leaving [[her]228-nurse rosemary own world]1250-her own world , and [her]228-nurse rosemary own identity , on [some far - distant planet]1251-some far - distant planet .

[A motor]1252-a motor waited outside [the station]746-the station , and [she]228-nurse rosemary had a momentary fear lest [she]228-nurse rosemary should receive deferential recognition from [the chauffeur]1254-the chauffeur . But [he]1254-the chauffeur was as solid and stolid as any other portion of [the car]1255-the car , and paid no more attention to [her]228-nurse rosemary than [he]1254-the chauffeur did to [her]228-nurse rosemary baggage . [The one]1256-the one was [a nurse]1257-a nurse ; the other , a box , both common nouns , and merely articles to be conveyed to [Gleneesh]13-gleneesh according to orders . So [he]1254-the chauffeur looked straight before [him]1254-the chauffeur , presenting a sphinx - like profile beneath the peak of [his]1254-the chauffeur leather cap , while [a slow and solemn porter]1258-a slow and solemn porter helped [Jane]101-jane and [her]101-jane luggage into [the motor]1259-the motor . When [she]101-jane had rewarded [the porter]1127-the porter with threepence , conscientiously endeavouring to live down to [her]101-jane box , [the chauffeur]1254-the chauffeur moved foot and hand with the silent precision of a machine , [they]1262-they swung round into the open , and took [the road]1263-the road for [the hills]1264-the hills .

Up into [the fragrant heather and grey rocks]1265-the fragrant heather and grey rocks ; [miles of moor]1266-miles of moor and sky and solitude . More than ever [Jane]101-jane felt as if [she]101-jane had dropped into [another world]1267-another world , and so small an incident as the omission of the usual respectful salute of [a servant]1268-a servant , gave [her]101-jane a delightful sense of success and security in [her]101-jane new role .

[She]101-jane had often heard of [[Garth]111-garth 's old castle]1269-garth 's old castle up in [the North]51-the north , an inheritance from [[[his]111-garth mother]452-his mother 's family]1271-his mother 's family , but was hardly prepared for so much picturesque beauty or such stateliness of archway and entrance . As [they]1262-they wound up [the hillside]1272-the hillside and [the grey turrets]1273-the grey turrets came into view , with [pine woods]1274-pine woods behind and above , [she]101-jane seemed to hear [Garth]111-garth 's boyish voice under the cedar at [Overdene]1-overdene , with its ring of buoyant enjoyment , saying : " [I]111-garth should like [you]101-jane to see [Castle Gleneesh]12-castle gleneesh . [You]101-jane would enjoy the view from [the terrace]312-the terrace ; and [the pine woods]2358-the pine woods , and [the moor]2359-the moor . "[111-garth] And then [he]111-garth had laughingly declared [his]111-garth intention of getting up a " best party "[101-jane] of [his]111-garth own , with [the duchess]304-the duchess as [chaperon]1276-chaperon ; and [she]101-jane had promised to make one of it . And now [he]111-garth , [the owner of all this loveliness]1277-the owner of all this loveliness , was blind and helpless ; and [she]101-jane was entering [the fair portals of [Gleneesh]13-gleneesh]1278-the fair portals of gleneesh , unknown to [him]111-garth , unrecognised by any , as [a nurse - secretary sort of person]1279-a nurse - secretary sort of person . [Jane]101-jane had said at [Overdene]1-overdene : " Yes , ask [us]3139-us , and see what happens . "[101-jane] And now this was happening . What would happen next ?

[[Garth]111-garth 's man]1280-garth 's man , [Simpson]127-simpson , received [her]101-jane at the door , and again a possible danger was safely passed . [He]111-garth had entered [Garth]111-garth 's service within the last three years and evidently did not know [her]101-jane by sight .

[Jane]101-jane stood looking round [the old hall]1281-the old hall , in the leisurely way of [one accustomed to arrive for the first time as guest]1282-one accustomed to arrive for the first time as guest at [the country homes of [[her]101-jane friends]408-her friends]1283-the country homes of her friends ; noting the quaint , large fireplace , and the shadowy antlers high up on the walls . Then [she]101-jane became aware that [Simpson]127-simpson , already half - way up the wide oak staircase , was expecting [the nurse]1285-the nurse to hurry after [him]127-simpson . This [she]101-jane did , and was received at the top of the staircase by [old Margery]147-margery . It did not require the lawn kerchief , the black satin apron , and the lavender ribbons , for [Jane]101-jane to recognise [[Garth]111-garth 's old Scotch nurse]1286-garth 's old scotch nurse , [housekeeper]1287-housekeeper , and [friend]871-friend . One glance at the grave , kindly face , wrinkled and rosy , a beautiful combination of perfect health and advancing years , was enough . The shrewd , keen eyes , seeing quickly beneath the surface , were unmistakable . [She]101-jane conducted [Jane]101-jane to [[her]101-jane room]630-her room , talking all the time in a kindly effort to set [her]101-jane at [her]101-jane ease , and to express a warm welcome with gentle dignity , not forgetting the cloud of sadness which hung over [the house]309-the house and rendered [her]101-jane presence necessary . [She]101-jane called [her]101-jane " [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary "[101-jane] at the conclusion of every sentence , with an upward inflection and pretty rolling of the r 's , which charmed [Jane]101-jane . [She]101-jane longed to say : " [[You]101-jane old dear]3140-you old dear ! How [I]101-jane shall enjoy being in [the house]309-the house with [you]101-jane ! "[101-jane] but remembered in time that a remark which would have been gratifying condescension on the part of [the Honourable Jane Champion]101-jane , would be little short of impertinent familiarity from [Nurse Rosemary Gray]228-nurse rosemary . So [she]101-jane followed meekly into [the pretty room]1291-the pretty room prepared for [her]101-jane ; admired [the chintz]1292-the chintz ; answered questions about [her]101-jane night journey ; admitted that [she]101-jane would be very glad of breakfast , but still more of a bath if convenient .

And now bath and breakfast were both over , and [Jane]101-jane was standing beside the window in [[her]101-jane room]630-her room , looking down at the wonderful view , and waiting until [the local doctor]1294-the local doctor should arrive and summon [her]101-jane to [[Garth]111-garth 's room]1295-garth 's room .

[She]101-jane had put on the freshest - looking and most business - like of [her]101-jane uniforms , a blue print gown , linen collar and cuffs , and a white apron with shoulder straps and large pockets . [She]101-jane also wore the becoming cap belonging to [one of [the institutions to which [she]101-jane had once been for training]1297-the institutions to which she had once been for training]1296-one of the institutions to which she had once been for training . [She]101-jane did not intend wearing this later on , but just this morning [she]101-jane omitted no detail which could impress [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie with [her]101-jane extremely professional appearance . [She]101-jane was painfully conscious that the severe simplicity of [her]101-jane dress tended rather to add to [her]101-jane height , notwithstanding [her]101-jane low - heeled ward shoes with their noiseless rubber soles . [She]101-jane could but hope [Deryck]107-deryck would prove right as to the view [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie would take .

And then far away in the distance , along the white ribbon of [road]1298-road , winding up from [the valley]2785-the valley , [she]101-jane saw a high gig , trotting swiftly ; [one man]1300-one man in [it]1301-it , and [a small groom]1302-a small groom seated behind . [Her]101-jane hour had come .

[Jane]101-jane fell upon [her]101-jane knees , at the window , and prayed for strength , wisdom , and courage . [She]101-jane could realise absolutely nothing . [She]101-jane had thought so much and so continuously , that all mental vision was out of focus and had become a blur . Even [his]107-deryck dear face had faded and was hidden from [her]101-jane when [she]101-jane frantically strove to recall it to [her]101-jane mental view . Only the actual fact remained clear , that in a few short minutes [she]101-jane would be taken to [the room where [he]107-deryck lay]1303-the room where he lay . [She]101-jane would see the face [she]101-jane had not seen since [they]1304-they stood together at the chancel step the face from which the glad confidence slowly faded , a horror of chill disillusion taking its place .

" Anoint and cheer [our]1304-they soiled face With the abundance of [Thy]3142-thy grace . "[101-jane] [She]101-jane would see that dear face , and [he]107-deryck , sightless , would not see [hers]101-jane , but would be easily deluded into believing [her]101-jane to be [some one else]2105-some one else .

The gig had turned the last bend of [the road]1263-the road , and passed out of sight on its way to the front of [the house]309-the house .

[Jane]101-jane rose and stood waiting . Suddenly [she]101-jane remembered two sentences of [her]101-jane conversation with [Deryck]107-deryck . [She]101-jane had said : " Shall [I]107-deryck ever have the courage to carry it through ? "[107-deryck] And [Deryck]107-deryck had answered , earnestly : " If [you]101-jane value [your]101-jane own eventual happiness and [his]107-deryck , [you]101-jane will . "[127-simpson]

A tap came at [her]101-jane door . [Jane]101-jane walked across [the room]424-the room , and opened it .

[Simpson]127-simpson stood on the threshold .

" [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie is in [the library]3143-the library , [nurse]2339-nurse , "[127-simpson] [he]127-simpson said , " and wishes to see [you]2339-nurse [there]2228-there . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" Then , will [you]127-simpson kindly take [me]216-dr. mackenzie to [the library]3143-the library , [Mr. Simpson]230-simpson , "[216-dr. mackenzie] said [Nurse Rosemary Gray]228-nurse rosemary .

CHAPTER XVIII

[THE NAPOLEON OF THE MOORS]231-the napoleon of the moors

On the bear - skin rug , with [his]127-simpson back to the fire , stood [Dr. Robert Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie , known to [[his]127-simpson friends]1309-his friends as " [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob "[216-dr. mackenzie] or " [Old Robbie]232-old robbie , "[1309-his friends] according to [their]1309-his friends degrees of intimacy .

[Jane]101-jane 's first impression was of [a short , stout man]1310-a short , stout man , in a sealskin waistcoat which had seen better days , a light box - cloth overcoat three sizes too large for [him]127-simpson , a Napoleonic attitude , little spindle legs planted far apart , arms folded on chest , shoulders hunched up , which led [one]474-one to expect , as the eye travelled upwards , an ivory - white complexion , a Roman nose , masterful jaw , and thin lips folded in a line of conscious power . Instead of which one found a red , freckled face , a nose which turned cheerfully skyward , a fat pink chin , and drooping sandy moustache . The only striking feature of the face was a pair of keen blue eyes , which , when turned upon any one intently , almost disappeared beneath bushy red eyebrows and became little points of turquoise light .

[Jane]101-jane had not been in [his]127-simpson presence two minutes before [she]101-jane perceived that , when [his]127-simpson mind was working , [he]127-simpson was entirely unconscious of [his]127-simpson body , which was apt to do most peculiar things automatically ; so that [[his]127-simpson friends]1309-his friends had passed round the remark : " [Robbie]217-dr. rob chews up dozens of good pen - holders , while [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie is thinking out excellent prescriptions . "[107-deryck]

When [Jane]101-jane entered , [his]127-simpson eyes were fixed upon an open letter , which [she]101-jane instinctively knew to be [Deryck]107-deryck 's , and [he]127-simpson did not look up at once . When [he]127-simpson did look up , [she]101-jane saw [his]127-simpson unmistakable start of surprise . [He]127-simpson opened [his]127-simpson mouth to speak , and [Jane]101-jane was irresistibly reminded of a tame goldfish at [Overdene]1-overdene , which used to rise to the surface when [the duchess]304-the duchess dropped crumbs . [He]127-simpson closed it without uttering a word , and turned again to [Deryck]107-deryck 's letter ; and [Jane]101-jane felt [herself]101-jane to be the crumb , or rather the camel , which [he]127-simpson was finding it difficult to swallow .

[She]101-jane waited in respectful silence , and [Deryck]107-deryck 's words passed with calming effect through the palpitating suspense of [her]101-jane brain . " [The Gaelic mind]3147-the gaelic mind works slowly , though it works exceeding sure . [He]127-simpson will be exceeding sure that [I]1314-the little man on the hearth - rug am [a verra poor judge o ' women]3148-a verra poor judge o ' women . "[1314-the little man on the hearth - rug]

At last [the little man on the hearth - rug]1314-the little man on the hearth - rug lifted [his]1314-the little man on the hearth - rug eyes again to [Jane]101-jane 's ; and , alas , how high [he]1314-the little man on the hearth - rug had to lift them !

" [Nurse]2339-nurse er ? "[101-jane] [he]1314-the little man on the hearth - rug said inquiringly , and [Jane]101-jane thought [his]1314-the little man on the hearth - rug searching eyes looked like little bits of broken blue china in a hay - stack .

" [Rosemary Gray]228-nurse rosemary , "[216-dr. mackenzie] replied [Jane]101-jane meekly , with a curtsey in [her]101-jane voice ; feeling as if [they]1315-they were rehearsing amateur theatricals at [Overdene]1-overdene , and the next minute [the duchess]304-the duchess 's cane would rap the floor and [they]1315-they would be told to speak up and not be so slow .

" Ah , "[216-dr. mackenzie] said [Dr. Robert Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie , " [I]107-deryck see . "[107-deryck]

[He]216-dr. mackenzie stared hard at the carpet in a distant corner of [the room]424-the room , then walked across and picked up a spline broken from a bass broom ; brought it back to the hearth - rug ; examined it with minute attention ; then put one end between [his]216-dr. mackenzie teeth and began to chew it .

[Jane]101-jane wondered what was the correct thing to do at this sort of interview , when [a doctor]1318-a doctor neither sat down [himself]1318-a doctor nor suggested that [the nurse]1285-the nurse should do so . [She]101-jane wished [she]101-jane had asked [Deryck]107-deryck . But [he]107-deryck could not possibly have enlightened [her]101-jane , because the first thing [he]107-deryck always said to [a nurse]1257-a nurse was : " [[My]107-deryck dear]2068-my dear Nurse SO - AND - SO , pray sit down . [People who have much unavoidable standing to do]3151-people who have much unavoidable standing to do should cultivate the habit of seating [themselves]3151-people who have much unavoidable standing to do comfortably at every possible opportunity . "[107-deryck]

But [the stout little person on the hearth - rug]1321-the stout little person on the hearth - rug was not [Deryck]107-deryck . So [Jane]101-jane stood at attention , and watched the stiff bit of bass wag up and down , and shorten , inch by inch . When it had finally disappeared , [Dr. Robert Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie spoke again .

" So [you]101-jane have arrived , [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary , "[107-deryck] [he]107-deryck said .

" Truly the mind of [a Scotchman]3101-a scotchman works slowly , "[101-jane] thought [Jane]101-jane , but [she]101-jane was thankful to detect the complete acceptance of [herself]101-jane in [his]107-deryck tone . [Deryck]107-deryck was right ; and oh the relief of not having to take [this unspeakable little man]1322-this unspeakable little man into [her]101-jane confidence in this matter of the deception to be practised on [Garth]111-garth .

" Yes , [sir]3118-sir , [I]107-deryck have arrived , "[107-deryck] [she]101-jane said .

Another period of silence . A fragment of the bass broom reappeared and vanished once more , before [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie spoke again .

" [I]101-jane am glad [you]101-jane have arrived , [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary , "[101-jane] [he]107-deryck said .

" [I]304-the duchess am glad TO have arrived , [sir]3118-sir , "[304-the duchess] said [Jane]101-jane gravely , almost expecting to hear [the duchess]304-the duchess 's delighted " Ha , ha ! "[216-dr. mackenzie] from the wings . [The little comedy]1324-the little comedy was progressing .

Then suddenly [she]101-jane became aware that during the last few minutes [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie 's mind had been concentrated upon something else . [She]101-jane had not filled it at all . The next moment it was turned upon [her]101-jane and two swift turquoise gleams from under the shaggy brows swept over [her]101-jane , with the rapidity and brightness of search - lights . [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie commenced speaking quickly , with a wonderful rolling of r 's .

" [I]216-dr. mackenzie understand , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray , [you]101-jane have come to minister to [the patient]3099-the patient 's mind rather than to [his]3099-the patient body . [You]101-jane need not trouble to explain . [I]216-dr. mackenzie have it from [Sir Deryck Brand]107-deryck , who prescribed [a nurse - companion for [the patient]3099-the patient]3156-a nurse - companion for the patient , and engaged [you]101-jane . [I]216-dr. mackenzie fully agreed with [his]107-deryck prescription ; and , allow [me]216-dr. mackenzie to say , [I]216-dr. mackenzie admire its ingredients . "[216-dr. mackenzie]

[Jane]101-jane bowed , and realised how [the duchess]304-the duchess would be chuckling . What [an insufferable little person]1326-an insufferable little person ! [Jane]101-jane had time to think this , while [he]216-dr. mackenzie walked across to the table - cloth , bent over it , and examined an ancient spot of ink . Finding a drop of candle grease near it , [he]216-dr. mackenzie removed it with [his]216-dr. mackenzie thumb nail ; brought it carefully to the fire , and laid it on the coals . [He]216-dr. mackenzie watched it melt , fizzle , and flare , with an intense concentration of interest ; then jumped round on [Jane]101-jane , and caught [her]101-jane look of fury .

" And [I]216-dr. mackenzie think there remains very little for [me]216-dr. mackenzie to say to [you]101-jane about the treatment , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray , "[216-dr. mackenzie] [he]216-dr. mackenzie finished calmly . " [You]101-jane will have received minute instructions from [Sir Deryck]107-deryck [himself]107-deryck . The great thing now is to help [the patient]3099-the patient to take an interest in [the outer world]3159-the outer world . The temptation to [persons who suddenly become totally blind]3160-persons who suddenly become totally blind , is to form a habit of living entirely in [a world within]3161-a world within ; a world of recollection , retrospection , and imagination ; [the only world]3162-the only world , in fact , in which [they]3160-persons who suddenly become totally blind can see . "[101-jane]

[Jane]101-jane made a quick movement of appreciation and interest . After all [she]101-jane might learn something useful from [this eccentric little Scotchman]1327-this eccentric little scotchman . Oh to keep [his]1327-this eccentric little scotchman attention off rubbish on the carpet , and grease spots on the table - cloth !

" Yes ? "[101-jane] [she]101-jane said . " Do tell [me]216-dr. mackenzie more . "[216-dr. mackenzie]

" This , "[216-dr. mackenzie] continued [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie , " is [our]3163-our present difficulty with [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth . There seems to be no possibility of arousing [his]1327-this eccentric little scotchman interest in [the outside world]3164-the outside world . [He]1327-this eccentric little scotchman refuses to receive [visitors]3165-visitors ; [he]1327-this eccentric little scotchman declines to hear [his]1327-this eccentric little scotchman letters . Hours pass without a word being spoken by [him]1327-this eccentric little scotchman . Unless [you]3166-you hear [him]1327-this eccentric little scotchman speak to [me]217-dr. rob or to [[his]1327-this eccentric little scotchman valet]3112-his valet , [you]3166-you will easily suppose [yourself]3166-you to have [a patient who has lost the power of speech as well as the gift of sight]3168-a patient who has lost the power of speech as well as the gift of sight . Should [he]1327-this eccentric little scotchman express a wish to speak to [me]217-dr. rob alone when [we]3163-our are with [him]1327-this eccentric little scotchman , do not leave [the room]424-the room . Walk over to the fireplace and remain there . [I]217-dr. rob desire that [you]3166-you should hear , that when [he]1327-this eccentric little scotchman chooses to rouse and make an effort , [he]1327-this eccentric little scotchman is perfectly well able to do so . The most important part of [your]3166-you duties , [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary , will be the aiding [him]1327-this eccentric little scotchman day by day to resume life , the life of [a blind man]3108-a blind man , it is true ; but not therefore necessarily an inactive life . Now that all danger of inflammation from the wounds has subsided , [he]1327-this eccentric little scotchman may get up , move about , learn to find [his]1327-this eccentric little scotchman way by sound and touch . [He]1327-this eccentric little scotchman was [an artist by profession]3171-an artist by profession . [He]1327-this eccentric little scotchman will never paint again . But there are other gifts which may form reasonable outlets to an artistic nature . "[217-dr. rob]

[He]1328-he paused suddenly , having apparently caught sight of another grease spot , and walked over to the table ; but the next instant jumped round on [Jane]101-jane , quick as lightning , with a question .

" Does [he]1327-this eccentric little scotchman play ? "[101-jane] said [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob .

But [Jane]101-jane was on [her]101-jane guard , even against accidental surprises .

" [Sir Deryck]107-deryck did not happen to mention to [me]1329-the little doctor , [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie , whether [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth is musical or not . "[1329-the little doctor]

" Ah , well , "[1329-the little doctor] said [the little doctor]1329-the little doctor , resuming [his]1329-the little doctor Napoleonic attitude in the centre of the hearth - rug ; " [you]101-jane must make it [your]101-jane business to find out . And , by the way , [Nurse]2339-nurse , do [you]101-jane play [yourself]101-jane ? "[101-jane]

" A little , "[217-dr. rob] said [Jane]101-jane .

" Ah , "[217-dr. rob] said [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob . " And [I]101-jane dare say [you]101-jane sing a little , too ? "[101-jane]

[Jane]101-jane acquiesced .

" In that case , [[my]101-jane dear lady]2348-my dear lady , [I]101-jane leave most explicit orders that [you]101-jane neither sing a little nor play a little to [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth . [We]3174-we , who have [our]3174-we sight , can just endure while [people who ' play a little ']3175-people who ' play a little ' show [us]3174-we how little [they]3175-people who ' play a little ' can play ; because [we]3174-we are able to look round about [us]3174-we and think of other things . But to [a blind man]3108-a blind man , with [an artist]2406-an artist 's sensitive soul , the experience might culminate in madness . [We]3174-we must not risk it . [I]101-jane regret to appear uncomplimentary , but [a patient]1164-a patient 's welfare must take precedence of all other considerations . "[101-jane]

[Jane]101-jane smiled . [She]101-jane was beginning to like [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob .

" [I]101-jane will be most careful , "[101-jane] [she]101-jane said , " neither to play nor to sing to [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth . "[216-dr. mackenzie]

" Good , "[216-dr. mackenzie] said [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie . " But now let [me]100-tommy tell [you]101-jane what [you]101-jane most certainly may do , by - and - by . Lead [him]111-garth to the piano . Place [him]111-garth there upon a seat where [he]111-garth will feel secure ; none of [your]101-jane twirly , rickety stools . Make a little notch on the key - board by which [he]111-garth can easily find middle C. Then let [him]111-garth relieve [his]111-garth pent - up soul by the painting of sound - pictures . [You]101-jane will find this will soon keep [him]111-garth happy for hours . And , if [he]111-garth is already something of [a musician]705-a musician , as that huge grand piano , with no knick - knacks on it indicates , [he]111-garth may begin that sort of thing at once , before [he]111-garth is ready to be worried with the Braille system , or any other method of instructing [the blind]3180-the blind . But contrive an easy way a little notch in the wood - work below the note by means of which , without hesitation or irritation , [he]111-garth can locate [himself]111-garth instantly at middle C. Never mind the other notes . It is all the SEEING [he]111-garth will require when once [he]111-garth is at the piano . Ha , ha ! Not bad for [a Scotchman]3101-a scotchman , eh , [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary ? "[100-tommy]

But [Jane]101-jane could not laugh ; though somewhere in [her]101-jane mental background [she]101-jane seemed to hear laughter and applause from [the duchess]304-the duchess . This was no comedy to [Jane]101-jane , [[her]101-jane blind Garth]1331-her blind garth at the piano , [his]1331-her blind garth dear beautiful head bent over the keys , [his]1331-her blind garth fingers feeling for that pathetic little notch , to be made by [herself]101-jane , below middle C. [She]101-jane loathed [this individual who could make a pun on the subject of [Garth]111-garth 's blindness]1332-this individual who could make a pun on the subject of garth 's blindness , and , in the back of [her]101-jane mind , [Tommy]100-tommy seemed to join [the duchess]304-the duchess , flapping up and down on [his]100-tommy perch and shrieking : " Kick [him]1331-her blind garth out ! Stop [his]1331-her blind garth jaw ! "[216-dr. mackenzie]

" And now , "[216-dr. mackenzie] said [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie unexpectedly , " the next thing to be done , [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary , is to introduce [you]101-jane to [the patient]3099-the patient . "[217-dr. rob]

[Jane]101-jane felt the blood slowly leave [her]101-jane face and concentrate in a terrible pounding at [her]101-jane heart . But [she]101-jane stood [her]101-jane ground , and waited silently .

[Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie rang the bell . [Simpson]230-simpson appeared .

" A decanter of sherry , a wine - glass , and a couple of biscuits , "[101-jane] said [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob .

[Simpson]230-simpson vanished .

" Little beast ! "[101-jane] thought [Jane]101-jane . " At eleven o'clock in the morning ! "[217-dr. rob] .

[Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob stood , and waited ; tugging spitefully at [his]217-dr. rob red moustache , and looking intently out of the window .

[Simpson]230-simpson reappeared , placed a small tray on the table , and went quietly out , closing the door behind [him]230-simpson .

[Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob poured out a glass of sherry , drew up a chair to the table , and said : " Now , [Nurse]2339-nurse , sit down and drink that , and take a biscuit with it . "[101-jane]

[Jane]101-jane protested . " But , indeed , [doctor]2904-doctor , [I]217-dr. rob never "[217-dr. rob]

" [I]217-dr. rob have no doubt [you]2339-nurse ' never , ' "[217-dr. rob] said [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob , " especially at eleven o'clock in the morning . But [you]2339-nurse will to - day ; so do not waste any time in discussion . [You]2339-nurse have had a long night journey ; [you]2339-nurse are going [upstairs]2412-upstairs to a very sad sight indeed , a strain on the nerves and sensibilities . [You]2339-nurse have come through a trying interview with [me]1335-he , and [you]2339-nurse are praising [Heaven]234-heaven it is over . But [you]2339-nurse will praise [Heaven]234-heaven with more fervency when [you]2339-nurse have drunk the sherry . Also [you]2339-nurse have been standing during twenty - three minutes and a half . [I]1335-he always stand to speak [myself]1335-he , and [I]1335-he prefer [folk]3186-folk should stand to listen . [I]1335-he can never talk to [people]533-people while [they]533-people loll around . But [you]2339-nurse will walk [upstairs]2412-upstairs all the more steadily , [Nurse Rosemary Gray]228-nurse rosemary , if [you]2339-nurse sit down now for five minutes at this table . "[1335-he]

[Jane]101-jane obeyed , touched and humbled . So , after all , it was a kind , comprehending heart under that old sealskin waistcoat ; and a shrewd understanding of [men]657-men and matters , in spite of the erratic , somewhat objectionable exterior . While [she]101-jane drank the wine and finished the biscuits , [he]1335-he found busy occupation on the other side of [the room]424-the room , polishing the window with [his]1335-he silk pocket - handkerchief ; making a queer humming noise all the time , like a bee buzzing up the pane . [He]1335-he seemed to have forgotten [her]101-jane presence ; but , just as [she]101-jane put down the empty glass , [he]1335-he turned and , walking straight across [the room]424-the room , laid [his]1335-he hand upon [her]101-jane shoulder .

" Now , [Nurse]2339-nurse , "[1335-he] [he]1335-he said , " follow [me]1335-he [upstairs]2412-upstairs , and , just at first , speak as little as possible . Remember , every fresh voice intruding into the still depths of that utter blackness , causes an agony of bewilderment and disquietude to [the patient]3099-the patient . Speak little and speak low , and may [God Almighty]145-god give [you]2339-nurse tact and wisdom . "[1335-he]

There was a dignity of conscious knowledge and power in the small quaint figure which preceded [Jane]101-jane up the staircase . As [she]101-jane followed , [she]101-jane became aware that [her]101-jane spirit leaned on [his]1335-he and felt sustained and strengthened . The unexpected conclusion of [his]1335-he sentence , old - fashioned in its wording , yet almost a prayer , gave [her]101-jane fresh courage . " May [God Almighty]145-god give [you]101-jane tact and wisdom , "[101-jane] [he]1335-he had said , little guessing how greatly [she]101-jane needed them . And now another voice , echoing through memory 's arches to organ - music , took up the strain : " Where [Thou]111-garth art [Guide]190-guide , no ill can come . "[107-deryck] And with firm though noiseless step , [Jane]101-jane followed [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie into the roam where [Garth]111-garth was lying , helpless , sightless , and disfigured .

CHAPTER XIX

THE VOICE IN THE DARKNESS

Just the dark head upon the pillow . That was all [Jane]101-jane saw at first , and [she]101-jane saw it in sunshine . Somehow [she]101-jane had always pictured [a darkened room]1338-a darkened room , forgetting that to [him]1335-he darkness and light were both alike , and that there was no need to keep out the sunlight , with its healing , purifying , invigorating powers .

[He]1335-he had requested to have [his]1335-he bed moved into a corner the corner farthest from door , fireplace , and windows with [its]1339-its left side against the wall , so that [he]1335-he could feel the blank wall with [his]1335-he hand and , turning close to it , know [himself]1335-he shut away from all possible prying of unseen eyes . This was how [he]1335-he now lay , and [he]1335-he did not turn as [they]1340-they entered .

Just the dear dark head upon the pillow . It was all [Jane]101-jane saw at first . Then [his]1335-he right arm in the sleeve of a blue silk sleeping - suit , stretched slightly behind [him]1335-he as [he]1335-he lay on [his]1335-he left side , the thin white hand limp and helpless on the coverlet .

[Jane]101-jane put [her]101-jane hands behind [her]101-jane . The impulse was so strong to fall on [her]101-jane knees beside the bed , take that poor hand in both [her]101-jane strong ones , and cover it with kisses . Ah surely , surely then , [the dark head]1341-the dark head would turn to [her]101-jane , and instead of seeking refuge in the hard , blank wall , [he]1335-he would hide that sightless face in the boundless tenderness of [her]101-jane arms . But [Deryck]107-deryck 's warning voice sounded , grave and persistent : " If [you]101-jane value [your]101-jane own eventual happiness and [his]1335-he "[216-dr. mackenzie] So [Jane]101-jane put [her]101-jane hands behind [her]101-jane back .

[Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie advanced to the side of the bed and laid [his]216-dr. mackenzie hand upon [Garth]111-garth 's shoulder . Then , with an incredible softening of [his]216-dr. mackenzie rather strident voice , [he]216-dr. mackenzie spoke so slowly and quietly , that [Jane]101-jane could hardly believe this to be [the man who had jerked out questions , comments , and orders]1342-the man who had jerked out questions , comments , and orders to [her]101-jane , during the last half - hour .

" Good morning , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth . [Simpson]230-simpson tells [me]101-jane it has been an excellent night , the best [you]101-jane have yet had . Now that is good . No doubt [you]101-jane were relieved to be rid of [Johnson]235-johnson , capable though [he]235-johnson was , and to be back in the hands of [[your]101-jane own man]3192-your own man again . [These trained attendants]3193-these trained attendants are never content with doing enough ; [they]3193-these trained attendants always want to do just a little more , and that little more is a weariness to [the patient]3099-the patient . Now [I]101-jane have brought [you]101-jane to - day one who is prepared to do all [you]101-jane need , and yet who , [I]101-jane feel sure , will never annoy [you]101-jane by attempting more than [you]101-jane desire . [Sir Deryck Brand]107-deryck 's prescription , [Nurse Rosemary Gray]228-nurse rosemary , is here ; and [I]101-jane believe [she]228-nurse rosemary is prepared to be [companion]3195-companion , [secretary]3196-secretary , [reader]3197-reader , anything [you]101-jane want , in fact a new pair of eyes for [you]101-jane , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , with a clever brain behind [them]3198-them , and a kind , sympathetic , womanly heart directing and controlling that brain . [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary arrived this morning , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth . "[101-jane]

No response from the bed . But [Garth]111-garth 's hand groped for the wall ; touched it , then dropped listlessly back .

[Jane]101-jane could not realise that [SHE]101-jane was " [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary . "[216-dr. mackenzie] [She]101-jane only longed that [[her]101-jane poor boy]1343-her poor boy need not be bothered with [the woman]400-the woman ! It all seemed , at this moment , a thing apart from [herself]101-jane and [him]1343-her poor boy .

[Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie spoke again . " [Nurse Rosemary Gray]228-nurse rosemary is in [the room]424-the room , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth . "[1343-her poor boy]

Then [Garth]111-garth 's instinctive chivalry struggled up through the blackness . [He]1343-her poor boy did not turn [his]1343-her poor boy head , but [his]1343-her poor boy right hand made a little courteous sign of greeting , and [he]1343-her poor boy said in a low , distinct voice : " How do [you]101-jane do ? [I]217-dr. rob am sure it is most kind of [you]101-jane to come so far . [I]217-dr. rob hope [you]101-jane had an easy journey . "[217-dr. rob]

[Jane]101-jane 's lips moved , but no sound would pass them .

[Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob made answer quickly , without looking at [her]101-jane : " [Miss Gray]233-miss gray had a very good journey , and looks as fresh this morning as if [she]233-miss gray had spent the night in bed . [I]1345-the tired voice can see [she]233-miss gray is [a cold - water young lady]3200-a cold - water young lady . "[1345-the tired voice]

" [I]217-dr. rob hope [[my]217-dr. rob housekeeper]2340-my housekeeper will make [her]233-miss gray comfortable . Please give orders , "[217-dr. rob] said [the tired voice]1345-the tired voice ; and [Garth]111-garth turned even closer to the wall , as if to end the conversation .

[Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob attacked [his]217-dr. rob moustache , and stood looking down at the blue silk shoulder for a minute , silently .

Then [he]217-dr. rob turned and spoke to [Jane]101-jane . " Come over to the window , [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary . [I]101-jane want to show [you]101-jane a special chair [we]3202-we have obtained for [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , in which [he]111-garth will be most comfortable as soon as [he]111-garth feels inclined to sit up . [You]101-jane see ? Here is an adjustable support for the head , if necessary ; and these various trays and stands and movable tables can be swung round into any position by a touch . [I]101-jane consider it excellent , and [Sir Deryck]107-deryck approved it . Have [you]101-jane seen one of this kind before , [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary ? "[101-jane]

" [We]3202-we had one at [the hospital]3203-the hospital , but not quite so complete as this , "[111-garth] said [Jane]101-jane .

In the stillness of [that sunlit chamber]1346-that sunlit chamber , the voice from the bed broke upon [them]1347-them with startling suddenness ; and in it was the cry of [one lost in an abyss of darkness]1348-one lost in an abyss of darkness , but appealing to [them]1347-them with a frantic demand for instant enlightenment .

" WHO is in [the room]424-the room ? "[216-dr. mackenzie] cried [Garth Dalmain]111-garth .

[His]111-garth face was still turned to the wall ; but [he]111-garth had raised [himself]111-garth on [his]111-garth left elbow , in an attitude which betokened intent listening .

[Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie answered . " [No one]2059-no one is in [the room]424-the room , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , but [myself]111-garth and [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary . "[111-garth]

" There IS some one else in [the room]424-the room ! "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth violently . " How dare [you]101-jane lie to [me]101-jane ! Who was speaking ? "[101-jane]

Then [Jane]101-jane came quickly to the side of the bed . [Her]101-jane hands were trembling , but [her]101-jane voice was perfectly under control .

" It was [I]101-jane who spoke , [sir]3118-sir , "[101-jane] [she]101-jane said ; " [Nurse Rosemary Gray]228-nurse rosemary . And [I]111-garth feel sure [I]111-garth know why [my]111-garth voice startled [you]3118-sir . [Dr. Brand]223-dr. brand warned [me]111-garth it might do so . [He]223-dr. brand said [I]111-garth must not be surprised if [you]3118-sir detected a remarkable similarity between [my]111-garth voice and that of [a mutual friend of [yours]3118-sir and [his]223-dr. brand]3209-a mutual friend of yours and his . [He]223-dr. brand said [he]223-dr. brand had often noticed it . "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth , in [his]111-garth blindness , remained quite still ; listening and considering . At length [he]111-garth asked slowly : " Did [he]111-garth say whose voice ? "[111-garth]

" Yes , for [I]111-garth asked [him]111-garth . [He]111-garth said it was [Miss Champion]118-miss champion 's . "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth 's head dropped back upon the pillow . Then without turning [he]111-garth said in a tone which [Jane]101-jane knew meant a smile on that dear hidden face : " [You]3118-sir must forgive [me]216-dr. mackenzie , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray , for being so startled and so stupidly , unpardonably agitated . But , [you]3118-sir know , being blind is still such a new experience , and every fresh voice which breaks through the black curtain of perpetual night , means so infinitely more than [the speaker]3210-the speaker realises . The resemblance in [your]3118-sir voice to that of [the lady [Sir Deryck]107-deryck mentioned]3211-the lady sir deryck mentioned is so remarkable that , although [I]216-dr. mackenzie know [her]3211-the lady sir deryck mentioned to be at this moment in [Egypt]9-egypt , [I]216-dr. mackenzie could scarcely believe [she]3211-the lady sir deryck mentioned was not in [the room]424-the room . And yet the most unlikely thing in [the world]2266-the world would be that [she]3211-the lady sir deryck mentioned should have been in [this room]3214-this room . So [I]216-dr. mackenzie owe [you]3118-sir and [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie most humble apologies for [my]216-dr. mackenzie agitation and unbelief . "[216-dr. mackenzie]

[He]1349-he stretched out [his]1349-he right hand , palm upwards , towards [Jane]101-jane .

[Jane]101-jane clasped [her]101-jane shaking hands behind [her]101-jane .

" Now , [Nurse]2339-nurse , if [you]3118-sir please , "[216-dr. mackenzie] broke in [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie 's rasping voice from the window , " [I]217-dr. rob have a few more details to explain to [you]3118-sir over here . "[217-dr. rob]

" Oh , come in , [Simpson]230-simpson come in , [[my]217-dr. rob good fellow]2820-my good fellow and shut that door ! A quarter of an hour later , [Jane]101-jane watched [him]217-dr. rob drive away , thinking to [herself]101-jane : " [Deryck]107-deryck was right . But what a queer mixture of shrewdness and obtuseness , and how marvellously it worked out to the furtherance of [our]3311-our plans . "[217-dr. rob]

But as [she]101-jane watched [the dog - cart]1363-the dog - cart start off at a smart trot across [the moor]2359-the moor , [she]101-jane would have been more than a little surprised could [she]101-jane have overheard [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob 's muttered remarks to [himself]217-dr. rob , as [he]217-dr. rob gathered up the reins and cheered on [his]217-dr. rob sturdy cob . [He]217-dr. rob had a habit of talking over [his]217-dr. rob experiences , half aloud , as [he]217-dr. rob drove from case to case ; the two sides of [his]217-dr. rob rather complex nature apparently comparing notes with each other . And the present conversation opened thus :

" Now what has brought [the Honourable Jane]101-jane up [here]2151-here ? "[216-dr. mackenzie] said [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob .

" Dashed if [I]217-dr. rob know , "[217-dr. rob] said [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie .

" [You]2068-my dear must not swear , [laddie]3255-laddie , "[217-dr. rob] said [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob ; " [you]2068-my dear had [a pious mother]3254-a pious mother . "[0-i]

[CHAPTER XX

JANE]240-chapter xx jane REPORTS PROGRESS

Letter from [the Honourable Jane Champion]101-jane to [Sir Deryck Brand]107-deryck .

[Castle Gleneesh]12-castle gleneesh , N. B.

[[My]0-i dear]2068-my dear [Deryck]107-deryck : [My]0-i wires and post - cards have not told [you]107-deryck much beyond the fact of [my]0-i safe arrival . Having been here a fortnight , [I]0-i think it is time [I]0-i sent [you]107-deryck a report . Only [you]107-deryck must remember that [I]0-i am [a poor scribe]1366-a poor scribe . From infancy it has always been difficult to [me]0-i to write anything beyond that stock commencement : " [I]3099-the patient hope [you]107-deryck are quite well ; "[3099-the patient] and [I]0-i approach the task of a descriptive letter with an effort which is colossal . And yet [I]0-i wish [I]0-i might , for once , borrow the pen of [a ready writer]1367-a ready writer ; because [I]0-i can not help knowing that [I]0-i have been passing through experiences such as do not often fall to the lot of [a woman]403-a woman .

[Nurse Rosemary Gray]228-nurse rosemary is getting on capitally . [She]228-nurse rosemary is making [herself]228-nurse rosemary indispensable to [the patient]3099-the patient , and [he]3099-the patient turns to [her]228-nurse rosemary with a completeness of confidence which causes [her]228-nurse rosemary heart to swell with professional pride .

[Poor Jane]101-jane has got no further than hearing , from [his]3099-the patient own lips , that [she]228-nurse rosemary is [the very last person in [the whole world]3241-the whole world [he]3099-the patient would wish should come near [him]3099-the patient in [his]3099-the patient blindness]1370-the very last person in the whole world he would wish should come near him in his blindness . When [she]228-nurse rosemary was suggested as [a possible visitor]1372-a possible visitor , [he]3099-the patient said : " Oh , [[my]1373-a careful and thoughtful judge God]2282-my god , NO ! "[1373-a careful and thoughtful judge] and [his]3099-the patient face was one wild , horrified protest . So [Jane]101-jane is getting [her]101-jane horsewhipping , [Boy]218-boy , and according to the method of [a careful and thoughtful judge]1373-a careful and thoughtful judge , who orders thirty lashes of the " cat , "[69-migdol] in three applications of ten so is [Jane]101-jane 's punishment laid on at intervals ; not more than [she]101-jane can bear at a time ; but enough to keep [her]101-jane heart continually sore , and [her]101-jane spirit in perpetual dread . And [you]1374-you , [dear , clever doctor]1375-dear , clever doctor , are proved perfectly right in [your]1374-you diagnosis of the sentiment of the case . [He]3099-the patient says [her]101-jane pity would be the last straw on [his]3099-the patient already heavy cross ; and the expression is an apt one , [her]101-jane pity for [him]3099-the patient being indeed a thing of straw . The only pity [she]101-jane feels is pity for [herself]101-jane , thus hopelessly caught in the meshes of [her]101-jane own mistake . But how to make [him]3099-the patient realise this , is the puzzle .

Do [you]1374-you remember how [the Israelites]1376-the israelites were shut in , between [Migdol]69-migdol and [the sea]1088-the sea ? [I]0-i knew [Migdol]69-migdol meant " [towers]3316-towers , "[147-margery] but [I]0-i never understood [the passage]1378-the passage , until [I]0-i stood upon [that narrow wedge of desert]1379-that narrow wedge of desert , with [the Red Sea]70-the red sea in front and on the left ; [the rocky range of Gebel Attaka on the right]1380-the rocky range of gebel attaka on the right , towering up against the sky , like the weird shapes of [an impregnable fortress]1381-an impregnable fortress ; [the sole outlet or inlet behind]1382-the sole outlet or inlet behind , being the route [they]1383-they had just travelled from [Egypt]9-egypt , and along which [the chariots and horsemen of [Pharaoh]243-pharaoh]1384-the chariots and horsemen of pharaoh were then thundering in hot pursuit . Even so , [Boy]218-boy , is poor [Jane]101-jane now tramping [[her]101-jane patch of [desert]1386-desert]1385-her patch of desert , which narrows daily to the measure of [her]101-jane despair . [Migdol]69-migdol is [HIS]1387-he certainty that [HER]101-jane love could only be pity . [The Red Sea]70-the red sea is the confession into which [she]101-jane must inevitably plunge , to avoid scaling [Migdol]69-migdol ; in the chill waters of which , as [she]101-jane drags [him]1387-he in with [her]101-jane , [his]1387-he love is bound to drown , as waves of doubt and mistrust sweep over its head , doubts which [he]1387-he has lost the power of removing ; mistrust which [he]1387-he can never hope to prove to have been false and mistaken . And behind come galloping [the hosts of [Pharaoh]243-pharaoh]1388-the hosts of pharaoh ; chance , speeding on the wheels of circumstance . At any moment some accident may compel a revelation ; and instantly [HE]1387-he will be scaling [rocky Migdol]69-migdol , with torn hands and bleeding feet ; and [she]101-jane poor [Jane]101-jane floundering in [the depths of [the Red Sea]70-the red sea]1389-the depths of the red sea . O for a [Moses]202-moses , with divine commission , to stretch out the rod of understanding love , making a safe way through ; so that together [they]1390-they might reach [the Promised Land]1391-the promised land ! [Dear wise old Boy]218-boy , dare [you]218-boy undertake the role of [Moses]202-moses !

But here am [I]0-i writing like a page of [Baedeker]244-baedeker , and failing to report on actual facts .

As [you]218-boy may suppose , [Jane]101-jane grows haggard and thin in spite of [old Margery]147-margery 's porridge which is " put on "[3317-anybody passing "] every day after lunch , for the next morning 's breakfast , and [anybody passing "]3317-anybody passing " gives it a stir . "[147-margery] Did [you]218-boy know that was the right way to make porridge , [Deryck]107-deryck ? [I]0-i always thought it was made in five minutes , as wanted . [Margery]147-margery says that must be the English stuff which profanely goes by the name . N.B. Please mark the self - control with which [I]0-i repeat Scotch remarks , without rushing into weird spelling ; a senseless performance , it seems to [me]0-i . For if [you]218-boy know already how old [Margery]147-margery pronounces " porridge , "[147-margery] [you]218-boy can read [her]147-margery pronunciation into the sentence ; and if [you]218-boy do not know it , no grotesque spelling on [my]0-i part could convey to [your]218-boy mind any but a caricatured version of the pretty Scotch accent with which [Margery]147-margery says : " Stir the porridge , [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary . "[1392-the natives] In fact , [I]0-i am agreeably surprised at the ease with which [I]0-i understand [the natives]1392-the natives , and the pleasure [I]0-i derive from [their]1392-the natives conversation ; for , after wrestling with one or two modern novels dealing with [the Highlands]72-the highlands , [I]0-i had expected to find the language an unknown tongue . Instead of which , lo ! and behold , [old Margery]147-margery , [Maggie]147-margery [the housemaid]1393-the housemaid , [Macdonald]245-macdonald [the gardener]1394-the gardener , and [Macalister]246-macalister [the game - keeper]1395-the game - keeper , all speak a rather purer English than [I]0-i do ; far more carefully pronounced , and with every R sounded and rolled . [Their]1392-the natives idioms are more characteristic than [their]1392-the natives accent . [They]1392-the natives say " whenever "[1392-the natives] for " when , "[230-simpson] and use in [their]1392-the natives verbs several quaint variations of tense .

But what a syntactical digression ! Oh , [Boy]2714-boy , the wound at [my]0-i heart is so deep and so sore that [I]0-i dread the dressings , even by [your]2714-boy delicate touch . Where was [I]0-i ? Ah , the porridge gave [me]0-i [my]0-i loophole of escape . Well , as [I]0-i was saying , [Jane]101-jane grows worn and thin , [old Margery]147-margery 's porridge notwithstanding ; but [Nurse Rosemary Gray]228-nurse rosemary is flourishing , and remains [a pretty , dainty little thing , with the additional charm of fluffy , fly]1397-a pretty , dainty little thing , with the additional charm of fluffy , fly - away floss - silk , for hair , [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob 's own unaided contribution to the fascinating picture . By the way , [I]0-i was quite unprepared to find [him]217-dr. rob such a character . [I]0-i learn much from [Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie , and [I]0-i love [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob , excepting on those occasions when [I]0-i long to pick [him]217-dr. rob up by the scruff of [his]217-dr. rob fawn overcoat and drop [him]217-dr. rob out of the window .

On the point of [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary 's personal appearance , [I]0-i found it best to be perfectly frank with [the household]419-the household . [You]1399-you can have no conception how often awkward moments arose ; as , for instance , in [the library]3143-the library , the first time [Garth]111-garth came [downstairs]3217-downstairs ; when [he]111-garth ordered [Simpson]230-simpson to bring the steps for [Miss Gray]233-miss gray , and [Simpson]230-simpson opened [his]230-simpson lips to remark that [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary could reach to the top shelf on [her]228-nurse rosemary own tiptoes with the greatest ease , [he]230-simpson having just seen [her]228-nurse rosemary do it . Mercifully , the perfect training of [an English man - servant]1402-an english man - servant saved the situation , and [he]230-simpson merely said : " Yessir ; certainly [sir]3118-sir , "[230-simpson] and looked upon , [me]0-i , standing silently by , as [a person who evidently delighted in giving unnecessary trouble]1403-a person who evidently delighted in giving unnecessary trouble . Had it been [dear old [Margery]247-margery with [her]247-margery Scotch tongue , which starts slowly , but gathers momentum as it rolls , and can never be arrested until the full flood of [her]247-margery thought]247-margery has been poured forth , [I]0-i should have been constrained to pick [her]247-margery up bodily in [my]0-i dainty arms and carry [her]247-margery out .

So [I]0-i sent for [Simpson]230-simpson and [Margery]247-margery to [the dining - room]1048-the dining - room that evening , when [the master]1405-the master was safely out of ear - shot , and told [them]1406-them that , for reasons which [I]0-i could not fully explain , a very incorrect description of [my]0-i appearance had been given [him]1405-the master . [He]1405-the master thought [me]0-i small and slim ; fair and very pretty ; and it was most important , in order to avoid long explanations and mental confusion for [him]1405-the master , that [he]1405-the master should not at present be undeceived . [Simpson]230-simpson 's expression of polite attention did not vary , and [his]230-simpson only comment was : " Certainly , [miss]2048-miss . Quite so . "[247-margery] But across [old Margery]247-margery 's countenance , while [I]0-i was speaking , passed many shades of opinion , which , fortunately , by the time [I]0-i had finished , crystallized into an approving smile of acquiescence . [She]247-margery even added [her]247-margery own commentary : " And a very good thing , too , [I]1407-i am thinking . For [Master Garth]111-garth , [poor laddie]3246-poor laddie , was always so set upon having beauty about [him]111-garth . ' So it is just as well to keep [him]148-master garthie deceived , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray . "[1407-i] And then , as [Simpson]230-simpson coughed tactfully behind [his]230-simpson hand , and nudged [her]1407-i very obviously with [his]230-simpson elbow , [she]1407-i added , as a sympathetic after - thought : " For , though a homey face may indeed be redeemed by its kindly expression , [you]1408-you can not very well explain expression to [the blind]3180-the blind . "[228-nurse rosemary] So [you]1408-you see , [Deryck]107-deryck , [this shrewd old body , who has known [Garth]111-garth from boyhood]1409-this shrewd old body , who has known garth from boyhood , would have entirely agreed with the decision of three years ago .

Well , to continue [my]0-i report . Only , sometimes [I]0-i see [him]111-garth listening and remembering .

But [Nurse Rosemary Gray]228-nurse rosemary has beautiful hours when poor anxious , [yearning Jane]101-jane is shut out . For [[her]228-nurse rosemary patient]3249-her patient turns to [her]228-nurse rosemary , and depends on [her]228-nurse rosemary , and talks to [her]228-nurse rosemary , and tries to reach [her]228-nurse rosemary mind , and shows [her]228-nurse rosemary [his]3249-her patient , and is [a wonderful person to live with and know]1413-a wonderful person to live with and know . "[0-i] [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , sitting beside [him]3249-her patient during long sweet hours of companionship , is learning it ; and [Jane]101-jane , ramping up and down [[her]101-jane narrowing strip of desert]1415-her narrowing strip of desert , tastes [the sirocco of despair]1416-the sirocco of despair .

And now [I]0-i come to the point of [my]0-i letter , and , though [I]0-i am [a woman]403-a woman , [I]0-i will not put it in a postscript .

[[My]0-i dear]2068-my dear [Jeanette]205-jeanette : Certainly [I]0-i will come . [I]0-i will leave [Euston]66-euston on Friday evening . [I]0-i can spend the whole of Saturday and most of Sunday at [Gleneesh]13-gleneesh , but must be [home]381-home in time for Monday 's work .

[I]0-i will do [my]0-i best , only , alas ! [I]0-i am not [Moses]202-moses , and do not possess [his]202-moses wonder - working rod . Moreover , latest investigations have proved that [the Israelites]249-the israelites could not have crossed at the place [you]2068-my dear mention , but further north at [the Bitter Lakes]74-the bitter lakes ; a mere matter of detail , in no way affecting the extreme appositeness of [your]2068-my dear illustration , rather , adding to it ; for [I]0-i fear there are bitter waters ahead of [you]2068-my dear , [[my]0-i poor girl]1424-my poor girl .

Still [I]0-i am hopeful , nay , more than hopeful , confident . Often of late , in connection with [you]2068-my dear , [I]0-i have thought of the promise about all things working together for good . [Any one]411-any one can make GOOD things work together for good : but only [the Heavenly Father]1111-the heavenly father can bring good out of evil ; and , taking all [our]1427-our mistakes and failings and foolishnesses , cause them to work to [our]1427-our most perfect well - being . The more intricate and involved this problem of human existence becomes , the greater the need to take as [our]1427-our own clear rule of life : " Trust in [the Lord]3130-the lord with all thine heart ; and lean not unto [thine]3326-thy own understanding . In all [thy]3326-thy ways acknowledge [Him]3130-the lord , and [He]3130-the lord shall direct [thy]3326-thy paths . "[228-nurse rosemary] Ancient marching orders , and simple ; but true , and therefore eternal .

[I]0-i am glad [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary is proving so efficient , but [I]0-i hope [we]1427-our may not have to face yet another complication in [our]1427-our problem . Suppose [[our]1427-our patient]3057-our patient falls in love with [dainty little Nurse [Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary]1429-dainty little nurse rosemary , where will [Jane]101-jane be then ? [I]0-i fear [the desert]1026-the desert would have to open its mouth and swallow [her]101-jane up . [We]1427-our must avert such a catastrophe . Could not [Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary be induced to drop an occasional H , or to confess [herself]228-nurse rosemary as rather " gone "[111-garth] on [Simpson]230-simpson ?

Oh , [[my]0-i poor old girl]3043-my poor old girl ! [I]0-i could not jest thus , were [I]0-i not coming shortly to [your]3043-my poor old girl aid .

How maddening it is ! And [you]3043-my poor old girl so priceless ! But [most men]1432-most men are either [fools]1433-fools or blind , and [one]474-one is both . Trust [me]0-i to prove it to [him]1435-him , to [my]0-i own satisfaction and [his]1435-him , if [I]0-i get the chance .

[Yours]1436-yours always devotedly , [Deryck Brand]107-deryck .

CHAPTER XXI

HARD ON [THE SECRETARY

Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary sat with [[her]228-nurse rosemary patient]3249-her patient in [the sunny library at [Gleneesh]13-gleneesh]1448-the sunny library at gleneesh . A small table was between [them]1449-them , upon which lay a pile of letters [his]3249-her patient morning mail ready for [her]228-nurse rosemary to open , read to [him]3249-her patient , and pass across , should there chance to be one among [them]1449-them [he]3249-her patient wished to touch or to keep in [his]3249-her patient pocket .

[They]1449-them were seated close to the French window opening on to [the terrace]312-the terrace ; the breeze , fragrant with the breath of spring flowers , blew about them , and the morning sun streamed in .

[Garth]111-garth , in white flannels , wearing a green tie and a button - hole of primroses , lay back luxuriously , enjoying , with [his]111-garth rapidly quickening senses , the scent of the flowers and the touch of the sun - beams .

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary finished reading a letter of [her]228-nurse rosemary own , folded it , and put it in [her]228-nurse rosemary pocket with a feeling of thankful relief . [Deryck]250-deryck was coming . [He]250-deryck had not failed [her]228-nurse rosemary .

" [A man]575-a man 's letter , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray , "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Garth]111-garth unexpectedly .

" Quite right , "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary . " How did [you]3249-her patient know ? "[228-nurse rosemary]

" Because it was on one sheet . [A woman]403-a woman 's letter on a matter of great importance would have run to two , if not three . And that letter was on a matter of importance . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" Right again , "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , smiling . " And again , how did [you]3249-her patient know ? "[228-nurse rosemary]

" Because [you]3249-her patient gave a little sigh of relief after reading the first line , and another , as [you]3249-her patient folded it and replaced it in the envelope . "[228-nurse rosemary]

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary laughed . " [You]3249-her patient are getting on so fast , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , that soon [we]3329-we shall be able to keep no secrets . [My]111-garth letter was from "[111-garth]

" Oh , do n't tell [me]111-garth , "[111-garth] cried [Garth]111-garth quickly , putting out [his]111-garth hand in protest . " [I]228-nurse rosemary had no idea of seeming curious as to [your]233-miss gray private correspondence , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray . Only it is such a pleasure to report progress to [you]233-miss gray in the things [I]228-nurse rosemary manage to find out without being told . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" But [I]228-nurse rosemary meant to tell [you]111-garth anyway , "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary . " The letter is from [Sir Deryck]250-deryck , and , amongst other things , [he]250-deryck says [he]250-deryck is coming up to see [you]233-miss gray next Saturday . "[111-garth]

" Ah , good ! "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth . " And what a change [he]250-deryck will find ! And [I]111-garth shall have the pleasure of reporting on [the nurse]1285-the nurse , [secretary]3196-secretary , [reader]3197-reader , and unspeakably patient guide and companion [he]250-deryck provided for [me]111-garth . "[111-garth] Then [he]111-garth added , in a tone of suddenly awakened anxiety : " [He]250-deryck is not coming to take [you]233-miss gray away , is [he]250-deryck ? "[228-nurse rosemary]

" No , "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , " not yet . But , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , [I]111-garth was wanting to ask whether [you]111-garth could spare [me]111-garth just during forty - eight hours ; and [Dr. Brand]223-dr. brand 's visit would be an excellent opportunity . [I]111-garth could leave [you]111-garth more easily , knowing [you]111-garth would have [his]250-deryck companionship . If [I]111-garth may take the week - end , leaving on Friday night , [I]111-garth could return early on Monday morning , and be with [you]111-garth in time to do the morning letters . [Dr. Brand]223-dr. brand would read [you]111-garth Saturday 's and Sunday 's Ah , [I]111-garth forgot ; there is no Sunday post . So [I]111-garth should miss but one ; and [he]250-deryck would more than take [my]111-garth place in other ways . "[111-garth]

" Very well , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth , striving not to show disappointment . " [I]228-nurse rosemary should have liked that [we]3333-we three should have talked together . But no wonder [you]111-garth want a time off . Shall [you]111-garth be going far ? "[228-nurse rosemary]

" No ; [I]111-garth have [friends near by]3334-friends near by . And now , do [you]111-garth wish to attend to [your]111-garth letters ? "[111-garth]

" Yes , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth , reaching out [his]111-garth hand . " Wait a minute . There is a newspaper among them . [I]111-garth smell the printing ink . [I]111-garth do n't want that . But kindly give [me]111-garth the rest . "[111-garth]

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary took out the newspaper ; then pushed the pile along , until it touched [his]111-garth hand .

[Garth]111-garth took them . " What a lot ! "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , smiling in pleasurable anticipation . " [I]111-garth say , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray , if [you]233-miss gray profit as [you]233-miss gray ought to do by the reading of so many epistles written in every possible and impossible style , [you]233-miss gray ought to be able to bring out a pretty comprehensive ' Complete Letter - writer . ' Do [you]233-miss gray remember the condolences of [Mrs. Parker - Bangs]124-mrs. parker bangs ? [I]111-garth think that was the first time [we]3335-we really laughed together . [Kind old soul]3336-kind old soul ! But [she]124-mrs. parker bangs should not have mentioned [blind Bartimaeus]252-blind bartimaeus dipping seven times in [the pool of [Siloam]75-siloam]3337-the pool of siloam . It is always best to avoid classical allusions , especially if sacred , unless one has them accurately . Now "[111-garth] [Garth]111-garth paused .

[He]111-garth had been handling [his]111-garth letters , one by one ; carefully fingering each , before laying it on the table beside [him]111-garth . [He]111-garth had just come to one written on foreign paper , and sealed . [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary watched [him]111-garth anxiously . [He]111-garth made no remark , but after a moment laid it down and took up the next . But when [he]111-garth passed the pile across to [her]228-nurse rosemary , [he]111-garth slipped the sealed letter beneath the rest , so that [she]228-nurse rosemary should come to it last of all .

Then the usual order of proceedings commenced . [Garth]111-garth lighted a cigarette one of the first things [he]111-garth had learned to do for [himself]111-garth and smoked contentedly , carefully placing [his]111-garth ash - tray , and almost unfailingly locating the ash , in time and correctly .

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary took up the first letter , read the postmark , and described the writing on the envelope . [Garth]111-garth guessed from whom it came , and was immensely pleased if , on opening , [his]111-garth surmise proved correct . There were nine to - day , of varying interest , some from [men friends]459-men friends , one or two from [charming women who professed [themselves]1452-charming women who professed themselves ready to come and see him as soon as he wished for visitors ready to come and see [him]111-garth as soon as [he]111-garth wished for [visitors]3165-visitors]1452-charming women who professed themselves ready to come and see him as soon as he wished for visitors , [one from [a blind asylum]1455-a blind asylum asking for a subscription , a short note from [the doctor]940-the doctor heralding [his]111-garth visit , and a bill for ties from [a Bond Street shop]1457-a bond street shop]1454-one from a blind asylum asking for a subscription , a short note from the doctor heralding his visit , and a bill for ties from a bond street shop .

" Did [I]228-nurse rosemary shoot straight , [nurse]2339-nurse ? "[228-nurse rosemary] [he]111-garth asked .

[She]228-nurse rosemary leaned forward and saw the tiny column of blue smoke rising from the gravel .

" And the writing ? "[111-garth] asked [Garth]111-garth , mechanically and very quietly .

" The handwriting is rather bold and very clear , with no twirls or flourishes . It is written with a broad nib . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" Will [you]2339-nurse kindly open it , [nurse]2339-nurse , and tell [me]228-nurse rosemary the signature before reading the rest of the letter . "[228-nurse rosemary]

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary fought with [her]228-nurse rosemary throat , which threatened to close altogether and stifle [her]228-nurse rosemary voice . [She]228-nurse rosemary opened the letter , turned to the last page , and found the signature .

" It is signed ' [Jane Champion]101-jane , ' [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , "[111-garth] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary .

" Read it , please , "[116-dal] said [Garth]111-garth quietly . And [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary began .

[Dear Dal]116-dal : What CAN [I]0-i write ? If [I]0-i were with [you]116-dal , there would be so much [I]0-i could say ; but writing is so difficult , so impossible .

[I]0-i know it is harder for [you]116-dal than it would have been for [any of [us]1459-us]2868-any of us ; but [you]116-dal will be braver over it than [we]1459-us should have been , and [you]116-dal will come through splendidly , and go on thinking life beautiful , and making it seem so to [other people]341-other people . [I]0-i never thought it so until that summer at [Overdene]1-overdene and [Shenstone]16-shenstone when [you]116-dal taught [me]0-i the perception of beauty . Since then , in every sunset and sunrise , in the blue - green of [the Atlantic]76-the atlantic , the purple of [the mountains]1461-the mountains , the spray of [Niagara]33-niagara , the cherry blossom of [Japan]37-japan , [the golden deserts of [Egypt]9-egypt]1462-the golden deserts of egypt , [I]0-i have thought of [you]116-dal , and understood them better , because of [you]116-dal . Oh , [Dal]116-dal ! [I]0-i should like to come and tell [you]116-dal all about them , and let [you]116-dal see them through [my]0-i eyes ; and then [you]116-dal would widen out [my]0-i narrow understanding of them , and show them again to [me]0-i in greater loveliness .

[I]0-i hear [you]116-dal receive [no visitors]1463-no visitors ; but can not [you]116-dal make just one exception , and let [me]0-i come ?

[I]0-i was at [the Great Pyramid]2742-the great pyramid when [I]0-i heard . [I]0-i was sitting on [the piazza]1049-the piazza after dinner . The moonlight called up memories . [I]0-i had just made up [my]0-i mind to give up [the Nile]43-the nile , and to come straight [home]381-home , and write asking [you]116-dal to come and see [me]0-i ; when [General Loraine]213-general loraine turned up , with an English paper and a letter from [Myra]119-myra , and [I]0-i heard . Would [you]116-dal have come , [Garth]111-garth ?

And now , [[my]0-i friend]1467-my friend , as [you]116-dal can not come to [me]0-i , may [I]0-i come to [you]116-dal ? "[228-nurse rosemary]

" [I]111-garth am glad [you]116-dal did not give up the Nile trip but "[111-garth]

" but of course , if [you]116-dal had sent for [me]111-garth [I]111-garth should have come . "[111-garth]

The bee fought the window angrily , up and down , up and down , for several minutes ; then found the open glass and whirled out into the sunshine , joyfully .

CHAPTER XXII

[DR . ROB]253-dr . rob TO THE RESCUE

Into the somewhat oppressive silence which followed the addressing and closing of the envelope , broke the cheery voice of [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob .

" Which is [the patient]3099-the patient to - day ? [The lady]3361-the lady or [the gentleman]3362-the gentleman ? Ah , neither , [I]217-dr. rob see . Both flaunt the bloom of perfect health and make [the doctor]940-the doctor shy . It is spring without , but summer within , "[217-dr. rob] ran on [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob gaily , wondering why both faces were so white and perturbed , and why there was in the air a sense of hearts in torment . " [Flannels]254-flannels seem to call up boating and picnic parties ; and [I]111-garth see [you]111-garth have discarded the merino , [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary , and returned to the pretty blue washables . More becoming , undoubtedly ; only , do n't take cold ; and be sure [you]111-garth feed up well . In this air [people]533-people must eat plenty , and [you]111-garth have been perceptibly losing weight lately . [We]3365-we do n't want TOO airy - fairy dimensions . "[111-garth]

" Why do [you]217-dr. rob always chaff [Miss Gray]233-miss gray about being small , [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob ? "[111-garth] asked [Garth]111-garth , in a rather vexed tone . " [I]217-dr. rob am sure being short is in no way detrimental to [her]233-miss gray . "[217-dr. rob]

" [I]111-garth will chaff [her]233-miss gray about being tall if [you]217-dr. rob like , "[111-garth] said [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob , looking at [her]1474-her with a wicked twinkle , as [she]1474-her stood in the window , drawn up to [her]1474-her full height , and regarding [him]217-dr. rob with cold disapproval .

" [I]111-garth would sooner no comments of any kind were made upon [her]233-miss gray personal appearance , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth shortly ; then added , more pleasantly : " [You]217-dr. rob see , [she]233-miss gray is just a voice to [me]217-dr. rob a kind , guiding voice . At first [I]217-dr. rob used to form mental pictures of [her]233-miss gray , of a hazy kind ; but now [I]217-dr. rob prefer to appropriate in all its helpfulness what [I]217-dr. rob DO know , and leave unimagined what [I]217-dr. rob do not . Did it ever strike [you]217-dr. rob that [she]233-miss gray is [the only person bar [that fellow Johnson]3367-that fellow johnson , who belongs to a nightmare time [I]217-dr. rob am quickly forgetting [I]217-dr. rob have yet had near [me]217-dr. rob , in [my]217-dr. rob blindness , whom [I]217-dr. rob had not already seen]3366-the only person bar that fellow johnson , who belongs to a nightmare time i am quickly forgetting i have yet had near me , in my blindness , whom i had not already seen ; the only voice [I]217-dr. rob have ever heard to which [I]217-dr. rob could not put a face and figure ? In time , of course , there will be many . At present [she]233-miss gray stands alone to [me]217-dr. rob in this . "[217-dr. rob]

[Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob 's observant eye had been darting about during this explanation , seeking to focus itself upon something worthy of minute examination . Suddenly [he]217-dr. rob spied the foreign letter lying close beside [him]217-dr. rob on the table .

" Hello ! "[217-dr. rob] [he]217-dr. rob said . " Pyramids ? The Egyptian stamp ? That 's interesting . Have [you]217-dr. rob friends out there , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth ? "[111-garth]

" That letter came from [Cairo]39-cairo , "[111-garth] [Garth]111-garth replied ; " but [I]217-dr. rob believe [Miss Champion]118-miss champion has by now gone on to [Syria]63-syria . "[217-dr. rob] [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob attacked [his]217-dr. rob moustache , and stared at the letter meditatively . " [Champion]118-miss champion ? "[217-dr. rob] [he]217-dr. rob repeated . " [Champion]118-miss champion ? It 's an uncommon name . Is [[your]217-dr. rob correspondent]3368-your correspondent , by any chance , [the Honourable Jane]101-jane ? "[111-garth]

" Why , that letter is from [her]118-miss champion , "[111-garth] replied [Garth]111-garth , surprised . " Do [you]217-dr. rob know [her]118-miss champion ? "[217-dr. rob] [His]217-dr. rob voice vibrated eagerly .

" Well , "[1475-he] answered [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob , with slow deliberation , " [I]216-dr. mackenzie know [her]118-miss champion face , and [I]216-dr. mackenzie know [her]118-miss champion voice ; [I]216-dr. mackenzie know [her]118-miss champion figure , and [I]216-dr. mackenzie know a pretty good deal of [her]118-miss champion character .
