[I]216-dr. mackenzie 've seen [her]118-miss champion under fire , which is more than [most men of [her]118-miss champion acquaintance]3370-most men of her acquaintance can claim . But there is one thing [I]216-dr. mackenzie never knew until to - day and that is [her]118-miss champion handwriting . May [I]216-dr. mackenzie examine this envelope ? "[216-dr. mackenzie] [He]1475-he turned to the window ; yes , [this audacious little Scotchman]1476-this audacious little scotchman had asked the question of [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary . But only a broad blue back met [his]1475-he look of inquiry . [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary was studying the view . [He]1475-he turned back to [Garth]111-garth , who had evidently already made a sign of assent , and on whose face was clearly expressed an eager desire to hear more , and an extreme disinclination to ask for it .

[Dr. Mackenzie]216-dr. mackenzie took up the envelope and pondered it .

" Yes , "[216-dr. mackenzie] [he]216-dr. mackenzie said , at last , " it is like [her]118-miss champion , clear , firm , unwavering ; knowing what it means to say , and saying it ; going where it means to go , and getting [there]2228-there . Ay , [lad]3295-lad , it 's [a grand woman]3373-a grand woman that ; and if [you]3295-lad have the Honourable [Jane]101-jane for [[your]3295-lad friend]3374-your friend , [you]3295-lad can be doing without a few other things . "[111-garth]

A tinge of eager colour rose in [Garth]111-garth 's thin cheeks . [He]111-garth had been so starved in [his]111-garth darkness for want of some word concerning [her]228-nurse rosemary , from that outer light in which [she]228-nurse rosemary moved . [He]111-garth had felt so hopelessly cut off from all chance of hearing of [her]228-nurse rosemary . And all the while , if only [he]111-garth had known it , [old Robbie]217-dr. rob could have talked of [her]228-nurse rosemary . [He]111-garth had had to question [Brand]223-dr. brand so cautiously , fearing to betray [his]111-garth secret and [hers]228-nurse rosemary ; but with [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob and [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary no such precautions were needed . [He]111-garth could safely guard [his]111-garth secret , and yet listen and speak .

" Where when ? "[217-dr. rob] asked [Garth]111-garth .

" [I]217-dr. rob will tell [you]111-garth where , and [I]217-dr. rob will tell [you]111-garth when , "[217-dr. rob] answered [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob , " if [you]111-garth feel inclined for a war tale on this peaceful spring morning . "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth was aflame With eagerness . " Have [you]217-dr. rob a chair , [doctor]2904-doctor ? "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said . " And has [Miss Gray]233-miss gray a chair ? "[217-dr. rob]

" [I]217-dr. rob have no chair , [sir]3118-sir , "[217-dr. rob] said [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob , " because when [I]217-dr. rob intend thoroughly to enjoy [my]217-dr. rob own eloquence it is [my]217-dr. rob custom to stand . [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary has no chair , because [she]228-nurse rosemary is standing at the window absorbed in the view . [She]228-nurse rosemary has apparently ceased to pay any heed to [you]111-garth and [me]217-dr. rob . [You]111-garth will very rarely find [one woman]455-one woman take much interest in tales about another . But [you]111-garth lean back in [your]111-garth own chair , [laddie]3255-laddie , and light a cigarette . And a wonderful thing it is to see [you]111-garth do it , too , and better than pounding the wall . Eh ? All of which [we]3379-we may consider [we]3379-we owe to [the lady who disdains [us]3379-we and prefers the scenery]3380-the lady who disdains us and prefers the scenery . Well , [I]217-dr. rob 'm not much to look at , goodness knows ; and [she]3380-the lady who disdains us and prefers the scenery can see [you]111-garth all the rest of the day . Now that 's a brand worth smoking . What do [you]111-garth call it ' Zenith ' ? Ah , and ' [Marcovitch]181-marcovitch . ' Yes ; [you]111-garth ca n't better that for drawing - room and garden purposes . It mingles with the flowers . Lean back and enjoy it , while [I]217-dr. rob smell gun - powder . For [I]217-dr. rob will tell [you]111-garth where [I]217-dr. rob first saw [the Honourable Jane]3381-the honourable jane . Out in [South Africa]24-south africa , in the very thick of the Boer war . [I]217-dr. rob had volunteered for the sake of the surgery experience . [She]3381-the honourable jane was out there , nursing ; but the real thing , mind [you]111-garth . None of [your]111-garth dabbling in eau - de - cologne with lace handkerchiefs , and washing handsome faces when [the orderlies]3382-the orderlies had washed [them]3383-them already ; making charming conversation to [men who were getting well , but fleeing in dread from the dead or the dying]3384-men who were getting well , but fleeing in dread from the dead or the dying . [She]3381-the honourable jane did the work of ten , and expected [others]410-others to do it too . [Doctors]3028-doctors and [orderlies]3390-orderlies adored [her]3381-the honourable jane . [She]3381-the honourable jane was always called ' [The Honourable Jane]101-jane , ' [most of [the men]516-the men]3391-most of the men sounding the H and pronouncing the title as four syllables . Ay , and [the wounded soldiers]3393-the wounded soldiers ! [Garth]111-garth shielded [his]111-garth face with [his]111-garth hand . [His]111-garth half - smoked cigarette fell unheeded to the floor . " [I]217-dr. rob came across [her]101-jane several times , at different centres , "[217-dr. rob] continued [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob ; " but [we]3411-we were not in [the same departments]3412-the same departments , and [she]101-jane spoke to [me]111-garth only once . "[101-jane]

As [Jane]101-jane crossed [the hall]367-the hall and was about to mount the stairs , [she]101-jane looked towards [the closed library]1481-the closed library door . "[111-garth] [She]101-jane could not leave [the house]309-the house without being sure [he]111-garth was safe and well . And yet [she]101-jane instinctively feared to intrude when [he]111-garth imagined [himself]111-garth alone for an hour .

Then [Jane]101-jane , in [her]101-jane anxiety , did a thing [she]101-jane had never done before . [She]101-jane opened the front door noiselessly , passed round [the house]309-the house to [the terrace]312-the terrace , and when approaching the open window of [the library]3143-the library , trod on the grass border , and reached [it]1486-it without making the faintest sound .

Never before had [she]101-jane come upon [him]111-garth unawares , knowing [he]111-garth hated and dreaded the thought of an unseen intrusion on [his]111-garth privacy .

But now just this once

[Jane]101-jane looked in at the window .

[Garth]111-garth sat sideways in the chair , [his]111-garth arms folded on the table beside [him]111-garth , [his]111-garth face buried in [them]1487-them . [He]111-garth was sobbing as [she]101-jane had sometimes heard [men]657-men sob after agonising operations , borne without a sound until the worst was over . And [Garth]111-garth 's sob of agony was this : " OH , [[MY]250-deryck WIFE [MY]250-deryck WIFE [[MY]250-deryck WIFE]2580-my wife]3479-my wife my wife my wife ! "[250-deryck]

[Jane]101-jane crept away . How [she]101-jane did it [she]101-jane never knew . But some instinct told [her]101-jane that to reveal [herself]101-jane then , taking [him]111-garth at a disadvantage , when [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob 's story had unnerved and unmanned [him]111-garth , would be to ruin all . " IF [YOU]101-jane VALUE [YOUR]101-jane ULTIMATE HAPPINESS AND [HIS]111-garth , "[111-garth] [Deryck]250-deryck 's voice always sounded in warning . Besides , it was such a short postponement . [He]111-garth would say " COME "[111-garth] and the next minute [he]111-garth would be in [her]101-jane arms .

[So Jane]101-jane turned noiselessly away .

Coming in , an hour later , from [her]101-jane walk with [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob , [her]101-jane heart filled with glad anticipation , [she]101-jane found [him]111-garth standing in the window , listening to the countless sounds [he]111-garth was learning to distinguish . CHAPTER XXIII

THE ONLY WAY

When [Deryck Brand]107-deryck alighted at [the little northern wayside station]1490-the little northern wayside station , [he]107-deryck looked up and down [the gravelled platform]1491-the gravelled platform , more than half expecting to see [Jane]101-jane . The hour was early , but [she]101-jane invariably said " So much the better "[223-dr. brand] to any plan which involved rising earlier than usual . Nothing was to be seen , however , but [his]107-deryck portmanteau in the distance looking as if it had taken up a solitary and permanent position where [the guard]1492-the guard had placed [it]1493-it and [one slow porter , who appeared to be overwhelmed by the fact that [he]1494-one slow porter , who appeared to be overwhelmed by the fact that he alone was on duty to receive the train alone was on duty to receive [the train]738-the train]1494-one slow porter , who appeared to be overwhelmed by the fact that he alone was on duty to receive the train .

There were [no other passengers]1496-no other passengers descending ; there was no other baggage to put out . [The guard]1492-the guard swung up into [[his]1492-the guard van]1498-his van as [the train]738-the train moved off .

[The old porter]1500-the old porter , shading [his]1500-the old porter eyes from the slanting rays of the morning sun , watched [the train]738-the train glide round the curve and disappear from sight ; then slowly turned and looked the other way , as if to make sure there was not another coming , saw the portmanteau , and shambled towards [it]1493-it . [He]1500-the old porter stood looking down upon [it]1493-it pensively , then moved slowly round , apparently reading the names and particulars of [all the various continental hotels at which the portmanteau had recently stayed with [[its]1493-it owner]1503-its owner]1502-all the various continental hotels at which the portmanteau had recently stayed with its owner .

[Dr. Brand]223-dr. brand never hurried [people]533-people , [He]223-dr. brand always said : " It answers best , in the long run , to let [them]533-people take [their]533-people own time . The minute or two gained by hurrying [them]533-people is lost in the final results . "[940-the doctor] But this applied chiefly to [patients in [the consulting - room]1506-the consulting - room]1505-patients in the consulting - room ; to [anxious young students in [hospital]1508-hospital]1507-anxious young students in hospital ; or to [nurses]3029-nurses , too excitedly conscious at first of the fact that [he]223-dr. brand was talking to [them]3029-nurses , to take in fully what [he]223-dr. brand was saying . [His]223-dr. brand habit of giving [people]533-people , even in final moments , the full time [they]533-people wanted , had once lost [him]223-dr. brand an overcoat , almost lost [him]223-dr. brand [a train]2137-a train , and won [him]223-dr. brand the thing in life [he]223-dr. brand most desired . But that belongs to another story .

Meanwhile [he]223-dr. brand wanted [his]223-dr. brand breakfast on this fresh spring morning . And [he]223-dr. brand wanted to see [Jane]101-jane . Therefore , as [porter and portmanteau]1512-porter and portmanteau made no advance towards [him]223-dr. brand , [the doctor]940-the doctor strode down [the platform]2165-the platform .

" Now then , [[my]1515-the scotch porter man]3424-my man ! "[1515-the scotch porter] [he]940-the doctor called .

" [I]1512-porter and portmanteau beg [your]940-the doctor pardon ? "[1512-porter and portmanteau] said [the Scotch porter]1515-the scotch porter .

" [I]1127-the porter want [my]1127-the porter portmanteau . "[1127-the porter]

Meanwhile [the doctor]940-the doctor sped up into [the hills]1264-the hills , [his]940-the doctor mind alight with eagerness to meet [Jane]101-jane and to learn the developments of the last few days . [He]940-the doctor had called up , in anticipation , such a vivid picture of [her]101-jane , waiting on [the platform]2165-the platform , bright , alert , vigorous , with that fresh and healthy vigour which betokens a good night 's rest , a pleasant early awakening , and a cold tub recently enjoyed , and the disappointment of not seeing [her]101-jane had wrought in [him]940-the doctor a strange foreboding . [I]940-the doctor never had much imagination , and [I]940-the doctor have exhausted what little [I]940-the doctor had . And [he]107-deryck never complains , or explains how things come hardest . So the only way to find out is to have forty - eight hours of it [one]474-one 's self . [Old Margery]257-old margery and [Simpson]230-simpson quite enter into it , and are helping [me]940-the doctor splendidly . [Simpson]230-simpson keeps [the coast]3522-the coast clear if [we]3523-we want to come down or go out ; because with [two blind people]3524-two blind people about , it would be a complication if [they]3524-two blind people ran into [one another]2160-one another . [Margery]257-old margery helps [me]940-the doctor with all the things in which [I]940-the doctor am helpless ; and , oh [Dicky]162-dicky , [you]162-dicky would never believe how many [they]3524-two blind people are ! And the awful , awful dark a black curtain always in front of [you]162-dicky , sometimes seeming hard and firm , like a wall of coal , within an inch of [your]162-dicky face ; sometimes sinking away into soft depths of blackness miles and miles of distant , silent , horrible darkness ; until [you]162-dicky feel [you]162-dicky must fall forward into it and be submerged and overwhelmed . And out of that darkness come voices . And if [they]3526-they speak loudly , [they]3526-they hit [you]162-dicky like tapping hammers ; and if [they]3526-they murmur indistinctly , [they]3526-they madden [you]162-dicky because [you]162-dicky ca n't SEE what is causing it . [You]162-dicky ca n't see that [they]3526-they are holding pins in [their]3526-they mouths , and that therefore [they]3526-they are mumbling ; or that [they]3526-they are half under the bed , trying to get out something which has rolled there , and therefore the voice seems to come from somewhere beneath [the earth]2833-the earth . Ah ! and the waking in the morning to the same blackness as [you]162-dicky have had all night ! ' "[940-the doctor]

[The doctor]940-the doctor walked over to the window and stood there , whistling softly . [Jane]101-jane knew [he]940-the doctor was fighting down [his]940-the doctor own vexation . [She]101-jane waited patiently . Presently the whistling stopped and [she]101-jane heard [him]940-the doctor laugh . Then [he]940-the doctor came back and sat down near [her]101-jane .

" [You]101-jane always were [a THOROUGH old thing]3537-a thorough old thing ! "[940-the doctor] [he]940-the doctor said .

" [No half - measures]3538-no half - measures would do . [I]101-jane suppose [I]101-jane must agree . "[101-jane]

[Jane]101-jane reached out for [his]940-the doctor hand . " Ah , [Boy]2714-boy , "[101-jane] [she]101-jane said , " now [you]940-the doctor will help [me]940-the doctor . But [I]940-the doctor never before knew [you]940-the doctor so nearly selfish . "[940-the doctor]

" [The ' other man]3540-the ' other man ' is always a problem , "[940-the doctor] said [the doctor]940-the doctor . " [[We]3541-we male brutes]3542-we male brutes , by nature , always want to be first with all [[our]3541-we women]3543-our women ; not merely with [the one]1256-the one , but with [all those in whom [we]3541-we consider , sometimes with egregious presumption , that [we]3541-we hold a right . [You]940-the doctor see it everywhere , [fathers]3546-fathers towards [[their]3546-fathers daughters]3547-their daughters , [brothers]3548-brothers as regards [[their]3548-brothers sisters]3549-their sisters]3545-all those in whom we consider , sometimes with egregious presumption , that we hold a right . you see it everywhere , fathers towards their daughters , brothers as regards their sisters , [friends]2139-friends in a friendship . [The ' other man]3540-the ' other man , ' when [he]3540-the ' other man arrives , is always a pill to swallow . It is only natural , [I]940-the doctor suppose ; but it is fallen nature and therefore to be surmounted . Now let [me]940-the doctor go and forage for [your]940-the doctor hat and coat , and take [you]940-the doctor out upon [the moors]1068-the moors . No ? Why not ? [I]940-the doctor often find things for [Flower]144-flower , so really [I]940-the doctor know [likely places in which to search]3553-likely places in which to search . Oh , all right ! [I]940-the doctor will send [Margery]257-old margery . But do n't be long . And [you]940-the doctor need not be afraid of [Dalmain]111-garth hearing [us]3554-we , for [I]940-the doctor saw [him]111-garth just now walking briskly up and down [the terrace]312-the terrace , with only an occasional touch of [his]111-garth cane against the parapet . How much [you]940-the doctor have already accomplished ! [We]3554-we shall talk more freely out on [the moor]2359-the moor ; and , as [I]940-the doctor march [you]940-the doctor along , [we]3554-we can find out tips which may be useful when the time comes for [you]940-the doctor to lead [the ' other man]3540-the ' other man ' about . Only do be careful how [you]940-the doctor come [downstairs]3217-downstairs with [old Margery]257-old margery . Think if [you]940-the doctor fell upon [her]257-old margery , [Jane]101-jane ! [She]257-old margery does make such excellent coffee ! "[940-the doctor]

CHAPTER XXIV

[THE MAN]1158-the man 'S [POINT OF VIEW]79-point of view

A deep peace reigned in [the library at [Gleneesh]13-gleneesh]1580-the library at gleneesh . [Garth]111-garth and [Deryck]107-deryck sat together and smoked in complete fellowship , enjoying that sense of calm content which follows an excellent dinner and a day spent in moorland air .

[Jane]101-jane , sitting [upstairs]2412-upstairs in [her]101-jane self - imposed darkness , with nothing to do but listen , fancied [she]101-jane could hear the low hum of quiet voices in [the room beneath]1582-the room beneath , carrying on a more or less continuous conversation .

It was a pity [she]101-jane could not see [them]1583-them as [they]1583-them sat together , each looking [his]1158-the man very best , [Garth]111-garth in the dinner jacket which suited [his]1158-the man slight upright figure so well ; [the doctor in immaculate evening clothes of the latest cut and fashion , which [he]1158-the man had taken the trouble to bring]1584-the doctor in immaculate evening clothes of the latest cut and fashion , which he had taken the trouble to bring , knowing [Jane]101-jane expected [the men of [her]101-jane acquaintance]1585-the men of her acquaintance to be punctilious in the matter of evening dress , and little dreaming [she]101-jane would have , literally , no eyes for [him]1158-the man .

And indeed [the doctor]940-the doctor [himself]940-the doctor was fastidious to a degree where clothes were concerned , and always well groomed and unquestionably correct in cut and fashion , excepting in the case of [his]940-the doctor favourite old Norfolk jacket . This [he]940-the doctor kept for occasions when [he]940-the doctor intended to be what [he]940-the doctor called " happy and glorious , "[223-dr. brand] though [Lady Brand]143-lady brand made gentle but persistent attempts to dispose of it .

The old Norfolk jacket had walked [the moors]1068-the moors that morning with [Jane]101-jane . [She]101-jane had recognised the feel of it as [he]940-the doctor drew [her]101-jane hand within [his]940-the doctor arm , and [they]1588-they had laughed over its many associations . But now [Simpson]230-simpson was folding it and putting it away , and [a very correctly clad doctor]1589-a very correctly clad doctor sat in an arm - chair in front of the library fire , [his]940-the doctor long legs crossed the one over the other , [his]940-the doctor broad shoulders buried in the depths of the chair .

[Garth]111-garth sat where [he]111-garth could feel the warm flame of the fire , pleasant in the chill evening which succeeded the bright spring day . [His]111-garth chair was placed sideways , so that [he]111-garth could , with [his]111-garth hand , shield [his]111-garth face from [[his]111-garth visitor]1590-his visitor should [he]111-garth wish to do so .

" Yes , "[223-dr. brand] [Dr. Brand]223-dr. brand was saying thoughtfully , " [I]111-garth can easily see that all things which reach [you]3559-you in that darkness assume a different proportion and possess a greatly enhanced value . But [I]111-garth think [you]3559-you will find , as time goes on , and [you]3559-you come in contact with [more people]3560-more people , there will be a great readjustment , and [you]3559-you will become less consciously sensitive to sound and touch from [others]410-others . At present [your]3559-you whole nervous system is highly strung , and responds with an exaggerated vibration to every impression made upon it . [A highly strung nervous system]3562-a highly strung nervous system usually exaggerates . And the medium of sight having been taken away , the other means of communication with [the outer world]3159-the outer world , hearing and touch , draw to [themselves]3564-themselves an overplus of nervous force , and have become painfully sensitive . Eventually things will right themselves , and they will only be usefully keen and acute . What was it [you]111-garth were going to tell [me]111-garth about [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary not shaking hands ? "[111-garth]

" Ah , yes , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth . " But first [I]940-the doctor want to ask , Is it a rule of [her]228-nurse rosemary order , or guild , or institution , or whatever it is to which [she]228-nurse rosemary belongs , that [the nurses]3565-the nurses should never shake hands with [[their]3565-the nurses patients]3271-their patients ? "[940-the doctor]

" Not that [I]111-garth have ever heard , "[111-garth] replied [the doctor]940-the doctor .

" Well , then , it must have been [Miss Gray]233-miss gray 's own perfect intuition as to what [I]940-the doctor want , and what [I]940-the doctor do n't want . For from the very first [she]228-nurse rosemary has never shaken hands , nor in any way touched [me]940-the doctor . Even in passing across letters , and handing [me]940-the doctor things , as [she]228-nurse rosemary does scores of times daily , never once have [I]940-the doctor felt [her]228-nurse rosemary fingers against [mine]940-the doctor . "[940-the doctor]

" And this pleases [you]940-the doctor ? "[111-garth] inquired [the doctor]940-the doctor , blowing smoke rings into the air , and watching [the blind face]1593-the blind face intently .

" Ah , [I]111-garth am so grateful for it , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth earnestly . " Do [you]940-the doctor know , [Brand]223-dr. brand , when [you]940-the doctor suggested sending [me]940-the doctor [a lady nurse]2889-a lady nurse and [secretary]3196-secretary , [I]940-the doctor felt [I]940-the doctor could not possibly stand having [a woman]403-a woman touch [me]940-the doctor . "[940-the doctor]

" So [you]940-the doctor said , "[940-the doctor] commented [the doctor]940-the doctor quietly .

" No ! Did [I]940-the doctor ? What a bear [you]940-the doctor must have thought [me]940-the doctor . "[940-the doctor]

" By no means , "[940-the doctor] said [the doctor]940-the doctor , " but [a distinctly unusual patient]3570-a distinctly unusual patient . As a rule , [men]657-men "[111-garth]

" Ah , [I]111-garth dare say , "[111-garth] [Garth]111-garth interposed half impatiently . " There was a time when [I]940-the doctor should have liked a soft little hand about [me]940-the doctor . And [I]940-the doctor dare say by now [I]940-the doctor should often enough have caught it and held it , perhaps kissed it who knows ? [I]940-the doctor used to do such things , lightly enough . But , [Brand]223-dr. brand , when [a man]575-a man has known the touch of [THE Woman]400-the woman , and when that touch has become nothing but a memory ; when [one]474-one is dashed into darkness , and that memory becomes one of the few things which remain , and , remaining , brings untold comfort , can [you]223-dr. brand wonder if [one]474-one fears another touch which might in any way dim that memory , supersede it , or take away from its utter sacredness ? "[940-the doctor]

" [I]940-the doctor understand , "[940-the doctor] said [the doctor]940-the doctor slowly . " It does not come within [my]111-garth own experience , but [I]111-garth understand . Only [[my]111-garth dear boy]2293-my dear boy , may [I]111-garth say it ? if [the One Woman]3577-the one woman exists and it is excusable in [your]2293-my dear boy case to doubt it , because there were so many surely [her]3577-the one woman place should be [here]2151-here ; [her]3577-the one woman actual touch , one of the things which remain . "[111-garth]

" Ah , say it , "[111-garth] answered [Garth]111-garth , lighting another cigarette . " [I]940-the doctor like to hear it said , although as a matter of fact [you]940-the doctor might as well say that if the view from [the terrace]312-the terrace exists , [I]940-the doctor ought to be able to see it . The view is there , right enough , but [my]940-the doctor own deficiency keeps [me]940-the doctor from seeing it . "[940-the doctor]

" In other words , "[940-the doctor] said [the doctor]940-the doctor , leaning forward and picking up the match which , not being thrown so straight as usual , had just missed the fire ; " in other words , though [She]3577-the one woman was [the One Woman]258-the one woman , [you]940-the doctor were not [the One Man]3580-the one man ? "[111-garth]

" Yes , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth bitterly , but almost beneath [his]111-garth breath . " [I]940-the doctor was ' [a mere boy]2685-a mere boy . ' "[940-the doctor]

" Or [you]111-garth thought [you]111-garth were not , "[940-the doctor] continued [the doctor]940-the doctor , seeming not to have heard the last remark . " As a matter of fact , [you]111-garth are always [the One Man]3580-the one man to [the One Woman]3577-the one woman , unless another is before [you]111-garth in [the field]3414-the field . Only it may take time and patience to prove it to [her]3577-the one woman . "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth sat up and turned a face of blank surprise towards [the doctor]940-the doctor . " What an extraordinary statement ! "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said . " Do [you]940-the doctor really mean it ? "[940-the doctor]

" Absolutely , "[940-the doctor] replied [the doctor]940-the doctor in a tone of quiet conviction . " If [you]111-garth eliminate all other considerations , such as money , [lands]3585-lands , titles , wishes of [friends]2139-friends , attraction of exteriors that is to say , admiration of mere physical beauty in one another , which is after all just a question of comparative anatomy ; if , freed of all this social and habitual environment , [you]111-garth could place [the man]1158-the man and [the woman]400-the woman in [a mental Garden of Eden]3589-a mental garden of eden , and let [them]3590-them face [one another , stripped of all shams and conventionalities , soul viewing soul]3591-one another , stripped of all shams and conventionalities , soul viewing soul , naked and unashamed ; if under those circumstances [she]400-the woman is so truly [[his]1158-the man mate]1115-his mate , that [all the noblest of the man]3593-all the noblest of the man cries out : ' This is [the One Woman]3577-the one woman ! ' then [I]111-garth say , so truly is [he]1158-the man [[her]400-the woman mate]3595-her mate , that [he]1158-the man can not fail to be [the One Man]3580-the one man ; only [he]1158-the man must have the confidence required to prove it to [her]400-the woman . On [him]1158-the man it bursts , as a revelation ; on [her]400-the woman it dawns slowly , as the breaking of the day . "[111-garth]

" Oh , [[my]111-garth God]2282-my god , "[111-garth] murmured [Garth]111-garth brokenly , " it was just that ! [The Garden of Eden]3598-the garden of eden , soul to soul , with no reservations , nothing to fear , nothing to hide . [I]940-the doctor realised [her]400-the woman [[my]940-the doctor WIFE]2580-my wife , and called [her]400-the woman so . And the next morning [she]400-the woman called [ME]940-the doctor ' [a mere boy]2685-a mere boy , ' whom [she]400-the woman could not for a moment think of marrying . So what becomes of [your]111-garth fool theory , [Brand]223-dr. brand ? "[940-the doctor]

" Confirmed , "[940-the doctor] replied [the doctor]940-the doctor quietly . " [Eve]259-eve , afraid of the immensity of [her]259-eve bliss , doubtful of [herself]259-eve , fearful of coming short of the marvel of [his]940-the doctor ideal of [her]259-eve , fleeing from [Adam]260-adam , to hide among the trees of [the garden]3601-the garden . Do n't talk about fool theories , [[my]111-garth boy]2679-my boy . [The fool - fact]3603-the fool - fact was [Adam]260-adam , if [he]260-adam did not start in prompt pursuit . "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth sat forward , [his]111-garth hands clutching the arms of [his]111-garth chair . That quiet , level voice was awakening doubts as to [his]111-garth view of the situation , the first [he]111-garth had had since the moment of turning and walking down [the Shenstone village church]1602-the shenstone village church three years ago . [His]111-garth face was livid , and as the firelight played upon it [the doctor]940-the doctor saw beads of perspiration gleam on [his]111-garth forehead .

" Oh , [Brand]223-dr. brand , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , " [I]1611-this strained white face in the firelight am blind . Be merciful . Things mean so terribly much in the dark . "[1611-this strained white face in the firelight]

[The doctor]940-the doctor considered . Could [[his]940-the doctor nurses]1241-his nurses and [students]1606-students have seen the look on [his]940-the doctor face at that moment , [they]1607-they would have said that [he]940-the doctor was performing a most critical and delicate operation , in which a slip of the scalpel might mean death to [the patient]3099-the patient . [They]1607-they would have been right ; for the whole future of [two people]1609-two people hung in the balance ; depending , in this crisis , upon [the doctor]940-the doctor 's firmness and yet delicacy of touch . [This strained white face in the firelight]1611-this strained white face in the firelight , with its beads of mental agony and its appealing " [I]940-the doctor am blind , "[940-the doctor] had not entered into [the doctor]940-the doctor 's calculations . It was a view of " [the other man]3604-the other man "[940-the doctor] upon which [he]940-the doctor could not look unmoved . But the thought of [that patient figure with bandaged eyes]1613-that patient figure with bandaged eyes sitting [upstairs]2412-upstairs in suspense , stretching dear helpless hands to [him]940-the doctor , steadied [the doctor]940-the doctor 's nerve . [He]940-the doctor looked into the fire .

" [You]940-the doctor may be blind , [Dalmain]111-garth , but [I]111-garth do not want [you]940-the doctor to be [a fool]2236-a fool , "[111-garth] said [the doctor]940-the doctor quietly .

" Am [I]940-the doctor was [I]940-the doctor [a fool]2236-a fool ? "[940-the doctor] asked [Garth]111-garth .

" How can [I]940-the doctor judge ? "[940-the doctor] replied [the doctor]940-the doctor . " Give [me]111-garth a clear account of the circumstances from [your]940-the doctor point of view , and [I]111-garth will give [you]940-the doctor [my]111-garth opinion of the case . "[111-garth]

[His]940-the doctor tone was so completely dispassionate and matter - of - fact , that it had a calming effect on [Garth]111-garth , giving [him]111-garth also a sense of security . [The doctor]940-the doctor might have been speaking of a sore throat , or a tendency to sciatica .

[Garth]111-garth leaned back in [his]111-garth chair , slipped [his]111-garth hand into the breast - pocket of [his]111-garth jacket , and touched a letter lying there . Dare [he]111-garth risk it ? Could [he]111-garth , for once take for [himself]111-garth the comfort of speaking of [his]111-garth trouble to [a man [he]111-garth could completely trust]1619-a man he could completely trust , and yet avoid the danger of betraying [her]1619-a man he could completely trust identity to [one who knew [her]1619-a man he could completely trust so intimately]1620-one who knew her so intimately ?

[Garth]111-garth weighed this , after the manner of [a chess - player looking several moves ahead]1621-a chess - player looking several moves ahead . Could the conversation become more explicit , sufficiently so to be of use , and yet no clue be given which would reveal [Jane]101-jane as [the One Woman]3577-the one woman ?

Had [the doctor]940-the doctor uttered a word of pressure or suggestion , [Garth]111-garth would have decided for silence . But [the doctor]940-the doctor did not speak . [He]111-garth leaned forward and reached the poker , mending the fire with extreme care and method . [He]111-garth placed a fragrant pine log upon the springing flame , and as [he]111-garth did so [he]111-garth whistled softly the closing bars of [Veni]193-the veni , [Creator Spiritus]215-creator spiritus .

[Garth]111-garth , occupied with [his]111-garth own mental struggle , was , for once , oblivious to sounds from without , and did not realise why , at this critical moment , these words should have come with gentle insistence into [his]111-garth mind :

" Keep far [[our]3607-our foes]2675-our foes ; give peace at [home]381-home ; Where [Thou]3610-thou art [Guide]2678-guide , no ill can come . "[111-garth] [He]111-garth took them as [an omen]1625-an omen . [They]1626-they turned the scale .

" [Brand]223-dr. brand , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , " if , as [you]223-dr. brand are so kind as to suggest , [I]111-garth give [myself]111-garth the extreme relief of confiding in [you]223-dr. brand , will [you]223-dr. brand promise [me]111-garth never to attempt to guess at the identity of [the One Woman]3577-the one woman ? "[111-garth]

[The doctor]940-the doctor smiled ; and the smile in [his]940-the doctor voice as [he]940-the doctor answered , added to [Garth]111-garth 's sense of security .

" [[My]111-garth dear fellow]3491-my dear fellow , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , " [I]111-garth never guess at [other people]341-other people 's secrets . It is a form of mental recreation which does not appeal to [me]111-garth , and which [I]111-garth should find neither entertaining nor remunerative . If [I]111-garth know [them]3615-them already , [I]111-garth do not require to guess [them]3615-them . If [I]111-garth do not know [them]3615-them , and [[their]3615-them possessors]3616-their possessors wish [me]111-garth to remain in ignorance , [I]111-garth would as soon think of stealing [their]3615-them purse as of filching [their]3615-them secret . "[111-garth]

" Ah , thanks , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth . " Personally , [I]940-the doctor do not mind what [you]940-the doctor know . But [I]940-the doctor owe it to [her]3617-her , that [her]3617-her name should not appear . "[940-the doctor]

" Undoubtedly , "[940-the doctor] said [the doctor]940-the doctor . " Except in so far as [she]3617-her [herself]3617-her , chooses to reveal it , [the One Woman]3577-the one woman 's identity should always remain a secret . " [I]111-garth will state it as simply and as shortly as [I]111-garth can , "[111-garth] began [Garth]111-garth . " And [you]940-the doctor will understand that there are details of which [no fellow]3620-no fellow could speak . [I]940-the doctor had known [her]3617-her several years in a friendly way , just staying at [the same houses]2207-the same houses , and meeting at [[Lord]3622-lord 's and [Henley]80-henley]3623-lord 's and henley and [all the places where [those in the same set]3625-those in the same set do meet]3624-all the places where those in the same set do meet . [I]940-the doctor always liked [her]3617-her , and always felt at [my]940-the doctor best with [her]3617-her , and thought no end of [her]3617-her opinion , and so forth . [She]3617-her was [a friend]3626-a friend and [a real chum]3627-a real chum to [me]940-the doctor , and to lots of [other fellows]3628-other fellows . But [one]474-one never thought of love - making in connection with [her]3617-her . All the silly things [one]474-one says to [ordinary women]3631-ordinary women [she]3617-her would have laughed at . If [one]474-one had sent [her]3617-her flowers to wear , [she]3617-her would have put them in a vase and wondered for whom they had really been intended . [She]3617-her danced well , and rode straight ; but [the man [she]3617-her danced with]3633-the man she danced with had to be awfully good at it , or [he]3633-the man she danced with found [himself]3633-the man she danced with being guided through the giddy maze ; and [the man who wanted to be in [the same field]3635-the same field with [her]3617-her]3634-the man who wanted to be in the same field with her , must be prepared for any fence or any wall . But [I]940-the doctor use it as a descriptive illustration . [One]474-one was always glad to meet [her]3617-her in a house party , though [one]474-one could not have explained why . It is quite impossible to describe [her]3617-her . [She]3617-her was just well , just "[940-the doctor]

[The doctor]940-the doctor saw " just [Jane]101-jane "[940-the doctor] trembling on [Garth]111-garth 's lips , and knew how inadequate was every adjective to express this name . [He]940-the doctor did not want the flood of [Garth]111-garth 's confidences checked , so [he]940-the doctor supplied the needed words .

" Just a good sort . Yes , [I]1630-the eager young voice quite understand . Well ? "[1630-the eager young voice]

" [I]1630-the eager young voice had had [my]1630-the eager young voice infatuations , plenty of them , "[1630-the eager young voice] went on [the eager young voice]1630-the eager young voice . " The one thing [I]107-deryck thought of in [women]2410-women was [their]2410-women exteriors . Beauty of all kinds of any kind crazed [me]107-deryck for the moment . [I]107-deryck never wanted to marry [them]2410-women , but [I]107-deryck always wanted to paint [them]2410-women . [[Their]2410-women mothers]3640-their mothers , and [aunts]3641-aunts , and [other old dowagers in the house parties]3642-other old dowagers in the house parties used to think [I]107-deryck meant marriage , but [the girls themselves]3643-the girls themselves knew better . [I]107-deryck do n't believe [a girl now walks [this earth]2421-this earth who would accuse [me]107-deryck of flirting]3644-a girl now walks this earth who would accuse me of flirting . [I]107-deryck admired [their]2410-women beauty , and [they]2410-women knew it , and [they]2410-women knew that was all [my]107-deryck admiration meant . It was a pleasant experience at the time , and , in several instances , helped forward good marriages later on . [Pauline Lister]152-pauline lister was apportioned to [me]107-deryck for two whole seasons , but [she]152-pauline lister eventually married [the man on whose jolly old staircase [I]107-deryck painted [her]152-pauline lister]3646-the man on whose jolly old staircase i painted her . Why did n't [I]107-deryck come a cropper over any of [them]2410-women ? Because there were too many , [I]107-deryck suppose . Also , the attraction was skin - deep . [I]107-deryck do n't mind telling [you]3647-you quite frankly : the only one whose beauty used to cause [me]107-deryck a real pang was [Lady Brand]143-lady brand . But when [I]107-deryck had painted it and shown it to [the world]2266-the world in its perfection , [I]107-deryck was content . [I]107-deryck asked no more of [any woman]3649-any woman than to paint [her]143-lady brand , and find [her]143-lady brand paintable . [I]107-deryck could not explain this to [the husbands]3650-the husbands and [mothers]2240-mothers and [chaperons]621-chaperons , but [the women themselves]3653-the women themselves understood it well enough ; and as [I]107-deryck sit here in [my]107-deryck darkness not a memory rises up to reproach [me]107-deryck . "[107-deryck]

" [Good boy]3654-good boy , "[107-deryck] said [Deryck Brand]107-deryck , laughing . " [You]3654-good boy were vastly misunderstood , but [I]111-garth believe [you]3654-good boy . "[111-garth]

" [You]3654-good boy see , "[111-garth] resumed [Garth]111-garth , " that sort of thing being merely skin - deep , [I]940-the doctor went no deeper . [The only women [I]940-the doctor really knew]3655-the only women i really knew were [[my]940-the doctor mother]2312-my mother , who died when [I]940-the doctor was nineteen , and [Margery Graem]147-margery , whom [I]940-the doctor always hugged at meeting and parting , and always shall hug until [I]940-the doctor kiss the old face in [its]147-margery coffin , or [she]147-margery straightens [me]940-the doctor in [mine]940-the doctor . Those ties of [one]474-one 's infancy and boyhood are among the closest and most sacred life can show . Well , so things were until a certain evening in June several years ago . [She]147-margery [the One Woman]3577-the one woman and [I]940-the doctor were in the same house party at [a lovely old place in [the country]753-the country]3659-a lovely old place in the country . [I]940-the doctor had no more thought of wanting to marry [her]147-margery than of proposing to [old Margery]147-margery . Then something happened , [I]940-the doctor must not tell [you]3662-you what ; it would give too clear a clue to [her]147-margery identity . "[940-the doctor]

The blind face shone in the firelight . [Garth]111-garth 's retrospection was bringing [him]111-garth visions of things to come .

[The doctor]940-the doctor sat quite still and watched the vision fade . Then [he]940-the doctor said : " Well ? "[940-the doctor]

" Well , "[940-the doctor] continued the young voice in the shadow , with a sound in it of having dropped back to [earth]2958-earth and finding [it]2958-earth [a mournful place]1633-a mournful place ; " [I]940-the doctor never had a moment 's doubt as to what had happened to [me]940-the doctor . " Several glorious days went by , "[111-garth] continued [Garth]111-garth . [[We]3677-we young fellows , who all admired [her]3577-the one woman]3680-we young fellows , who all admired her , used nevertheless to joke a bit about [her]3577-the one woman wearing collars and stocks , top boots and short skirts ; whacking [her]3577-the one woman leg with a riding - whip , and stirring the fire with [her]3577-the one woman toe . " [I]940-the doctor thought [she]3577-the one woman understood completely . Afterwards [I]940-the doctor knew [she]3577-the one woman had not understood at all . "[940-the doctor]

[Brand]107-deryck , [you]107-deryck may think [me]101-jane [a fool]2236-a fool ; [you]107-deryck can not think [me]101-jane a more egregious ass than [I]101-jane now think [myself]101-jane ; but [I]101-jane was absolutely certain [she]3577-the one woman was [mine]101-jane ; so sure that , when [she]3577-the one woman came , and [we]3694-we were alone together in [the house of [God]145-god]3695-the house of god , instead of going to [her]3577-the one woman with the anxious haste of suppliant and [lover]3696-lover , [I]101-jane called [her]3577-the one woman to [me]101-jane at the chancel step as if [I]101-jane were indeed [[her]3577-the one woman husband]1183-her husband and had the right to bid [her]3577-the one woman come . [Garth]111-garth 's voice choked in [his]111-garth throat on the last word . [His]111-garth head was bowed in [his]111-garth hands . [He]111-garth had reached the point where most things stopped for [him]111-garth ; where all things had ceased forever to be as they were before .

[The room]424-the room seemed strangely silent . The eager voice had poured out into it such a flow of love and hope and longing ; such a revealing of a soul in which [the true love of beauty had created perpetual youth]1647-the true love of beauty had created perpetual youth ; of a heart held free by high ideals from [all playing with lesser loves , but rising to volcanic force and height when the true love was found at last]1648-all playing with lesser loves , but rising to volcanic force and height when the true love was found at last .

[The doctor]940-the doctor shivered at that anticlimax , as if the chill of [an empty church]904-an empty church were in [his]940-the doctor bones . [The doctor]940-the doctor had [his]940-the doctor faults , but they were not [Peter]262-peter 's . [He]940-the doctor never , under any circumstances , spoke BECAUSE [he]940-the doctor wist not what to say .

CHAPTER XXV

[THE DOCTOR]940-the doctor 'S [DIAGNOSIS]263-diagnosis

" So [you]940-the doctor expressed no opinion ? explained nothing ? let [him]2792-poor chap go on believing that ? Oh , [Dicky]162-dicky ! And [you]940-the doctor might have said so much ! "[940-the doctor]

In the quiet of [the Scotch Sabbath]81-the scotch sabbath morning , [Jane]101-jane and [the doctor]940-the doctor had climbed the winding path from [the end of [the terrace]312-the terrace]1656-the end of the terrace , which zigzagged up to [a clearing amongst the pines]1658-a clearing amongst the pines . Two fallen trees at a short distance from each other provided convenient seats in full sunshine , facing a glorious view , down into [the glen]1532-the glen , across [the valley]2785-the valley , and away to [the purple hills beyond]1661-the purple hills beyond . [The doctor]940-the doctor had guided [Jane]101-jane to the sunnier of the two trunks , and seated [himself]940-the doctor beside [her]101-jane . Then [he]940-the doctor had quietly recounted practically the whole of the conversation of the previous evening .

" [I]101-jane expressed no opinion . [I]101-jane explained nothing . [I]101-jane let [him]2792-poor chap continue to believe what [he]2792-poor chap believes ; because it is the only way to keep [you]101-jane on the pinnacle where [he]2792-poor chap has placed [you]101-jane . Let any other reason for [your]101-jane conduct than an almost infantine ignorance of [men]657-men and things be suggested and accepted , and down [you]101-jane will come , [[my]101-jane poor [Jane]101-jane]3702-my poor jane , and great will be the fall . [Mine]101-jane shall not be the hand thus to hurl [you]101-jane headlong . As [you]101-jane say , [I]101-jane might have said so much , but [I]101-jane might also have lived to regret it . "[101-jane]

" [I]101-jane should fall into [his]2792-poor chap arms , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane recklessly , " and [I]940-the doctor would sooner be there than on [a pinnacle]3703-a pinnacle . "[940-the doctor]

" Excuse [me]940-the doctor , [[my]940-the doctor good girl]3704-my good girl , "[940-the doctor] replied [the doctor]940-the doctor . " It is more likely [you]101-jane would fall into the first express going south . In fact , [I]940-the doctor am not certain [you]101-jane would wait for [an express]3705-an express . [I]940-the doctor can almost see the Honourable [Jane]101-jane quitting [yonder little railway station]3706-yonder little railway station , seated in [an empty coal - truck]3707-an empty coal - truck . No ! Do n't start up and attempt to stride about among the pine needles , "[940-the doctor] continued [the doctor]940-the doctor , pulling [Jane]101-jane down beside [him]940-the doctor again . " [You]101-jane will only trip over a fir cone and go headlong into [the valley]2785-the valley . It is no use forestalling the inevitable fall . "[101-jane]

" Oh , [Dicky]162-dicky , "[101-jane] sighed [Jane]101-jane , putting [her]101-jane hand through [his]940-the doctor arm ; and leaning [her]101-jane bandaged eyes against the rough tweed of [his]940-the doctor shoulder ; " [I]107-deryck do n't know what has come to [you]940-the doctor to - day . [You]940-the doctor are not kind to [me]107-deryck . [You]940-the doctor have harrowed [[my]107-deryck poor soul]3709-my poor soul by repeating all [Garth]111-garth said last night ; and , thanks to that terribly good memory of [yours]940-the doctor , [you]940-the doctor have reproduced the tones of [his]111-garth voice in every inflection . " In the wrong yes , "[107-deryck] said [Deryck]107-deryck ; " in the lurch no . [I]101-jane did not say [I]101-jane would do nothing to - day . [I]101-jane only said [I]101-jane could do nothing last night . [You]940-the doctor can not take up a wounded thing and turn it about and analyse it . [I]101-jane can assure [you]940-the doctor , last night was no pastime . [I]101-jane woke this morning feeling as if [I]101-jane had , metaphorically , been beaten black and blue . "[101-jane]

" Then what do [you]107-deryck suppose [I]107-deryck feel ? "[107-deryck] inquired [Jane]101-jane pathetically .

" [You]940-the doctor still feel [yourself]940-the doctor in the right partly , "[107-deryck] replied [Deryck]107-deryck . " But [I]101-jane acted for the best , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane . " [I]107-deryck thought of [him]3713-the man who loves her before [I]107-deryck thought of [myself]107-deryck . " That is not honest , [Jeanette]205-jeanette . [You]940-the doctor thought of [yourself]940-the doctor first . " Ah [me]101-jane ! "[101-jane] sighed [Jane]101-jane . " [I]940-the doctor am lost and weary and perplexed in this bewildering darkness . Nothing seems clear ; nothing seems right . " [I]101-jane hear [Garth]111-garth 's step , "[101-jane] whispered [Jane]101-jane . " Oh , [Dicky]162-dicky , go to the edge and look over . [You]162-dicky can see the windings of [the path below]3718-the path below . "[940-the doctor]

" Yes , "[940-the doctor] [he]940-the doctor said . " [Fortune]264-fortune favours [us]1668-us . [Dalmain]111-garth is coming up [the path]3719-the path with [Simpson]230-simpson . [He]111-garth will be here in two minutes . "[101-jane]

" [Fortune]264-fortune favours [us]1668-us ? [[My]940-the doctor dear]2068-my dear [Dicky]162-dicky ! Of all mis - chances ! "[940-the doctor] [Jane]101-jane 's hand flew to [her]101-jane bandage , but [the doctor]940-the doctor stayed [her]101-jane just in time .

" Not at all , "[940-the doctor] [he]940-the doctor said . " And do not fail at the last in [your]101-jane experiment . [I]107-deryck ought to be able to keep [[you]101-jane two blind people]3721-you two blind people apart . Trust [me]107-deryck , and keep dark [I]107-deryck mean , sit still . And can [you]101-jane not understand why [I]107-deryck said fortune favours [us]1668-us ? [Dalmain]111-garth is coming for [my]107-deryck opinion on the case . [You]101-jane shall hear it together . [The doctor]940-the doctor rose and sauntered round the bend of [the path]3719-the path .

" [Hullo]265-hullo , [Dalmain]111-garth , "[107-deryck] [she]101-jane heard [Deryck]107-deryck say . " Found [your]101-jane way up here ? [An ideal spot]3722-an ideal spot . Shall [we]1672-we dispense with [Simpson]230-simpson ? Take [my]111-garth arm . "[111-garth]

CHAPTER XXVI

HEARTS MEET IN [SIGHTLESS LAND]78-sightless land

" It will be absolutely impossible , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray , for [me]111-garth ever to tell [you]233-miss gray what [I]111-garth think of this that [you]233-miss gray have done for [my]111-garth sake . "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth stood at the open library window . The morning sunlight poured into [the room]424-the room . The air was fragrant with the scent of flowers , resonant with the songs of birds . As [he]111-garth stood there in the sunshine , a new look of strength and hopefulness was apparent in every line of [his]111-garth erect figure . [He]111-garth held out eager hands towards [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , but more as an expression of the outgoing of [his]111-garth appreciation and gratitude than with any expectation of responsive hands being placed within [them]1705-them .

" And here was [I]228-nurse rosemary , picturing [you]233-miss gray having a gay weekend , and wondering where , and who [[your]233-miss gray friends]2294-your friends in [this neighbourhood]2445-this neighbourhood could be . And all the while [you]233-miss gray were sitting blindfold in [the room]424-the room over [my]228-nurse rosemary head . Ah , the goodness of it is beyond words ! But did [you]233-miss gray not feel somewhat of [a deceiver]3782-a deceiver , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray ? "[228-nurse rosemary]

[She]228-nurse rosemary always felt that poor [Jane]101-jane . So [she]228-nurse rosemary readily answered : " Yes . And yet [I]111-garth told [you]233-miss gray [I]111-garth was not going far . And [[my]111-garth friends]2927-my friends in [the neighbourhood]417-the neighbourhood were [Simpson]230-simpson and [Margery]147-margery , who aided and abetted . And it was true to say [I]111-garth was going , for was [I]111-garth not going into darkness ? and it is a different world from [the land of light]3785-the land of light . "[111-garth]

" Ah , how true that is ! "[111-garth] cried [Garth]111-garth . " And how difficult to make [people]533-people understand the loneliness of it , and how [they]533-people seem suddenly to arrive close to one from [another world]1267-another world ; stooping from [some distant planet]3788-some distant planet , with sympathetic voice and friendly touch ; and then away [they]533-people go to another sphere , leaving one to the immensity of solitude in [Sightless Land]78-sightless land . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" Yes , "[228-nurse rosemary] agreed [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , " and [you]233-miss gray almost dread the coming , because the going makes the darkness darker , and the loneliness more lonely . "[111-garth]

" Ah , so [YOU]111-garth experienced that ? "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth . " Do [you]233-miss gray know , now [you]233-miss gray have week - ended in [Sightless Land]78-sightless land , [I]101-jane shall not feel [it]78-sightless land [such a place of solitude]3789-such a place of solitude . At every turn [I]101-jane shall be able to say : ' [A dear and faithful friend]3790-a dear and faithful friend has been [here]2151-here . ' "[101-jane]

[He]111-garth laughed a laugh of such almost boyish pleasure , that [all the mother in [Jane]101-jane 's love]1706-all the mother in jane 's love rose up and demanded of [her]101-jane one supreme effort . [She]101-jane looked at the slight figure in white flannels , leaning against the window frame , so manly , so beautiful still , and yet so helpless and so needing the wealth of tenderness which was [hers]101-jane to give . Then , standing facing [him]111-garth , [she]101-jane opened [her]101-jane arms , as if the great preparedness of that place of rest , so close to [him]111-garth must , magnet - like , draw [him]111-garth to [her]101-jane ; and standing thus in the sunlight , [Jane]101-jane spoke .

Was [she]101-jane beautiful ? Was [she]101-jane paintable ? Would [a man]575-a man grow weary of such a look turned on [him]575-a man , of such arms held out ? Alas ! Too late ! On that point [no lover]1708-no lover shall ever be able to pass judgment . That look is for [one man]1300-one man alone . [He]1300-one man only will ever bring it to that loving face . And [he]1300-one man can not pronounce upon its beauty in voice of rapturous content . [He]1300-one man can not judge . [He]1300-one man can not see . [He]1300-one man is blind !

" [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , there are many smaller details ; but before [we]3792-we talk of those [I]101-jane want to tell [you]111-garth the greatest of all the lessons [I]101-jane learned in [Sightless Land]78-sightless land . "[101-jane] Then , conscious that [her]101-jane emotion was producing in [her]101-jane voice a resonant depth which might remind [him]1300-one man too vividly of notes in The Rosary , [she]101-jane paused , and resumed in the high , soft edition of [her]101-jane own voice which it had become second nature to [her]101-jane to use as [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary : " [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , it seems to [me]111-garth [I]111-garth learned to understand how that which is loneliness unspeakable to [ONE]474-one might be [Paradise of a very perfect kind for TWO]3794-paradise of a very perfect kind for two . [I]111-garth realised that there might be circumstances in which the dark would become a very wonderful meeting - place for [souls]3795-souls . If [I]111-garth loved [a man who lost [his]3796-a man who lost his sight sight]3796-a man who lost his sight , [I]111-garth should be glad to have mine in order to be eyes for [him]3796-a man who lost his sight when eyes were needed ; just as , were [I]111-garth rich and [he]3796-a man who lost his sight poor , [I]111-garth should value [my]111-garth money simply as a thing which might be useful to [him]3796-a man who lost his sight . ' "[111-garth]

While [Jane]101-jane was speaking , [Garth]111-garth paled as [he]111-garth listened , and [his]111-garth face grew strangely set . Then , as if under a reaction of feeling , a boyish flush spread to the very roots of [his]111-garth hair . [He]111-garth visibly shrank from the voice which was saying these things to [him]111-garth . [He]111-garth fumbled with [his]111-garth right hand for the orange cord which would guide [him]111-garth to [his]111-garth chair .

" [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , and at the tone of [his]111-garth voice [Jane]101-jane 's outstretched arms dropped to [her]101-jane sides ; " it is kind of [you]228-nurse rosemary to tell [me]101-jane all these beautiful thoughts which came to [you]228-nurse rosemary in the darkness . Thus trod [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob , with heavily nailed boots , upon the bare toes of a delicate situation .

[Garth]111-garth tried to put the suggestion out of [his]111-garth mind and failed . Then , one night , [he]111-garth faced and fought a great temptation .

After all why should [he]111-garth not do as [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob suggested ? "[111-garth] and the battle was won .

But it troubled [his]111-garth mind lest by any chance [her]1726-this charming , capable , devoted nurse peace of heart should be disturbed through [him]111-garth . But the Easter morn soon dawns , and lo , [Love]219-love ariseth ! Love grieved , is like a bird with wet wings . It can not fly ; it can not rise . It hops about upon the ground , chirping anxiously . But every flutter shakes away more drops ; every moment in the sunshine is drying the tiny feathers ; and very soon it soars to the tree top , all the better for the bath , which seemed to have robbed it of the power to rise . "[228-nurse rosemary]

[Jane]101-jane had been sitting with [her]101-jane arms folded upon the table , [her]101-jane yearning eyes fixed upon [Garth]111-garth 's bowed head . When [he]111-garth wished [her]101-jane a thousand miles away [she]101-jane buried [her]101-jane face upon them . [She]101-jane was so near [him]111-garth that had [Garth]111-garth stretched out [his]111-garth right hand again , it would have touched the heavy coils of [her]101-jane soft hair . But [Garth]111-garth did not raise [his]111-garth head , and [Jane]101-jane still sat with [her]101-jane face buried .

There was silence in [the library]3143-the library for a few moments after [Garth]111-garth 's question and appeal . Then [Jane]101-jane lifted [her]101-jane face .

" There is [no one]2059-no one in [the room]424-the room , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , " but [YOU]111-garth and [ME]1737-you . "[1737-you]

CHAPTER XXVII

[THE EYES GARTH]273-the eyes garth TRUSTED

" So [you]1737-you enjoy motoring , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray ? "[228-nurse rosemary]

This was only Monday afternoon , and already [her]228-nurse rosemary week - end experience had won for [her]228-nurse rosemary many new privileges .

" Yes , [I]228-nurse rosemary like it , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth ; particularly in this beautiful air . "[228-nurse rosemary]

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary smiled , then bit [her]228-nurse rosemary lip . " To a case , "[228-nurse rosemary] [she]228-nurse rosemary replied quite gravely . " [I]111-garth was on [my]111-garth way to [[his]223-dr. brand house]3448-his house to talk it over and receive instructions . "[111-garth]

" It must be splendid working under such a fellow as [Brand]223-dr. brand , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth ; " and yet [I]228-nurse rosemary am certain most of the best things [you]1737-you do are quite [your]1737-you own idea . Now tell [me]228-nurse rosemary . When [we]3850-we were motoring [we]3850-we never slowed up suddenly to pass anything , or tooted to make something move out of the way , without [your]1737-you having already told [me]228-nurse rosemary what [we]3850-we were going to pass or what was in [the road]1263-the road a little way ahead . It was : ' [We]3850-we shall be passing [a hay cart]3852-a hay cart at the next bend ; there will be just room , but [we]3850-we shall have to slow up ' ; or , ' An old red cow is in the very middle of [the road]1263-the road a little way on . [I]228-nurse rosemary think [she]3854-she will move if [we]3850-we hoot . ' Then , when the sudden slow down and swerve came , or the toot toot of the horn , [I]228-nurse rosemary knew all about it and was not taken unawares . Did [you]1737-you know how trying it is in blindness to be speeding along and suddenly alter pace without having any idea why , or swerve to one side , and not know what [one]474-one has just been avoiding ? This afternoon [our]3850-we spin was pure pleasure , because not once did [you]1737-you let these things happen . [I]228-nurse rosemary knew all that was taking place , as soon as [I]228-nurse rosemary should have known it had [I]228-nurse rosemary had [my]228-nurse rosemary sight . "[228-nurse rosemary]

[Jane]101-jane pressed [her]101-jane hand over [her]101-jane bosom . Ah , how able [she]101-jane was always to fill [[her]101-jane boy]1741-her boy 's life with pure pleasure . How little of the needless suffering of [the blind]3180-the blind should ever be [his]1741-her boy if [she]101-jane won the right to be beside [him]1741-her boy always .

" Well , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , " [I]111-garth motored to [the station]746-the station with [Sir Deryck]107-deryck yesterday afternoon , and [I]111-garth noticed all [you]111-garth describe . " Now , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , " [I]228-nurse rosemary can venture to tell [you]3881-you one of [my]228-nurse rosemary minor trials . [I]228-nurse rosemary am always so awfully afraid of there being a FLY in things . Ever since [I]228-nurse rosemary was [a small boy]2121-a small boy [I]228-nurse rosemary have had such a horror of inadvertently eating flies . When [I]228-nurse rosemary was about six , [I]228-nurse rosemary heard [a lady visitor]3889-a lady visitor say to [[my]228-nurse rosemary mother]2312-my mother : ' Oh , one HAS to swallow a fly about once a year ! [I]228-nurse rosemary used to be thankful when it happened , and [I]228-nurse rosemary got it over . [I]228-nurse rosemary remember quickly finishing a bit of bread in which [I]228-nurse rosemary had seen signs of legs and wings , feeling it was an easy way of taking it and [I]228-nurse rosemary should thus be exempt for twelve glad months ; but [I]228-nurse rosemary had to run up and down [the terrace]312-the terrace with clenched hands while [I]228-nurse rosemary swallowed it . And when [I]228-nurse rosemary discovered the fallacy of the annual fly , [I]228-nurse rosemary was just as particular in [my]228-nurse rosemary dread of an accidental one . [I]228-nurse rosemary do n't believe [I]228-nurse rosemary ever sat down to sardines on toast at [a restaurant]3893-a restaurant without looking under the toast for [my]228-nurse rosemary bugbear , though as [I]228-nurse rosemary lifted it [I]228-nurse rosemary felt rather like [the old woman who always looks under the bed for [a burglar]3895-a burglar]3894-the old woman who always looks under the bed for a burglar . And [I]228-nurse rosemary tried to find them by touch ; but [I]228-nurse rosemary could not be sure , and [I]228-nurse rosemary soon grew hopelessly confused amongst all the canvases . [I]228-nurse rosemary did not wish to ask [Simpson]230-simpson 's help , because the subjects , are well , somewhat unusual , and if [he]230-simpson found out [I]228-nurse rosemary had destroyed them it might set [him]230-simpson wondering and talking , and one hates to awaken curiosity in [a servant]1268-a servant . " [A woman]403-a woman and [a man]575-a man ... alone , in [a garden]3917-a garden but the surroundings are only indicated . [She]403-a woman is in evening dress ; soft , black , and trailing ; with lace at [her]403-a woman breast . It is called : ' [The Wife]837-the wife . ' "[228-nurse rosemary]
