CHAPTER XXXII

AN INTERLUDE

Tuesday passed uneventfully , to all outward seeming .

There was nothing to indicate to [Garth]111-garth that [[his]111-garth secretary]1834-his secretary had sat up writing most of the night ; only varying that employment by spending long moments in silent contemplation of [his]111-garth pictures , which had found a temporary place of safety , on [their]1835-their way back to [the studio]2711-the studio , in a deep cupboard in [[her]228-nurse rosemary room]630-her room , of which [she]228-nurse rosemary had the key .

If [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary marked , with a pang of tender compunction , the worn look on [Garth]111-garth 's face , telling how mental suffering had chased away sleep ; [she]228-nurse rosemary made no comment thereupon .

Thus [Tuesday]283-tuesday passed , in uneventful monotony .

Two telegrams had arrived for [Nurse Gray]228-nurse rosemary in the course of the morning . The first came while [she]228-nurse rosemary was reading a Times leader aloud to [Garth]111-garth . [Simpson]230-simpson brought it in , saying : " A telegram for [you]101-jane , [miss]2048-miss . "[230-simpson]

It was always a source of gratification to [Simpson]230-simpson afterwards , that , almost from the first , [he]230-simpson had been led , by what [he]230-simpson called [his]230-simpson " unHaided HintuHition , "[230-simpson] to drop [the " nurse]4025-the " nurse , "[230-simpson] and address [Jane]101-jane with [the conventional " miss]4026-the conventional " miss . "[230-simpson] In time [he]230-simpson almost convinced [himself]230-simpson that [he]230-simpson had also discerned in [her]228-nurse rosemary " a Honourable "[147-margery] ; but this , [Margery Graem]147-margery firmly refused to allow . [She]147-margery [herself]147-margery had had [her]147-margery " doots , "[284-mrs. graem] and kept them to [herself]147-margery ; but all [Mr. Simpson]230-simpson 's surmisings had been freely expressed and reiterated in [[the housekeeper]422-the housekeeper 's room]1839-the housekeeper 's room ; and never a word about any honourable lead passed [Mr. Simpson]230-simpson 's lips . Therefore [Mrs. Graem]284-mrs. graem berated [him]230-simpson for being so ready to " go astray and speak lies . "[147-margery] But [Maggie]147-margery , [the housemaid]1393-the housemaid , had always felt sure [Mr. Simpson]230-simpson knew more than [he]230-simpson said . " Said more than [he]230-simpson knew , [you]230-simpson mean , "[147-margery] prompted [old Margery]147-margery . " No , "[147-margery] retorted [Maggie]147-margery , " [I]147-margery know what [I]147-margery said ; and [I]147-margery said what [I]147-margery meant . "[147-margery] " [You]230-simpson may have said what [you]230-simpson meant , but [you]230-simpson did not mean what [you]230-simpson knew , "[147-margery] insisted [Margery]147-margery ; " and if [anybody]4027-anybody says another word on the matter , [I]147-margery shall say grace and dismiss the table , "[147-margery] continued [old Margery]147-margery , exercising the cloture , by virtue of [her]147-margery authority , in a way which [Simpson]230-simpson and [Maggie]147-margery , who both wished for cheese , afterwards described as " mean . "[101-jane]

But this was long after the uneventful Tuesday , when [Simpson]230-simpson entered , with a salver ; and , finding [Jane]101-jane enveloped in the Times , said : " A telegram for [you]230-simpson , [miss]2048-miss . "[228-nurse rosemary]

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary took it ; apologised for the interruption , and opened it . It was from [the duchess]304-the duchess , and ran thus :

MOST INCONVENIENT , AS [YOU]1842-you VERY WELL KNOW ; BUT AM LEAVING [EUSTON]66-euston TO - NIGHT . WILL AWAIT FURTHER ORDERS AT [ABERDEEN]67-aberdeen .

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary smiled , and put the telegram into [her]228-nurse rosemary pocket . " No answer , thank [you]111-garth , [Simpson]230-simpson . "[111-garth]

" Not bad news , [I]228-nurse rosemary hope ? "[228-nurse rosemary] asked [Garth]111-garth .

" No , "[228-nurse rosemary] replied [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary ; " but it makes [my]111-garth departure on [Thursday]89-thursday imperative . It is from [an old aunt of [mine]111-garth , who is going to [[my]111-garth ' [young man]4031-young man 's ' home]4030-my ' young man 's ' home]4029-an old aunt of mine , who is going to my ' young man 's ' home . [I]111-garth must be with [him]4031-young man before [she]4029-an old aunt of mine , who is going to my ' young man 's ' home is , or there will be endless complications . "[111-garth]

" [I]228-nurse rosemary do n't believe [he]4031-young man will ever let [you]111-garth go again , when once [he]4031-young man gets [you]111-garth back , "[228-nurse rosemary] remarked [Garth]111-garth , moodily .

" [You]228-nurse rosemary think not ? "[111-garth] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , with a tender little smile , as [she]228-nurse rosemary took up the paper , and resumed [her]228-nurse rosemary reading .

The second telegram arrived after luncheon . [Garth]111-garth was at the piano , thundering [Beethoven]285-beethoven 's Funeral March on the Death of [a Hero]1843-a hero . [The room]424-the room was being rent asunder by mighty chords ; and [Simpson]230-simpson 's smug face and side - whiskers appearing noiselessly in the doorway , were an insupportable anticlimax . [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary laid [her]228-nurse rosemary finger on [her]228-nurse rosemary lips ; advanced with [her]228-nurse rosemary firm noiseless tread , and took the telegram . [She]228-nurse rosemary returned to [her]228-nurse rosemary seat and waited until [the hero]1845-the hero 's obsequies were over , and the last roll of the drums had died away . Then [she]228-nurse rosemary opened the orange envelope . And as [she]228-nurse rosemary opened it , a strange thing happened . [Garth]111-garth began to play The Rosary . The string of pearls dropped in liquid sound from [his]111-garth fingers ; and [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary read [her]228-nurse rosemary telegram . It was from [the doctor]940-the doctor , and said : SPECIAL LICENSE EASILY OBTAINED . [FLOWER]144-flower AND [I]0-i WILL COME WHENEVER [YOU]1847-you WISH . WIRE AGAIN .

[The Rosary]1848-the rosary drew to a soft melancholy close .

" What shall [I]228-nurse rosemary play next ? "[228-nurse rosemary] asked [Garth]111-garth , suddenly .

" [Veni]193-the veni , [Creator Spiritus]4032-creator spiritus , "[111-garth] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary ; and bowed [her]228-nurse rosemary head in prayer .

CHAPTER XXXIII

" SOMETHING IS GOING TO HAPPEN ! "[111-garth]

Wednesday dawned ; an ideal First of May : [Garth]111-garth was in [the garden]3601-the garden before breakfast . [Jane]101-jane heard [him]111-garth singing , as [he]111-garth passed beneath [her]101-jane window .

" It is not [mine]101-jane to sing the stately grace , The great soul beaming in [[my]101-jane lady]2562-my lady 's face . "[101-jane]

[She]101-jane leaned out .

[He]111-garth was walking below in the freshest of white flannels ; [his]111-garth step so light and elastic ; [his]111-garth every movement so lithe and graceful ; the only sign of [his]111-garth blindness the Malacca cane [he]111-garth held in [his]111-garth hand , with which [he]111-garth occasionally touched the grass border , or the wall of [the house]309-the house . [She]101-jane could only see the top of [his]111-garth dark head . It might have been on [the terrace at [Shenstone]16-shenstone]3025-the terrace at shenstone , three years before . [She]101-jane longed to call from the window ; " Darling [[my]111-garth Darling]3940-my darling ! Good morning ! [God]4035-god bless [you]111-garth to - day . "[111-garth]

Ah what would to - day bring forth ; the day when [her]101-jane full confession , and explanation , and plea for pardon , would reach [him]111-garth ? [He]111-garth was such [a boy]1852-a boy in many ways ; so light - hearted , loving , artistic , poetic , irrepressible ; ever young , in spite of [his]111-garth great affliction . But where [his]111-garth manhood was concerned ; [his]111-garth love ; [his]111-garth right of choice and of decision ; of maintaining a fairly - formed opinion , and setting aside the less competent judgment of [others]410-others ; [she]101-jane knew [him]111-garth rigid , inflexible . [His]111-garth very pain seemed to cool [him]111-garth , from [the molten lover]1854-the molten lover , to the bar of steel .

As [Jane]101-jane knelt at [her]101-jane window that morning , [she]101-jane had not the least idea whether the evening would find [her]101-jane travelling to [Aberdeen]67-aberdeen , to take the night mail south ; or at [home]381-home forever in [the heaven of [Garth]111-garth 's love]1856-the heaven of garth 's love .

And down below [he]111-garth passed again , still singing :

" But [mine]111-garth it is to follow in [her]1854-the molten lover train ; Do [her]1854-the molten lover behests in pleasure or in pain ; Burn at [her]1854-the molten lover altar love 's sweet frankincense , And worship [her]1854-the molten lover in distant reverence . "[101-jane] " Ah , [beloved]2578-beloved ! "[101-jane] whispered [Jane]101-jane , " not ' distant . ' If [you]2578-beloved want [her]1854-the molten lover , and call [her]1854-the molten lover , it will be to the closest closeness love can devise . No more distance between [you]2578-beloved and [me]101-jane . "[101-jane]

And then , in the curious way in which inspired words will sometimes occur to the mind quite apart from their inspired context , and bearing a totally different meaning from that which they primarily bear , these words came to [Jane]101-jane : " For [He]111-garth is [our]4037-we peace , Who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between [us]4037-we ... that [He]111-garth might reconcile both ... by the cross . "[101-jane] " Ah , [dear Christ]4038-dear christ ! "[101-jane] [she]101-jane whispered . " If [Thy]1854-the molten lover cross could do this for [Jew]286-jew and [Gentile]287-gentile , may not [[my]230-simpson boy]2679-my boy 's heavy cross , so bravely borne , do it for [him]111-garth and for [me]230-simpson ? So shall [we]4037-we come at last , indeed , to ' kiss the cross . ' "[230-simpson]

The breakfast gong boomed through [the house]309-the house . [Simpson]230-simpson loved gongs . [He]230-simpson considered them " Haristocratic . "[111-garth] [He]230-simpson always gave full measure .

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary went down to breakfast .

[Garth]111-garth came in , through the French window , humming " The thousand beauties that [I]111-garth know so well . "[111-garth] [He]111-garth was in [his]111-garth gayest , most inconsequent mood . [He]111-garth had picked a golden rosebud in [the conservatory]1858-the conservatory and wore it in [his]111-garth buttonhole . [He]111-garth carried a yellow rose in [his]111-garth hand .

" Good day , [Miss Rosemary]237-miss rosemary , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said . " What a May Day ! [Simpson]230-simpson and [I]111-garth were up with the lark ; were n't [we]4037-we , [Simpson]230-simpson ? [Poor Simpson]288-poor simpson felt like a sort of ' Queen of the May , ' when [my]111-garth electric bell trilled in [[his]288-poor simpson room]1411-his room , at 5 A.M. But [I]111-garth could n't stay in bed . [I]111-garth woke with [my]111-garth something - is - going - to - happen feeling ; and when [I]111-garth was [a little chap]4041-a little chap and woke with that , [Margery]147-margery used to say : ' Get up quickly then , [Master Garth]111-garth , and it will happen all the sooner . ' [You]230-simpson ask [her]147-margery if [she]147-margery did n't , [Simpson]230-simpson . [Miss Gray]233-miss gray , did [you]233-miss gray ever learn : ' If [you]233-miss gray 're waking call [me]111-garth early , call [me]111-garth early , [mother dear]4042-mother dear ' ? [I]111-garth always hated [that young woman]4043-that young woman ! [I]111-garth should think , in [her]147-margery excited state , [she]147-margery would have been waking long before [[her]147-margery poor mother]4044-her poor mother , who must have been worn to a perfect rag , making all the hussy 's May Queen - clothes , overnight . "[111-garth]

[Simpson]230-simpson had waited to guide [him]1859-him to [his]1859-him place at the table . Then [he]1859-him removed the covers , and left [the room]424-the room .

As soon as [he]1859-him had closed the door behind [him]1859-him , [Garth]111-garth leaned forward , and with unerring accuracy laid the opening rose upon [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary 's plate .

" Roses for [Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said . " Wear it , if [you]228-nurse rosemary are sure [the young man]1072-the young man would not object . [I]228-nurse rosemary have been thinking about [him]1072-the young man and [the aunt]2365-the aunt . [I]228-nurse rosemary wish [you]228-nurse rosemary could ask [them]4047-we both here , instead of going away on Thursday . [We]4047-we would have the ' maddest , merriest time ! ' [I]228-nurse rosemary would play with [the aunt]2365-the aunt , while [you]228-nurse rosemary had it out with [the young man]1072-the young man . And [I]228-nurse rosemary could easily keep [the aunt]2365-the aunt away from nooks and corners , because [my]228-nurse rosemary hearing is sharper than [any aunt]4051-any aunt 's eyes could be , and if [you]228-nurse rosemary gave a gentle cough , [I]228-nurse rosemary would promptly clutch hold of [auntie]4052-auntie , and insist upon being guided in the opposite direction . And [I]228-nurse rosemary would take [her]2365-the aunt out in the motor ; and [you]228-nurse rosemary and [the young man]1072-the young man could have the gig . And then when all was satisfactorily settled , [we]4047-we could pack [them]4054-them off [home]381-home , and be by [ourselves]4047-we again . Ah , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray , do send for [them]4054-them , instead of leaving [me]228-nurse rosemary on Thursday . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , reprovingly , as [she]228-nurse rosemary leaned forward and touched [his]1861-his right hand with the rim of [his]1861-his saucer , " this May - Day morning has gone to [your]1861-his head . [I]111-garth shall send for [Margery]147-margery . [She]147-margery may have known the symptoms , of old . "[111-garth]

" It is not that , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth . [He]111-garth leaned forward and spoke confidentially . " Something is going to happen to - day , [little Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary . Whenever [I]228-nurse rosemary feel like this , something happens . The first time it occurred , about twenty - five years ago , there was a rocking - horse in [the hall]367-the hall , when [I]228-nurse rosemary ran [downstairs]3217-downstairs ! [I]228-nurse rosemary have never forgotten [my]228-nurse rosemary first ride on that rocking - horse . The fearful joy when [he]1861-his went backward ; the awful plunge when [he]1861-his went forward ; and the proud moment when it was possible to cease clinging to the leather pommel . [I]228-nurse rosemary nearly killed [the cousin who pulled out [his]1861-his tail]4058-the cousin who pulled out his tail . [I]228-nurse rosemary thrashed [him]1861-his , then and there , WITH the tail ; which was such a silly thing to do ; because , though it damaged [the cousin]4059-the cousin , it also spoiled the tail . The next time ah , but [I]228-nurse rosemary am boring [you]1862-you ! "[228-nurse rosemary]

" Not at all , "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , politely ; " but [I]228-nurse rosemary want [you]1862-you to have some breakfast ; and the letters will be here in a few minutes . "[228-nurse rosemary]

[He]1862-you looked so brown and radiant , [this dear delightful boy]1863-this dear delightful boy , with [his]1862-you gold - brown tie , and yellow rose . [She]228-nurse rosemary was conscious of [her]228-nurse rosemary pallor , and oppressive earnestness , as [she]228-nurse rosemary said : " The letters will be here . "[111-garth]

" Oh , bother the letters ! "[111-garth] cried [Garth]111-garth . " Let 's have a holiday from letters on May Day ! [You]1862-you shall be [Queen of the May]4060-queen of the may ; and [Margery]147-margery shall be [the old mother]4061-the old mother . [I]228-nurse rosemary will be [Robin]217-dr. rob , with the breaking heart , leaning on the bridge beneath the hazel tree ; and [Simpson]230-simpson can be [the ' bolder lad]4062-the ' bolder lad . ' And [we]4063-we will all go and ' gather knots of flowers , and buds , and garlands gay . ' "[228-nurse rosemary]

" [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , laughing , in spite of [herself]228-nurse rosemary , " [you]111-garth really must be sensible , or [I]111-garth shall go and consult [Margery]147-margery . [I]111-garth have never seen [you]111-garth in such a mood . "[111-garth]

" [You]228-nurse rosemary have never seen [me]228-nurse rosemary , on a day when something was going to happen , "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Garth]111-garth ; and [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary made no further attempt to repress [him]111-garth .

After breakfast , [he]111-garth went to the piano , and played two - steps , and rag - time music , so infectiously , that [Simpson]230-simpson literally tripped as [he]111-garth cleared the table ; and [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , sitting pale and preoccupied , with a pile of letters before [her]228-nurse rosemary , had hard work to keep [her]228-nurse rosemary feet still .

[Simpson]230-simpson had two - stepped to the door with the cloth , and closed it after [him]230-simpson . [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary 's remarks about the post - bag , and the letters , had remained unanswered . " Shine little glowworm glimmer "[147-margery] was pealing gaily through [the room]424-the room , like silver bells , when the door opened , and [old Margery]147-margery appeared , in a black satin apron , and a blue print sunbonnet . [She]147-margery came straight to the piano , and laid [her]147-margery hand gently on [Garth]111-garth 's arm .

" [Master Garthie]148-master garthie , "[147-margery] [she]147-margery said , " on this lovely May morning , will [you]148-master garthie take [old Margery]147-margery up into [the woods]2438-the woods ? "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth 's hands dropped from the keys . " Of course [I]111-garth will , [Margie]147-margery , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said . " And , [I]1865-the old woman say [Margie]147-margery , SOMETHING IS GOING TO HAPPEN . "[1865-the old woman]

" [I]1865-the old woman know it , [laddie]3255-laddie , "[1865-the old woman] said [the old woman]1865-the old woman , tenderly ; and the expression with which [she]1865-the old woman looked into the blind face filled [Jane]101-jane 's eyes with tears . " [I]111-garth woke with it too , [Master Garthie]148-master garthie ; and now [we]4066-we will go into [the woods]2438-the woods , and listen to [the earth]2833-the earth , and trees , and flowers , and [they]4069-they will tell [us]4066-we whether it is for joy , or for sorrow . Come , [[my]111-garth own laddie]4070-my own laddie . "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth rose , as in a dream . Even in [his]111-garth blindness [he]111-garth looked so young , and so beautiful , that [Jane]101-jane 's watching heart stood still .

At the window [he]111-garth paused . " Where is [that secretary person]4071-that secretary person ? "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , vaguely . " [She]4071-that secretary person kept trying to shut [me]147-margery up . "[147-margery]

" [I]147-margery know [she]4071-that secretary person did , [laddie]3255-laddie , "[147-margery] said [old Margery]147-margery , curtseying apologetically towards [Jane]101-jane . " [You]101-jane see [she]4071-that secretary person does not know the ' something - is - going - to - happen - to - day ' awakening . "[101-jane]

" Ah , does n't [she]4071-that secretary person ? "[101-jane] thought [Jane]101-jane , as [they]1866-they disappeared through the window . " But as [[my]101-jane [Garth]111-garth]4073-my garth has gone off [his]111-garth dear head , and been taken away by [[his]111-garth nurse]3105-his nurse , the thing that is going to happen , ca n't happen just yet . "[101-jane] And [Jane]101-jane sat down to the piano , and very softly ran through the accompaniment of The Rosary . Then , after shading [her]101-jane eyes on [the terrace]312-the terrace , and making sure that [a tall white figure leaning on a short dark one]1868-a tall white figure leaning on a short dark one , had almost reached [the top of [the hill]953-the hill]957-the top of the hill , still more softly , [she]101-jane sang it .

Afterwards [she]101-jane went for a tramp on [the moors]1068-the moors , and steadied [her]101-jane nerve by the rapid swing of [her]101-jane walk , and the deep inbreathing of that glorious air . Once or twice [she]101-jane took a telegram from [her]101-jane pocket , stood still and read it ; then tramped on , to the wonder of the words : " Special license easily obtained . "[1874-the white - faced man] Ah , the license might be easy to obtain ; but how about [his]1872-his forgiveness ? That must be obtained first . If there were only [this darling boy]1873-this darling boy to deal with , in [his]1873-this darling boy white flannels and yellow roses , with a May - Day madness in [his]1873-this darling boy veins , the license might come at once ; and all [he]1872-his could wish should happen without delay . But this is a passing phase of [Garth]111-garth . What [she]101-jane has to deal with is [the white - faced man]1874-the white - faced man , who calmly said : " [I]1874-the white - faced man accept the cross , "[1874-the white - faced man] and walked down [the village church]2966-the village church leaving [her]101-jane for all these years . Loving [her]101-jane , as [he]1874-the white - faced man loved [her]101-jane ; and yet leaving [her]101-jane , without word or sign , for three long years . To hire , was the confession ; [his]1874-the white - faced man would be the decision ; and , somehow , it did not surprise [her]101-jane , when [she]101-jane came down to luncheon , a little late , to find [HIM]1874-the white - faced man seated at the table .

" [Miss Gray]233-miss gray , "[1874-the white - faced man] [he]1874-the white - faced man said gravely , as [he]1874-the white - faced man heard [her]101-jane enter , " [I]228-nurse rosemary must apologise for [my]228-nurse rosemary behaviour this morning . [I]228-nurse rosemary was what [they]4075-they call up here ' fey . ' [Margery]147-margery understands the mood ; and together [she]147-margery and [I]228-nurse rosemary have listened to [kind Mother Earth]289-kind mother earth , laying [our]4076-us hands on [her]147-margery sympathetic softness , and [she]147-margery has told [us]4076-us [her]147-margery secrets . Then [I]228-nurse rosemary lay down under the fir trees and slept ; and awakened calm and sane , and ready for what to - day must bring . For it WILL bring something . That is no delusion . It is a day of great things . That much , [Margery]147-margery knows , too . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" Perhaps , "[228-nurse rosemary] suggested [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , tentatively , " there may be news of interest in [your]111-garth letters . "[111-garth]

" Ah , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth , " [I]228-nurse rosemary forgot . [We]4076-us have not even opened this morning 's letters . Let [us]4076-us take time for them immediately after lunch . Are there many ? "[228-nurse rosemary]

" Quite a pile , "[111-garth] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary .

" Good . [We]4076-us will work soberly through [them]4077-them . "[228-nurse rosemary]

Half an hour later [Garth]111-garth was seated in [his]111-garth chair , calm and expectant ; [his]111-garth face turned towards [[his]111-garth secretary]1834-his secretary . [He]111-garth had handled [his]111-garth letters , and amongst them [he]111-garth had found one sealed ; and the seal was a plumed helmet , with visor closed . [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary saw [him]111-garth pale , as [his]111-garth fingers touched it . [He]111-garth made no remark ; but , as before , slipped it beneath the rest , that it might come up for reading , last of all .

When [the others]1877-the others were finished , and [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary took up this letter , [the room]424-the room was very still . [They]1879-they were quite alone . [Bees]290-bees hummed in [the garden]3601-the garden . The scent of flowers stole in at the window . But [no one]2059-no one disturbed [their]1879-they solitude .

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary took up the envelope .

" [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , here is a letter , sealed with scarlet wax . The seal is a helmet with visor "[111-garth]

" [I]111-garth know , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth . " [You]228-nurse rosemary need not describe it further . Kindly open it . "[228-nurse rosemary]

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary opened it . " It is a very long letter , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" Indeed ? Will [you]228-nurse rosemary please read it to [me]228-nurse rosemary , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray . "[228-nurse rosemary]

A tense moment of silence followed . [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary lifted the letter ; but [her]228-nurse rosemary voice suddenly refused to respond to [her]228-nurse rosemary will . [Garth]111-garth waited without further word .

Then [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary said : " Indeed , [sir]3118-sir , it seems a most private letter . [I]111-garth find it difficult to read it to [you]3118-sir . "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth heard the distress in [her]228-nurse rosemary voice , and turned to [her]228-nurse rosemary kindly .

" Never mind , [[my]228-nurse rosemary dear child]4079-my dear child . It in no way concerns [you]4079-my dear child . It is a private letter to [me]228-nurse rosemary ; but [my]228-nurse rosemary only means of hearing it is through [your]4079-my dear child eyes , and from [your]4079-my dear child lips . Besides , [the lady , whose seal is a plumed helmet]4080-the lady , whose seal is a plumed helmet , can have nothing of a very private nature to say to [me]228-nurse rosemary . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" Ah , but [she]4080-the lady , whose seal is a plumed helmet has , "[111-garth] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , brokenly .

[Garth]111-garth considered this in silence .

Then : " Turn over the page , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , " and tell [me]228-nurse rosemary the signature . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" There are many pages , "[111-garth] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary .

" Turn over the pages then , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth , sternly . " Do not keep [me]228-nurse rosemary waiting . How is that letter signed ? "[228-nurse rosemary]

" [[YOUR]111-garth WIFE]2300-your wife , "[111-garth] whispered [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary .

There was a petrifying quality about the silence which followed . It seemed as if those two words , whispered into [Garth]111-garth 's darkness , had turned [him]111-garth to stone .

At last [he]111-garth stretched out [his]111-garth hand . " Will [you]228-nurse rosemary give [me]111-garth that letter , if [you]228-nurse rosemary please , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray ? Thank [you]228-nurse rosemary . [I]111-garth wish to be alone for a quarter of an hour . [I]111-garth shall be glad if [you]228-nurse rosemary will be good enough to sit in [the dining - room]1048-the dining - room , and stop [any one]411-any one from coming into [this room]3214-this room . [I]111-garth must be undisturbed . At the end of that time kindly return . "[111-garth]

[He]111-garth spoke so quietly that [Jane]101-jane 's heart sank within [her]101-jane . Some display of agitation would have been reassuring . This was [the man who , bowing [his]111-garth dark head towards the crucifixion window]1882-the man who , bowing his dark head towards the crucifixion window , said : " [I]101-jane accept the cross . "[101-jane] This was [the man , whose footsteps never once faltered as [he]111-garth strode down the aisle , and left [her]101-jane]1883-the man , whose footsteps never once faltered as he strode down the aisle , and left her . This was [the man , who had had the strength , ever since , to treat that episode between [her]101-jane and [himself]111-garth]1884-the man , who had had the strength , ever since , to treat that episode between her and himself , as completely closed ; no word of entreaty ; no sign of remembrance ; no hint of reproach . And this was [the man to whom [she]101-jane had signed [herself]101-jane : " [[Your]111-garth wife]2300-your wife . "[1891-the former]

In [her]101-jane whole life]1885-the man to whom she had signed herself : " your wife . " in her whole life , [Jane]101-jane had never known fear . [She]101-jane knew it now .

As [she]101-jane silently rose and left [him]111-garth , [she]101-jane stole one look at [his]111-garth face . [He]111-garth was sitting perfectly still ; the letter in [his]111-garth hand . [He]111-garth had not turned [his]111-garth head toward [her]101-jane as [he]111-garth took it . [His]111-garth profile might have been a beautiful carving in white ivory . There was not the faintest tinge of colour in [his]111-garth face ; just that ivory pallor , against the ebony lines of [his]111-garth straight brows , and smooth dark hair .

[Jane]101-jane softly left [the room]424-the room , closing the door behind [her]101-jane .

Then followed the longest fifteen minutes [she]101-jane had ever known . [She]101-jane realised what a tremendous conflict was in progress in [that quiet room]1887-that quiet room . [Garth]111-garth was arriving at [his]111-garth decision without having heard any of [her]101-jane arguments . By the strange fatality of [his]111-garth own insistence , [he]111-garth had heard only two words of [her]101-jane letter , and those the crucial words ; the two words to which the whole letter carefully led up . [They]1888-they must have revealed to [him]111-garth instantly , what the character of the letter would be ; and what was the attitude of mind towards [himself]111-garth , of [the woman who wrote them]1889-the woman who wrote them .

[Jane]101-jane paced [the dining - room]1048-the dining - room in desperation , remembering the hours of thought which had gone to the compiling of sentences , cautiously preparing [his]111-garth mind to the revelation of the signature .

Suddenly , in the midst of [her]101-jane mental perturbation , there came to [her]101-jane the remembrance of a conversation between [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary and [Garth]111-garth over the pictures . [The former]1891-the former had said : " Is [she]101-jane [a wife]2295-a wife ? "[111-garth] And [Garth]111-garth had answered : " Yes . "[111-garth] [Jane]101-jane had instantly understood what that answer revealed and implied . Because [Garth]111-garth had so felt [her]101-jane his during those wonderful moments on [the terrace at [Shenstone]16-shenstone]3025-the terrace at shenstone , that [he]111-garth could look up into [her]101-jane face and say , " [[My]101-jane wife]2580-my wife "[101-jane] not as an interrogation , but as an absolute statement of fact , [he]111-garth still held [her]101-jane this , as indissolubly as if [priest]1893-priest , and book , and ring , had gone to the wedding of [their]1894-their union . To [him]111-garth , the union of [souls]3795-souls came before all else ; and if that had taken place , all that might follow was but the outward indorsement of an accomplished fact . Owing to [her]101-jane fear , mistrust , and deception , nothing had followed . [Their]1894-their lives had been sundered ; [they]1894-their had gone different ways . [He]111-garth regarded [himself]111-garth as being no more to [her]101-jane than [any other man of [her]101-jane acquaintance]1896-any other man of her acquaintance . During these years [he]111-garth had believed , that [her]101-jane part in that evening 's wedding of souls had existed in [his]111-garth imagination , only ; and had no binding effect upon [her]101-jane . But [his]111-garth remained . Because those words were true to [him]111-garth then , [he]111-garth had said them ; and , because [he]111-garth had said them , [he]111-garth would consider [her]101-jane [[his]111-garth wife]1166-his wife , through life , and after . It was the intuitive understanding of this , which had emboldened [Jane]101-jane so to sign [her]101-jane letter . But how would [he]111-garth reconcile that signature with the view of [her]101-jane conduct which [he]111-garth had all along taken , without ever having the slightest conception that there could be any other ?

Then [Jane]101-jane remembered , with comfort , the irresistible appeal made by Truth to the soul of [the artist]531-the artist ; truth of line ; truth of colour ; truth of values ; and , in the realm of sound , truth of tone , of harmony , of rendering , of conception . And when [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary had said of [his]111-garth painting of " [The Wife]837-the wife "[101-jane] : " It is a triumph of art "[111-garth] ; [Garth]111-garth had replied : " It is a triumph of truth . "[101-jane] And [Jane]101-jane 's own verdict on the look [he]111-garth had seen and depicted was : " It is true yes , it is true ! "[101-jane] Will [he]111-garth not realise now the truth of that signature ; and , if [he]111-garth realises it , will [he]111-garth not be glad in [his]111-garth loneliness , that [[his]111-garth wife]1166-his wife should come to [him]111-garth ; unless the confessions and admissions of the letter cause [him]111-garth to put [her]1166-his wife away as wholly unworthy ?

Suddenly [Jane]101-jane understood the immense advantage of the fact that [he]111-garth would hear every word of the rest of [her]101-jane letter , knowing the conclusion , which [she]101-jane [herself]101-jane could not possibly have put first . [She]101-jane saw a Higher Hand in this arrangement ; and said , as [she]101-jane watched the minutes slowly pass : " [He]111-garth hath broken down the middle wall of partition between [us]4089-us "[228-nurse rosemary] ; and a sense of calm assurance descended , and garrisoned [her]101-jane soul with peace .

The quarter of an hour was over .

[Jane]101-jane crossed [the hall]367-the hall with firm , though noiseless , step ; stood a moment on the threshold relegating [herself]101-jane completely to the background ; then opened the door ; and [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary re - entered [the library]3143-the library .

CHAPTER XXXIV

" LOVE NEVER FAILETH "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth was standing at the open window , when [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary re - entered [the library]3143-the library ; and [he]111-garth did not turn , immediately .

[She]101-jane looked anxiously for the letter , and saw it laid ready on [her]101-jane side of the table . It bore signs of having been much crumpled ; looking almost as a letter might appear which had been crushed into a ball , flung into the waste - paper basket , and afterwards retrieved . It had , however , been carefully smoothed out ; and lay ready to [her]101-jane hand .

When [Garth]111-garth turned from the window and passed to [his]111-garth chair , [his]111-garth face bore the signs of a great struggle . [He]111-garth looked as one who , sightless , has yet been making frantic efforts to see . The ivory pallor was gone . [His]111-garth face was flushed ; and [his]111-garth thick hair , which grew in beautiful curves low upon [his]111-garth forehead and temples , and was usually carefully brushed back in short - cropped neatness , was now ruffled and disordered . But [his]111-garth voice was completely under control , as [he]111-garth turned towards [[his]111-garth secretary]1834-his secretary .

" [[My]111-garth dear]2068-my dear [Miss Gray]233-miss gray , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , " [we]4091-we have a difficult task before [us]4091-we . [I]228-nurse rosemary have received a letter , which it is essential [I]228-nurse rosemary should hear . [I]228-nurse rosemary am obliged to ask [you]233-miss gray to read it to [me]228-nurse rosemary , because there is absolutely [no one else]709-no one else to whom [I]228-nurse rosemary can prefer such a request . [I]228-nurse rosemary can not but know that it will be a difficult and painful task for [you]233-miss gray , feeling [yourself]233-miss gray an intermediary between [two wounded and sundered hearts]4093-two wounded and sundered hearts . May [I]228-nurse rosemary make it easier , [[my]228-nurse rosemary dear little girl]4094-my dear little girl , by assuring [you]233-miss gray that [I]228-nurse rosemary know of no one in [this world]4095-this world from whose lips [I]228-nurse rosemary could listen to the contents of that letter with less pain ; and , failing [my]228-nurse rosemary own , there are no eyes beneath which [I]228-nurse rosemary could less grudgingly let it pass , there is no mind [I]228-nurse rosemary could so unquestioningly trust , to judge kindly , both of [myself]228-nurse rosemary and of [the writer]4096-the writer ; and to forget faithfully , all which was not intended to come within the knowledge of [a third person]4097-a third person . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" Thank [you]111-garth , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , "[111-garth] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary .

[Garth]111-garth leaned back in [his]111-garth chair , shielding [his]111-garth face with [his]111-garth hand .

" Now , if [you]233-miss gray please , "[228-nurse rosemary] [he]111-garth said . And , very clearly and quietly , [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary began to read .

" [DEAR GARTH]111-garth , As [you]111-garth will not let [me]228-nurse rosemary come to [you]111-garth , so that [I]228-nurse rosemary could say , between [you]111-garth and [me]228-nurse rosemary alone , that which must be said , [I]228-nurse rosemary am compelled to write it . It is [your]111-garth own fault , [Dal]116-dal ; and [we]4098-we both pay the penalty . For how can [I]228-nurse rosemary write to [you]111-garth freely when [I]228-nurse rosemary know , that as [you]111-garth listen , it will seem to [you]111-garth of every word [I]228-nurse rosemary am writing , that [I]228-nurse rosemary am dragging [a third person]4097-a third person into that which ought to be , most sacredly , between [you]111-garth and [me]228-nurse rosemary alone . And yet , [I]228-nurse rosemary must write freely ; and [I]228-nurse rosemary must make [you]111-garth fully understand ; because the whole of [your]111-garth future life and [mine]228-nurse rosemary will depend upon [your]111-garth reply to this letter . [I]228-nurse rosemary must write as if [you]111-garth were able to hold the letter in [your]111-garth own hands , and read it to [yourself]111-garth . Therefore , if [you]111-garth can not completely trust [[your]111-garth secretary]4100-your secretary , with the private history of [your]111-garth heart and [mine]228-nurse rosemary , bid [her]4100-your secretary give it [you]111-garth back without turning this first page ; and let [me]228-nurse rosemary come [myself]228-nurse rosemary , [Garth]111-garth , and tell [you]111-garth all the rest . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" That is the bottom of the page , "[111-garth] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary ; and waited .

[Garth]111-garth did not remove [his]111-garth hand . " [I]228-nurse rosemary do completely trust ; and [she]4100-your secretary must not come , "[228-nurse rosemary] [he]111-garth said .

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary turned the page , and went on reading .

" [I]228-nurse rosemary want [you]111-garth to remember , [Garth]111-garth , that every word [I]228-nurse rosemary write , is the simple unvarnished truth . If [you]111-garth look back over [your]111-garth remembrance of [me]228-nurse rosemary , [you]111-garth will admit that [I]228-nurse rosemary am not naturally [an untruthful person]4101-an untruthful person , nor did [I]228-nurse rosemary ever take easily to prevarication . But , [Garth]111-garth , [I]228-nurse rosemary told [you]111-garth one lie ; and that fatal exception proves the rule of perfect truthfulness , which has always otherwise held , between [you]111-garth and [me]228-nurse rosemary ; and , please [God]145-god , always will hold . The confession herein contained , concerns that one lie ; and [I]228-nurse rosemary need not ask [you]111-garth to realise how humbling it is to [my]228-nurse rosemary pride to have to force the hearing of a confession upon [the man who has already refused to admit [me]228-nurse rosemary to a visit of friendship]4102-the man who has already refused to admit me to a visit of friendship . [You]111-garth will remember that [I]228-nurse rosemary am not naturally humble ; and have a considerable amount of proper pride ; and , perhaps , by the greatness of the effort [I]228-nurse rosemary have had to make , [you]111-garth will be able to gauge the greatness of [my]228-nurse rosemary love . God help [you]111-garth to do so [[my]228-nurse rosemary darling]3940-my darling ; [[my]228-nurse rosemary beloved]2659-my beloved ; [[my]228-nurse rosemary poor desolate boy]4105-my poor desolate boy ! "[228-nurse rosemary]

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary stopped abruptly ; for , at this sudden mention of love , and at these words of unexpected tenderness from [Jane]101-jane , [Garth]111-garth had risen to [his]111-garth feet , and taken two steps towards the window ; as if to escape from something too immense to be faced . But , in a moment [he]111-garth recovered [himself]111-garth , and sat down again , completely hiding [his]111-garth face with [his]111-garth hand .

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary resumed the reading of the letter .

" Ah , what a wrong [I]111-garth have done , both to [you]111-garth , and to [myself]111-garth ! [Dear]2179-dear , [you]111-garth remember the evening on [the terrace at [Shenstone]16-shenstone]3025-the terrace at shenstone , when [you]111-garth asked [me]111-garth to be when [you]111-garth called [me]111-garth when [I]111-garth WAS [[YOUR]111-garth WIFE]2300-your wife ? [Garth]111-garth , [I]111-garth leave this last sentence as it stands , with its two attempts to reach the truth . [I]111-garth will not cross them out , but leave them to be read to [you]111-garth ; for , [you]111-garth see [Garth]111-garth , [I]111-garth finally arrived ! [I]111-garth WAS [[your]111-garth wife]2300-your wife . [I]111-garth did not understand it then . [I]111-garth was intensely surprised ; unbelievably inexperienced in matters of feeling ; and bewildered by the flood of sensation which swept [me]111-garth off [my]111-garth feet and almost engulfed [me]111-garth . But even then [I]111-garth knew that [my]111-garth soul arose and proclaimed [you]111-garth mate and [master]4110-master . And when [you]111-garth held [me]111-garth , and [your]111-garth dear head lay upon [my]111-garth heart , [I]111-garth knew , for the first time the meaning of the word ecstasy ; and [I]111-garth could have asked no kinder gift of heaven , than to prolong those moments into hours . "[111-garth]

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary 's quiet voice broke , suddenly ; and the reading ceased .

[Garth]111-garth was leaning forward , [his]111-garth head buried in [his]111-garth hands . A dry sob rose in [his]111-garth throat , just at the very moment when [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary 's voice gave way .

[Garth]111-garth recovered first . Without lifting [his]111-garth head , with a gesture of protective affection and sympathy , [he]111-garth stretched [his]111-garth hand across the table .

" [Poor little girl]4111-poor little girl , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , " [I]228-nurse rosemary am so sorry . It is rough on [you]4111-poor little girl . If only it had come when [Brand]107-deryck was [here]2151-here ! [I]228-nurse rosemary am afraid [you]4111-poor little girl MUST go on ; but try to read without realising . Leave the realising to [me]228-nurse rosemary . "[228-nurse rosemary]

And [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary read on .

" When [you]4111-poor little girl lifted [your]4111-poor little girl head in the moonlight and gazed long and earnestly at [me]228-nurse rosemary Ah , those dear eyes ! [your]4111-poor little girl look suddenly made [me]228-nurse rosemary self - conscious . There swept over [me]228-nurse rosemary a sense of [my]228-nurse rosemary own exceeding plainness , and of how little there was in what [those dear eyes]4113-those dear eyes saw , to provide reason , for that adoring look . Overwhelmed with a shy shame [I]228-nurse rosemary pressed [your]4111-poor little girl head back to the place where the eyes would be hidden ; and [I]228-nurse rosemary realise now what a different construction [you]4111-poor little girl must have put upon that action . [Garth]111-garth , [I]228-nurse rosemary assure [you]4111-poor little girl , that when [you]4111-poor little girl lifted [your]4111-poor little girl head the second time , and said , ' [[My]228-nurse rosemary wife]2580-my wife , ' it was the first suggestion to [my]228-nurse rosemary mind that this wonderful thing which was happening meant marriage . [I]228-nurse rosemary know it must seem almost incredible , and more like [a child of eighteen]4115-a child of eighteen , than [a woman of thirty]4116-a woman of thirty . But [you]4111-poor little girl must remember , all [my]228-nurse rosemary dealings with [men up to that hour]4117-men up to that hour had been handshakes , heartiest comradeship , and an occasional clap on the shoulder given and received . And do n't forget , [dear King of [my]228-nurse rosemary heart]4118-dear king of my heart , that , until one short week before , [you]4111-poor little girl had been amongst [the boys who called [me]228-nurse rosemary ' good old [Jane]101-jane]4119-the boys who called me ' good old jane , ' and addressed [me]228-nurse rosemary in intimate conversation as ' [[my]228-nurse rosemary dear fellow]3491-my dear fellow ' ! Do n't forget that [I]228-nurse rosemary had always looked upon [you]4111-poor little girl as YEARS younger than [myself]228-nurse rosemary ; and though a strangely sweet tie had grown up between [us]4121-us , since the evening of the concert at [Overdene]1-overdene , [I]228-nurse rosemary had never realised it as love . Well [you]4111-poor little girl will remember how [I]228-nurse rosemary asked for twelve hours to consider [my]228-nurse rosemary answer ; and [you]4111-poor little girl yielded , immediately ; [you]4111-poor little girl were so perfect , all the time , [Garth]111-garth and left [me]228-nurse rosemary , when [I]228-nurse rosemary asked to be alone ; left [me]228-nurse rosemary , with a gesture [I]228-nurse rosemary have never forgotten . It was a revelation of the way in which the love of [a man such as [you]4111-poor little girl]4122-a man such as you exalts [the woman upon whom it is outpoured]4123-the woman upon whom it is outpoured . The hem of that gown has been a sacred thing to [me]228-nurse rosemary , ever since . It is always with [me]228-nurse rosemary , though [I]228-nurse rosemary never wear it . A detailed account of the hours which followed , [I]228-nurse rosemary shall hope to give [you]4111-poor little girl some day , [[my]228-nurse rosemary dearest]2587-my dearest . [I]228-nurse rosemary can not write it . Let [me]228-nurse rosemary hurl on to paper , in all its crude ugliness , the miserable fact which parted [us]4125-our ; turning [our]4125-our dawning joy to disillusion and sadness . [Garth]111-garth it was this . [I]228-nurse rosemary did not believe [your]4111-poor little girl love would stand the test of [my]228-nurse rosemary plainness . [I]228-nurse rosemary knew what [a worshipper of beauty]4126-a worshipper of beauty [you]4111-poor little girl were ; how [you]4111-poor little girl must have it , in one form or another , always around [you]4111-poor little girl . [I]228-nurse rosemary got out [my]228-nurse rosemary diary in which [I]228-nurse rosemary had recorded verbatim [our]4125-our conversation about [the ugly preacher , whose face became illumined into beauty , by the inspired glory within]4127-the ugly preacher , whose face became illumined into beauty , by the inspired glory within . And [you]4111-poor little girl added that [you]4111-poor little girl never thought [him]4127-the ugly preacher , whose face became illumined into beauty , by the inspired glory within ugly again ; but [he]4127-the ugly preacher , whose face became illumined into beauty , by the inspired glory within would always be plain . And [you]4111-poor little girl said it was not the sort of face [one]474-one would want to have always before one at meals ; but that [you]4111-poor little girl were not called upon to undergo that discipline , which would be sheer martyrdom to [you]4111-poor little girl . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" [I]228-nurse rosemary was so interested , at the time ; and so amused at the unconscious way in which [you]4111-poor little girl stood and explained this , to quite [the plainest woman of [your]4111-poor little girl acquaintance]4129-the plainest woman of your acquaintance , that [I]228-nurse rosemary recorded it very fully in [my]228-nurse rosemary journal . Alas ! On that important night , [I]228-nurse rosemary read the words , over and over , until they took morbid hold upon [my]228-nurse rosemary brain . Then such is the self - consciousness awakened in [a woman]403-a woman by the fact that [she]403-a woman is loved and sought [I]228-nurse rosemary turned on all the lights around [my]228-nurse rosemary mirror , and critically and carefully examined the face [you]4111-poor little girl would have to see every day behind [your]4111-poor little girl coffee - pot at breakfast , for years and years , if [I]228-nurse rosemary said ' Yes , ' on the morrow . [Darling]209-darling , [I]228-nurse rosemary did not see [myself]228-nurse rosemary through [your]4111-poor little girl eyes , as , thank [God]145-god , [I]228-nurse rosemary have done since . And [I]228-nurse rosemary DID NOT TRUST [YOUR]4111-poor little girl LOVE TO STAND THE TEST . It seemed to [me]228-nurse rosemary , [I]228-nurse rosemary was saving both of [us]4131-us from future disappointment and misery , by bravely putting away present joy , in order to avoid certain disenchantment . [[My]228-nurse rosemary beloved]2659-my beloved , it will seem to [you]4111-poor little girl so coolly calculating , and so mean ; so unworthy of the great love [you]4111-poor little girl were even then lavishing upon [me]228-nurse rosemary . But remember , for years , [your]4111-poor little girl remarkable personal grace and beauty had been a source of pleasure to [me]228-nurse rosemary ; and [I]228-nurse rosemary had pictured [you]4111-poor little girl wedded to [Pauline Lister]152-pauline lister , for instance , in [her]152-pauline lister dazzling whiteness , and soft radiant youth . So [my]228-nurse rosemary morbid self - consciousness said : ' What ! [This young Apollo]4133-this young apollo , tied to [my]228-nurse rosemary ponderous plainness ; growing handsomer every year , while [I]228-nurse rosemary grow older and plainer ? ' Ah , [darling]2691-darling ! It sounds so unworthy , now [we]4131-us know what [our]4131-us love is . But it sounded sensible and right that night ; and at last , with a bosom that ached , and arms that hung heavy at the thought of being emptied of all that joy , [I]228-nurse rosemary made up [my]228-nurse rosemary mind to say ' no . ' Ah , believe [me]228-nurse rosemary , [I]228-nurse rosemary had no idea what it already meant to [you]4111-poor little girl . [I]228-nurse rosemary thought [you]4111-poor little girl would pass on at once to another fancy ; and transfer [your]4111-poor little girl love to one more able to meet [your]4111-poor little girl needs , at every point . Honestly , [Garth]111-garth , [I]228-nurse rosemary thought [I]228-nurse rosemary should be [the only one left desolate]4135-the only one left desolate . Then came the question : how to refuse [you]4111-poor little girl . [I]228-nurse rosemary knew if [I]228-nurse rosemary gave the true reason , [you]4111-poor little girl would argue it away , and prove [me]228-nurse rosemary wrong , with glowing words , before which [I]228-nurse rosemary should perforce yield . So as [I]228-nurse rosemary really meant not to let [you]4111-poor little girl run the risk , and not to run it [myself]228-nurse rosemary [I]228-nurse rosemary lied to [you]4111-poor little girl , [[my]228-nurse rosemary beloved]2659-my beloved . To [you]4111-poor little girl , whom [my]228-nurse rosemary whole being acclaimed King of [my]228-nurse rosemary heart , [Master of [my]228-nurse rosemary will]4137-master of my will ; supreme to [me]228-nurse rosemary , in love and life , to [YOU]4111-poor little girl [I]228-nurse rosemary said : ' [I]228-nurse rosemary can not marry [a mere boy]2685-a mere boy . ' Ah , [darling]2691-darling ! [I]228-nurse rosemary do not excuse it . [I]228-nurse rosemary do not defend it . [I]228-nurse rosemary merely confess it ; trusting to [your]4111-poor little girl generosity to admit , that no other answer would have sent [you]4111-poor little girl away . Ah , [[your]4111-poor little girl poor [Jane]101-jane]4140-your poor jane , left desolate ! If [you]4111-poor little girl could have seen [her]101-jane in [the little church]911-the little church , calling [you]4111-poor little girl back ; retracting and promising ; listening for [your]4111-poor little girl returning footsteps , in an agony of longing . But [my]228-nurse rosemary Garth is not made of the stuff which stands waiting on the door - mat of [a woman]403-a woman 's indecision . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" The lonely year which followed so broke [my]228-nurse rosemary nerve , that [Deryck Brand]107-deryck told [me]228-nurse rosemary [I]228-nurse rosemary was going all to pieces , and ordered [me]228-nurse rosemary abroad . [I]228-nurse rosemary went , as [you]4111-poor little girl know ; and in other , and more vigorous , surroundings , there came to [me]228-nurse rosemary a saner view of life . In [Egypt]9-egypt last March , on [the summit of [the Great Pyramid]27-the great pyramid]941-the summit of the great pyramid , [I]228-nurse rosemary made up [my]228-nurse rosemary mind that [I]228-nurse rosemary could live without [you]4111-poor little girl no longer . [I]228-nurse rosemary did not see [myself]228-nurse rosemary wrong ; but [I]228-nurse rosemary yearned so for [your]4111-poor little girl love , and to pour [mine]228-nurse rosemary upon [you]4111-poor little girl , [[my]228-nurse rosemary beloved]2659-my beloved , that [I]228-nurse rosemary concluded it was worth the risk . [I]228-nurse rosemary made up [my]228-nurse rosemary mind to take [the next boat]4145-the next boat [home]381-home , and send for [you]4111-poor little girl . Then oh , [[my]228-nurse rosemary own boy]4147-my own boy [I]228-nurse rosemary heard . [I]228-nurse rosemary wrote to [you]4111-poor little girl ; and [you]4111-poor little girl would not let [me]228-nurse rosemary come . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" Now [I]228-nurse rosemary know perfectly well , that [you]4111-poor little girl might say : ' [She]4148-she did not trust [me]228-nurse rosemary when [I]228-nurse rosemary had [my]228-nurse rosemary sight . Now that [I]228-nurse rosemary can not see , [she]4148-she is no longer afraid . ' [Garth]111-garth , [you]4111-poor little girl might , say that ; but it would not be true . " The question , therefore , simply resolves itself into this : Can [you]4111-poor little girl forgive [me]228-nurse rosemary ? [The room]424-the room was very still , as [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary finished reading ; and , laying down the letter , silently waited . [She]228-nurse rosemary wondered for a moment whether [she]228-nurse rosemary could get [herself]228-nurse rosemary a glass of water , without disturbing [him]1905-him ; but decided to do without it .

" [She]2300-your wife has asked [me]228-nurse rosemary to do a thing impossible , "[228-nurse rosemary] [he]111-garth said ; and a slow smile illumined [his]111-garth drawn face .

[Jane]101-jane clasped [her]101-jane hands upon [her]101-jane breast .

" CAN [you]111-garth not write ' forgiven ' ? "[111-garth] asked [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , brokenly .

" No , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth . " [I]111-garth can not . [Little girl]3835-little girl , give [me]111-garth a sheet of paper , and a pencil . "[111-garth]

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary placed them close to [his]111-garth hand .

[Garth]111-garth took up the pencil . [He]111-garth groped for the paper ; felt the edges with [his]111-garth left hand ; found the centre with [his]111-garth fingers ; and , in large firm letters , wrote one word .

" And [she]3835-little girl will come oh , [[my]228-nurse rosemary God]2282-my god , [she]3835-little girl will come ! [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary took up the letter ; and , by an almost superhuman effort , spoke steadily .

CHAPTER XXXV

[NURSE ROSEMARY]228-nurse rosemary HAS [HER]228-nurse rosemary REWARD

" [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth , "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary , with patient insistence , " [I]228-nurse rosemary really do want [you]111-garth to sit down , and give [your]111-garth mind to the tea - table . "[111-garth]

" Once , "[101-jane] continued [Garth]111-garth , with the gleeful enjoyment in [his]111-garth voice which always presaged a story in which [Jane]101-jane figured , " there was [a fearfully silly little woman]4180-a fearfully silly little woman staying at [Overdene]1-overdene , when [a lot of [us]4182-we]4181-a lot of us were [there]2228-there . ' [Jane]101-jane was always extra nice to [people]533-people , if [she]101-jane suspected [they]533-people were asked down in order to make sport for [the duchess]304-the duchess afterwards . [Jane]101-jane hated that sort of thing . Well one evening , after tea , [a little group of [us]4182-we]4193-a little group of us were waiting around the fire in [the lower hall]512-the lower hall , to talk to [Jane]101-jane . It was Christmas time . The logs looked so jolly on the hearth . The red velvet curtains were drawn right across , covering the terrace door and the windows on either side . [Tommy]100-tommy sat on [his]100-tommy perch , in the centre of [the group]4195-the group , keeping a keen lookout for cigarette ends . [I]228-nurse rosemary always look forward , just as eagerly , each winter to the first sight ah , [I]228-nurse rosemary forgot ! ... Fancy never seeing snow again ! ... Never mind . " Is it very bad ? "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Garth]111-garth ; and [his]111-garth voice shook .

[Garth]111-garth flushed ; pleased and relieved , but slightly surprised . There was a quality in [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary 's voice , for which [he]111-garth could not altogether account .

[She]734-another woman does not know all [our]4214-our plans of cords , and notches , and things . Ah , [little Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary ! Promise not to leave [me]228-nurse rosemary to - morrow . [I]228-nurse rosemary want [Her]734-another woman only [God]145-god , knows how [I]228-nurse rosemary want [her]734-another woman ; but [I]228-nurse rosemary begin to be half afraid . At first , [I]228-nurse rosemary thought it lucky [you]111-garth had settled to go , just when [she]734-another woman is coming ; but now , just because [she]734-another woman is coming , [I]228-nurse rosemary can not let [you]111-garth go . Having [her]734-another woman will be wonderful beyond words ; but it will not be the same as having [you]111-garth . "[228-nurse rosemary]

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary was receiving [her]228-nurse rosemary reward , and [she]228-nurse rosemary appeared to find it rather overwhelming .

As soon as [she]228-nurse rosemary could speak , [she]228-nurse rosemary said , gently : " Do n't excite [yourself]111-garth over it , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth . Believe [me]111-garth , when [you]111-garth have been with [her]734-another woman for five minutes , [you]111-garth will find it just the same as having [me]111-garth . And how do [you]111-garth know [she]734-another woman has not also been in [Sightless Land]78-sightless land ? [A nurse]1257-a nurse would do that sort of thing , because [she]1257-a nurse was very keen on [her]1257-a nurse profession , and on making a success of [her]1257-a nurse case . [The woman who loves [you]111-garth]4216-the woman who loves you would do it for love of [you]111-garth . "[111-garth]

" It would be like [her]734-another woman , "[228-nurse rosemary] said [Garth]111-garth ; and leaned back , a look of deep contentment gathering on [his]111-garth face . " Oh , [Jane]101-jane ! [Jane]101-jane ! [She]734-another woman is coming ! [She]734-another woman is coming ! "[228-nurse rosemary]

[Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary looked at the clock .

" Yes ; [she]734-another woman is coming , "[228-nurse rosemary] [she]228-nurse rosemary said ; and though [her]228-nurse rosemary voice was steady , [her]228-nurse rosemary hands trembled . " And , as it is [our]4217-our last evening together under quite the same circumstances as during all these weeks , will [you]111-garth agree to a plan of [mine]228-nurse rosemary ? [I]111-garth must go [upstairs]2412-upstairs now , and do some packing , and make a few arrangements . But will [you]111-garth dress early ? [I]111-garth will do the same ; and if [you]111-garth could be down in [the library]3143-the library by half - past six , [we]4217-our might have some music before dinner . "[111-garth]

" Why certainly , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth . " It makes no difference to [me]228-nurse rosemary at what time [I]228-nurse rosemary dress ; and [I]228-nurse rosemary am always ready for music . But , [I]228-nurse rosemary say : [I]228-nurse rosemary wish [you]111-garth were not packing , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray . "[228-nurse rosemary]

" [I]228-nurse rosemary am not exactly packing up , "[228-nurse rosemary] replied [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary . " [I]111-garth am packing things away . "[111-garth]

" It is all the same , if it means leaving . But [you]111-garth have promised not to go until [she]4220-she comes ? "[228-nurse rosemary]

" [I]111-garth will not go until [she]4220-she comes . "[111-garth]

" And [you]111-garth will tell [her]4220-she all the things [she]4220-she ought to know ? "[228-nurse rosemary]

" [She]4220-she shall know all [I]111-garth know , which could add to [your]111-garth comfort . "[111-garth]

" And [you]111-garth will not leave [me]228-nurse rosemary , until [I]228-nurse rosemary am really well , getting on all right ? "[228-nurse rosemary]

" [I]111-garth will never leave [you]111-garth , while [you]111-garth need [me]111-garth , "[111-garth] said [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary . And again [Garth]111-garth detected that peculiar quality in [her]228-nurse rosemary voice . [He]111-garth rose , and came towards where [he]111-garth heard [her]228-nurse rosemary to be standing .

" Do [you]228-nurse rosemary know , [you]228-nurse rosemary are no end of a brick , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , with emotion . Then [he]111-garth held out both hands towards [her]228-nurse rosemary . " Put [your]228-nurse rosemary hands in mine just for once , [little Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary . [I]228-nurse rosemary want to try to thank [you]228-nurse rosemary . "[228-nurse rosemary]

There was a moment of hesitation . Two strong capable hands strong and capable , though , just then , [they]1910-they trembled nearly went [home]381-home to [his]111-garth ; but were withdrawn just in time . [Jane]101-jane 's hour was not yet . This was [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary 's moment of triumph and success . It should not be taken from [her]228-nurse rosemary .

" This evening , "[228-nurse rosemary] [she]228-nurse rosemary said , softly , " after the music , [we]4221-we will shake hands . Now be careful , [sir]3118-sir . [You]3118-sir are stranded . Wait . Here is [the garden]3601-the garden - cord , just to [your]3118-sir left . Take a little air on [the terrace]312-the terrace ; and sing again the lovely song [I]111-garth heard under [my]111-garth window this morning . And now that [you]3118-sir know what it is that is ' going to happen , ' this exquisite May - Day evening will fill [you]3118-sir with tender expectation . Good - bye , [sir]3118-sir for an hour . "[111-garth]

" What has come to little [Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary ? "[111-garth] mused [Garth]111-garth , as [he]111-garth felt for [his]111-garth cane , in its corner by the window . " [We]4221-we could not have gone on indefinitely quite as [we]4221-we have been , since [she]228-nurse rosemary came in from [the post - office]4160-the post - office . "[111-garth]

[He]111-garth walked on ; a troubled look clouding [his]111-garth face : Suddenly it lifted , and [he]111-garth stood still , and laughed . " [Duffer]296-duffer ! "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said . " Oh , what [a conceited duffer]4227-a conceited duffer ! [She]228-nurse rosemary is thinking of [[her]228-nurse rosemary ' young man]4228-her ' young man . ' [She]228-nurse rosemary is going to [him]4228-her ' young man to - morrow ; and [her]228-nurse rosemary mind is full of [him]4228-her ' young man ; just as [mine]111-garth is full of [Jane]101-jane . [Dear]2179-dear , good , clever , [little Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary ! [I]101-jane hope [he]4228-her ' young man is worthy of [her]228-nurse rosemary . No ; that [he]4228-her ' young man can not be . [I]101-jane hope [he]4228-her ' young man knows [he]4228-her ' young man is NOT worthy of [her]228-nurse rosemary . That is more to the point . [I]101-jane hope [he]4228-her ' young man will receive [her]228-nurse rosemary as [she]228-nurse rosemary expects .
