CHAPTER XXXVI

[THE REVELATION OF [THE ROSARY

Simpson]127-simpson]1912-the revelation of the rosary simpson was crossing [the hall]367-the hall just before half - past six o'clock . [He]127-simpson had left [[his]127-simpson master]1914-his master in [the library]3143-the library . [He]127-simpson heard a rustle just above [him]127-simpson ; and , looking up , saw [a tall figure descending the wide oak staircase]1916-a tall figure descending the wide oak staircase .

[Simpson]127-simpson stood transfixed . The soft black evening - gown , with its trailing folds , and old lace at the bosom , did not impress [him]127-simpson so much as the quiet look of certainty and power on the calm face above [them]1917-them .

" [Simpson]127-simpson , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane , " [[my]127-simpson aunt]2102-my aunt , [the Duchess of [Meldrum]2-meldrum]322-the duchess of meldrum , and [[her]322-the duchess of meldrum maid]632-her maid , and [[her]322-the duchess of meldrum footman]4234-her footman , and a rather large quantity of luggage , will be arriving from [Aberdeen]67-aberdeen , at about half - past seven . [Mrs. Graem]284-mrs. graem knows about preparing [rooms]4235-rooms ; and [I]127-simpson have given [James]192-jimmy orders for meeting [the train]738-the train with the brougham , and [the luggage - cart]4237-the luggage - cart . [The duchess]304-the duchess dislikes motors . When [[her]304-the duchess Grace]2042-her grace arrives , [you]101-jane can show [her]304-the duchess into [the library]3143-the library . [We]4241-we will dine in [the dining - room]1048-the dining - room at a quarter past eight . Meanwhile , [Mr. Dalmain]111-garth and [myself]127-simpson are particularly engaged just now , and must not be disturbed on any account , until [the duchess]304-the duchess 's arrival . [You]101-jane quite understand ? "[127-simpson]

" Yes , [miss - m'lady]4244-miss - m'lady , "[101-jane] stammered [Simpson]127-simpson . [He]127-simpson had been [boot - boy in a ducal household early in [his]127-simpson career ; and [he]127-simpson considered [[duchesses]1919-duchesses ' nieces]1920-duchesses ' nieces]1918-boot - boy in a ducal household early in his career ; and he considered duchesses ' nieces to be people before whom [one]474-one should bow down .

[Jane]101-jane smiled . " ' [Miss]2048-miss ' is quite sufficient , [Simpson]127-simpson , "[111-garth] [she]101-jane said ; and swept towards [the library]3143-the library .

[Garth]111-garth heard [her]101-jane enter , and close the door ; and [his]111-garth quick ear caught the rustle of [a train]2137-a train .

" [Hullo]265-hullo , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said . " Packed [your]111-garth uniform ? "[101-jane]

" Yes , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane . " [I]101-jane told [you]111-garth [I]101-jane was packing . "[101-jane]

[She]101-jane came slowly across [the room]424-the room , and stood on the hearth - rug looking down at [him]111-garth . [He]111-garth was in full evening - dress ; just as at [Shenstone]16-shenstone on that memorable night ; and , as [he]111-garth sat well back in [his]111-garth deep arm - chair , one knee crossed over the other , [she]101-jane saw the crimson line of [his]111-garth favourite silk socks .

[Jane]101-jane stood looking down upon [him]111-garth . [Her]101-jane hour had come at last . But even now [she]101-jane must , for [his]111-garth sake , be careful and patient .

" [I]111-garth did not hear the song , "[111-garth] [she]101-jane said .

" No , "[111-garth] replied [Garth]111-garth . " At first , [I]101-jane forgot . And when [I]101-jane remembered , [I]101-jane had been thinking of other things , and somehow ah , [Miss Gray]233-miss gray ! [I]101-jane can not sing to - night . [My]101-jane soul is dumb with longing . "[101-jane]

" [I]101-jane know , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane , gently ; " and [I]111-garth am going to sing to [you]111-garth . "[111-garth]

A faint look of surprise crossed [Garth]111-garth 's face . " Do [you]111-garth sing ? "[111-garth] [he]111-garth asked . " Then why have [you]111-garth not sung before ? "[101-jane]

" When [I]101-jane arrived , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane , " [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob asked [me]111-garth whether [I]111-garth played . [I]111-garth said : ' A little . ' Thereupon [he]217-dr. rob concluded [I]111-garth sang a little , too ; and [he]217-dr. rob forbade [me]111-garth , most peremptorily , either to play a little ; or sing a little , to [you]111-garth . [He]217-dr. rob said [he]217-dr. rob did not want [you]111-garth driven altogether mad . "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth burst out laughing .

" How like [old Robbie]217-dr. rob , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said . " And , in spite of [his]217-dr. rob injunctions , are [you]101-jane going to take the risk , and ' sing a little , ' to [me]101-jane , to - night ? "[101-jane]

" No , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane . " [I]101-jane take no risks . [I]101-jane am going to sing [you]111-garth one song . Here is the purple cord , at [your]111-garth right hand . There is nothing between [you]111-garth and the piano ; and [you]111-garth are facing towards it . If [you]111-garth want to stop [me]101-jane [you]111-garth can come . "[101-jane]

[She]101-jane walked to the instrument , and sat down .

Over the top of the grand piano , [she]101-jane could see [him]111-garth , leaning back in [his]111-garth chair ; a slightly amused smile playing about [his]111-garth lips . [He]111-garth was evidently still enjoying the humour of [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob 's prohibition .

The Rosary has but one opening chord . [She]101-jane struck it ; [her]101-jane eyes upon [his]111-garth face . [She]101-jane saw [him]111-garth sit up , instantly ; a look of surprise , expectation , bewilderment , gathering there .

Then [she]101-jane began to sing . The deep rich voice , low and vibrant , as the softest tone of ' cello , thrilled into the startled silence .

" The hours [I]111-garth spent with [thee]101-jane , dear heart , Are as a string of pearls to [me]111-garth ; [I]111-garth count them over , ev'ry one apart , [My]111-garth rosary , [my]111-garth rosary . Each hour a pearl "[111-garth] [Jane]101-jane got no further .

[Garth]111-garth had risen . [He]111-garth spoke no word ; but [he]111-garth was coming blindly over to the piano . [She]101-jane turned on the music - stool , [her]101-jane arms held out to receive [him]111-garth . Now [he]111-garth had found the woodwork . [His]111-garth hand crashed down upon the bass . Now [he]111-garth had found [her]101-jane . [He]111-garth was on [his]111-garth knees , [his]111-garth arms around [her]101-jane . [Hers]101-jane enveloped [him]111-garth , yearning , tender , hungry with the repressed longing of all those hard weeks .

[He]111-garth lifted [his]111-garth sightless face to [hers]101-jane , for one moment . " [You]101-jane ? "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said . " [YOU]101-jane ? [You]101-jane all the time ? "[101-jane]

Then [he]111-garth hid [his]111-garth face in the soft lace at [her]101-jane breast .

" Oh , [[my]101-jane boy]2679-my boy , [[my]101-jane darling]3940-my darling ! "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane , tenderly ; holding the dear head close . " Yes ; [I]101-jane , all the time ; all the time near [him]111-garth , in [his]111-garth loss and pain . Could [I]101-jane have stopped away ? But , oh , [Garth]111-garth ! What it is , at last to hold [you]111-garth , and touch [you]111-garth , and feel [you]111-garth here ! ... Yes , it is [I.]111-garth Oh , [[my]101-jane beloved]2659-my beloved , are [you]2659-my beloved not quite sure ? Who else could hold [you]2659-my beloved thus ? ... Take care , [[my]101-jane darling]3940-my darling ! Come over to the couch , just here ; and sit beside [me]101-jane . "[101-jane]

[Garth]111-garth rose , and raised [her]101-jane , without loosing [her]101-jane ; and [she]101-jane guided [herself]101-jane and [him]111-garth to a safer seat close by . But there again [he]111-garth flung [himself]111-garth upon [his]111-garth knees , and held [her]101-jane ; [his]111-garth arms around [her]101-jane waist ; [his]111-garth face hidden in the shelter of [her]101-jane bosom .

" Ah , [darling]2691-darling , [darling]2691-darling , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane softly , and [her]101-jane hands stole up behind [his]111-garth head , with a touch of unspeakable protective tenderness ; " it has been so sweet to wait upon [[my]101-jane boy]2679-my boy ; and help [him]2679-my boy in [his]2679-my boy darkness ; and shield [him]2679-my boy from unnecessary pain ; and be always there , to meet [his]2679-my boy every need . But [I]101-jane could not come [myself]101-jane until [he]2679-my boy knew ; and understood ; and had forgiven no , not ' forgiven ' ; understood , and yet still LOVED . For [he]2679-my boy does now understand ? And [he]2679-my boy does forgive ? ... Oh , [Garth]111-garth ! ... Oh hush , [[my]101-jane darling]3940-my darling ! ... [You]111-garth frighten [me]101-jane ! ... No , [I]101-jane will never leave [you]111-garth ; never , never ! ... Oh , ca n't [you]111-garth understand , [[my]101-jane beloved]2659-my beloved ? ... Then [I]101-jane must tell [you]111-garth more plainly . [Darling]2691-darling , do be still , and listen . Just for a few days [we]4256-we must be as [we]4256-we have been ; only [[my]101-jane boy]2679-my boy will know it is [I]101-jane who am near [him]2679-my boy . [Aunt]4258-aunt ' [Gina]126-gina is coming this evening . [She]126-gina will be here in half an hour . Then , as soon as possible [we]4256-we will get a special license ; and [we]4256-we will be married , [Garth]111-garth ; and then "[101-jane] [Jane]101-jane paused ; and [the man who knelt beside [her]101-jane]1925-the man who knelt beside her , held [his]1925-the man who knelt beside her breath to listen " and then , "[101-jane] continued [Jane]101-jane in a low tender voice , which gathered in depth of sacred mystery , yet did not falter " then it will be [my]101-jane highest joy , to be always with [[my]101-jane husband]2234-my husband , night and day . "[101-jane]

A long sweet silence . The tempest of emotion in [her]101-jane arms was hushed to rest . The eternal voice of perfect love had whispered : " Peace , be still "[111-garth] ; and there was a great calm .

At last [Garth]111-garth lifted [his]111-garth head . " Always ? Always together ? "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said . " Ah , that will be ' perpetual light ! ' "[127-simpson]

When [Simpson]127-simpson , pale with importance , flung open [the library]3143-the library door , and announced : " [[Her]304-the duchess Grace]2042-her grace , [the Duchess of [Meldrum]2-meldrum]322-the duchess of meldrum , "[101-jane] [Jane]101-jane was seated at the piano , playing soft dreamy chords ; and [a slim young man]1927-a slim young man , in evening dress , advanced with eager hospitality to greet [[his]1927-a slim young man guest]1928-his guest .

[The duchess]304-the duchess either did not see , or chose to ignore the guiding cord . [She]101-jane took [his]111-garth outstretched hand warmly in both [her]101-jane own .

" Goodness gracious , [[my]111-garth dear]2068-my dear [Dal]116-dal ! How [you]116-dal surprise [me]111-garth ! [I]111-garth expected to find [you]116-dal blind ! And here [you]116-dal are striding about , just [[your]116-dal old handsome self]4263-your old handsome self ! "[111-garth]

" [Dear Duchess]292-the duchess of meldyum , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth , and stooping , kissed the kind old hands still holding [his]111-garth ; " [I]101-jane can not see [you]292-the duchess of meldyum , [I]101-jane am sorry to say ; but [I]101-jane do n't feel very blind to - night . [My]101-jane darkness has been lightened by a joy beyond expression . "[101-jane]

" Oh ho ! So that 's the way [the land]4264-the land lies ! Now which are [you]116-dal going to marry ? [The nurse]1285-the nurse , who , [I]101-jane gather , is [a most respectable young person]4266-a most respectable young person , and highly recommended ; or that hussy , [Jane]101-jane ; who , without the smallest compunction , orders [[her]101-jane poor aunt]4267-her poor aunt from [one end of [the kingdom]2800-the kingdom]4268-one end of the kingdom to the other , to suit [her]101-jane own convenience ? "[101-jane]

[Jane]101-jane came over from the piano , and slipped [her]101-jane hand through [[her]101-jane lover]1733-her lover 's arm .

" [Dear Aunt ' Gina]126-gina , "[101-jane] [she]101-jane said ; " [you]126-gina know [you]126-gina loved coming ; because [you]126-gina enjoy a mystery , and like being [a dear old ' deus ex machina]4270-a dear old ' deus ex machina , ' at the right moment . And [he]1733-her lover is going to marry [them]4271-them both ; because [they]4271-them both love [him]1733-her lover far too dearly ever to leave [him]1733-her lover again ; and [he]1733-her lover seems to think [he]1733-her lover can not do without either . "[304-the duchess]

[The duchess]304-the duchess looked at the two radiant faces ; [one sightless]1932-one sightless ; [the other]476-the other , with glad proud eyes for both ; and [her]304-the duchess own filled with tears .

" Hoity - toity ! "[304-the duchess] [she]304-the duchess said . " Are [we]4272-we in [Salt Lake City]93-salt lake city ? Well , [we]4272-we always thought [one girl]4273-one girl would not do for [Dal]116-dal ; [he]1733-her lover would need the combined perfections of several ; and [he]1733-her lover appears to think [he]1733-her lover has found [them]4271-them . [God]145-god bless [you]4274-you both , [[you]4274-you absurdly happy people]4275-you absurdly happy people ; and [I]476-the other will bless [you]4274-you , too ; but not until [I]476-the other have dined . Now , ring for [that very nervous person]4276-that very nervous person , with side - whiskers ; and tell [him]1733-her lover [I]476-the other want [[my]476-the other maid]2209-my maid , and [[my]476-the other room]3227-my room , and [I]476-the other want to know where [they]4271-them have put [my]476-the other toucan . [I]476-the other had to bring [him]1733-her lover , [Jane]101-jane . [He]1733-her lover is so LOVING , [dear bird]2178-dear bird ! CHAPTER XXXVII

" IN THE FACE OF THIS CONGREGATION "[476-the other]

The society paragraphs would have described it as " a very quiet wedding , "[111-garth] when [Garth]111-garth and [Jane]101-jane , a few days later , were pronounced " [man]2986-man and [wife]4282-wife together , "[101-jane] in [the little Episcopal church among [the hills]1264-the hills]1934-the little episcopal church among the hills .

Perhaps , to [those who were present]1936-those who were present , it stands out rather as an unusual wedding , than as a quiet one .

To [Garth]111-garth and [Jane]101-jane the essential thing was to be married , and left to [themselves]1937-themselves , with as little delay as possible . [They]1937-themselves could not be induced to pay any attention to details as to the manner in which this desired end was to be attained . [Jane]101-jane left it entirely to [the doctor]940-the doctor , in one practical though casual sentence : " Just make sure it is valid , [Dicky]162-dicky ; and send [us]1937-themselves in the bills . "[101-jane]

[The duchess]304-the duchess , being [a true conservative]1940-a true conservative , early began mentioning veils , orange - blossom , and white satin ; but [Jane]101-jane said : " [[My]304-the duchess dear]2068-my dear [Aunt]4284-aunt ! Fancy [me]304-the duchess in orange - blossom ! [I]304-the duchess should look like a Christmas pantomime . And [I]304-the duchess never wear veils , even in motors ; and white satin is a form of clothing [I]304-the duchess have always had the wisdom to avoid . "[304-the duchess]

" Then in what do [you]304-the duchess intend to be married , [unnatural girl]4285-unnatural girl ? "[101-jane] inquired [the duchess]304-the duchess .

" In whatever [I]101-jane happen to put on , that morning , "[101-jane] replied [Jane]101-jane , knotting the silk of a soft crimson cord [she]101-jane was knitting ; and glancing out of the window , to where [Garth]111-garth sat smoking , on [the terrace]312-the terrace .

" Have [you]304-the duchess a time - table ? "[2-meldrum] inquired [her]101-jane Grace of [Meldrum]2-meldrum , with dangerous calmness . " And can [you]304-the duchess send [me]101-jane to [the station]746-the station this afternoon ? "[101-jane]

" [We]4287-we can always send to [the station]746-the station , at a moment 's notice , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane , working in a golden strand , and considering the effect . " But where are [you]304-the duchess going , [dear Aunt ' Gina]4289-dear aunt ' gina ? [You]304-the duchess know [Deryck]107-deryck and [Flower]144-flower arrive this evening . "[304-the duchess]

" [I]101-jane am washing [my]101-jane hands of [you]304-the duchess , and going [South]4290-south , "[101-jane] said [the duchess]304-the duchess , wrathfully .

" Do n't do that , [dear]2179-dear , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane , placidly . " [You]304-the duchess have washed [your]304-the duchess hands of [me]101-jane so often ; and , like the blood of [King Duncan of Scotland]297-king duncan of scotland , [I]101-jane am upon [them]4292-them still . ' All the perfumes of [Arabia]94-arabia will not sweeten this little hand . ' "[101-jane] Then , raising [her]101-jane voice : " [Garth]111-garth , if [you]111-garth want to walk , just give a call . [I]111-garth am here , talking over [my]111-garth trousseau with [Aunt]4293-aunt ' [Gina]126-gina . "[111-garth]

" What is a trousseau ? "[101-jane] came back in [Garth]111-garth 's happy voice .

" A thing [you]111-garth get into to be married , "[111-garth] said [Jane]101-jane .

" Then let ['s]4294-'s get into it quickly , "[101-jane] shouted [Garth]111-garth , with enthusiasm .

" [Dear Aunt]126-gina , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane , " let [us]4294-'s make a compromise . [I]147-margery have some quite nice clothes [upstairs]2412-upstairs , including Redfern tailor - mades , and several uniforms . Let [[your]111-garth maid]2123-your maid look through them , and whatever [you]111-garth select , and [she]2123-your maid puts out in readiness on [my]147-margery wedding morning , [I]147-margery promise to wear . "[147-margery]

This resulted in [Jane]101-jane appearing at [the church]2432-the church in a long blue cloth coat and skirt , handsomely embroidered with gold , and suiting [her]101-jane large figure to perfection ; a deep yellow vest of brocaded silk ; and old lace ruffles at neck and wrists .

[Garth]111-garth was as anxious about [his]111-garth wedding garments , as [Jane]101-jane had been indifferent over [hers]101-jane ; but [he]111-garth had so often been in requisition as best - man at [town]364-town weddings , that [Simpson]127-simpson had no difficulty in turning [him]111-garth out in the acme of correct bridal attire . And very handsome [he]111-garth looked , as [he]111-garth stood waiting at the chancel steps ; not watching for [[his]111-garth bride]1946-his bride ; but obviously listening for [her]1946-his bride ; for , as [Jane]101-jane came up [the church]2432-the church on [Deryck]107-deryck 's arm , [Garth]111-garth slightly turned [his]111-garth head and smiled .

[The duchess]304-the duchess resplendent in purple satin and ermine , with white plumes in [her]304-the duchess bonnet , and many jewelled chains depending from [her]304-the duchess , which rattled and tinkled , in the silence of [the church]2432-the church , every time [she]304-the duchess moved was in a front pew on the left , ready to give [[her]304-the duchess niece]383-her niece away .

In a corresponding seat , on the opposite side , as near as possible to [the bridegroom]1951-the bridegroom , sat [Margery Graem]147-margery , in black silk , with a small quilted satin bonnet , and a white lawn kerchief folded over the faithful old heart which had beaten in tenderness for [Garth]111-garth since [his]111-garth babyhood . [She]147-margery turned [her]147-margery head anxiously , every time [the duchess]304-the duchess jingled ; but otherwise kept [her]147-margery eyes fixed on the marriage service , in a large - print prayer - book in [her]147-margery lap . [Margery]147-margery was not used to the Episcopal service , and [she]147-margery had [her]147-margery " doots "[147-margery] as to whether it could possibly be gone through correctly , by [all parties concerned]1953-all parties concerned . In fact this anxiety of old [Margery]147-margery 's increased so painfully when the ceremony actually commenced , that it took audible form ; and [she]147-margery repeated all the answers of [the bridal pair]1954-the bridal pair , in an impressive whisper , after [them]1955-them .

[Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob , being [the only available bachelor]1956-the only available bachelor , did duty as [best - man]1957-best - man ; [Jane]101-jane having stipulated that [he]217-dr. rob should not be intrusted with the ring ; [her]101-jane previous observations leading [her]101-jane to conclude that [he]217-dr. rob would most probably slip it unconsciously on to [his]217-dr. rob finger , and then search through all [his]217-dr. rob own pockets and all [Garth]111-garth 's ; and begin taking up the church matting , before it occurred to [him]217-dr. rob to look at [his]217-dr. rob hand . [Jane]101-jane would not have minded the diversion , but [she]101-jane did object to any delay . So the ring went to [church]1832-church in [Garth]111-garth 's waistcoat pocket , where it had lived since [Jane]101-jane brought it out from [Aberdeen]67-aberdeen ; and , without any fumbling or hesitation , was quietly laid by [him]217-dr. rob upon the open book .

[Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob had charge of the fees for [clerk]1959-clerk , [verger]1960-verger , [bell - ringers]1961-bell - ringers , and [every person , connected with [the church]2432-the church]1962-every person , connected with the church , who could possibly have a tip pressed upon [them]1964-them .

[Garth]111-garth was generous in [his]111-garth gladness , and eager to do all things in a manner worthy of the great gift made fully [his]111-garth that day . So [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob was well provided with the wherewithal ; and this [he]217-dr. rob jingled in [his]217-dr. rob pockets as soon as the exhortation commenced , and [his]217-dr. rob interest in the proceedings resulted in [his]217-dr. rob fatal habit of unconsciousness of [his]217-dr. rob own actions . Thus [he]217-dr. rob and [the duchess]304-the duchess kept up a tinkling duet , each hearing [the other]476-the other , and not [their]1967-their own sounds . So [the duchess]304-the duchess glared at [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob ; and [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob frowned at [the duchess]304-the duchess ; and [old Margery]147-margery looked tearfully at both .

[Deryck Brand]107-deryck , [the tallest man in [the church]2432-the church]1970-the tallest man in the church , [his]107-deryck fine figure showing to advantage in the long frock coat with silk facings , which [Lady Brand]143-lady brand had pronounced indispensable to the occasion , retired to a seat beside [[his]107-deryck wife]1166-his wife , just behind [old Margery]147-margery , as soon as [he]107-deryck had conducted [Jane]101-jane to [Garth]111-garth 's side . As [Jane]101-jane removed [her]101-jane hand from [his]107-deryck arm , [she]101-jane turned and smiled at [him]107-deryck ; and a long look passed between [them]1973-them . All the memories , all the comprehension , all the trust and affection of years , seemed to concentrate in that look ; and [Lady Brand]143-lady brand 's eyes dropped to [her]143-lady brand dainty white and gold prayer - book . [She]143-lady brand had never known jealousy ; [the doctor]940-the doctor had never given [her]143-lady brand any possible reason for acquiring that cruel knowledge . [His]107-deryck Flower bloomed for [him]107-deryck ; and [her]143-lady brand fragrance alone made [his]107-deryck continual joy . [All other lovely women]1975-all other lovely women were mere botanical specimens , to be examined and classified . But [Flower]144-flower had never quite understood the depth of the friendship between [[her]144-flower husband]1183-her husband and [Jane]101-jane , founded on the associations and aspirations of childhood and early youth , and a certain similarity of character which would not have wedded well , but which worked out into a comradeship , providing a source of strength for both . Of late , [Flower]144-flower had earnestly tried to share , even while failing to comprehend , it .

Perhaps [she]144-flower , in [her]144-flower pale primrose gown , with daffodils at [her]144-flower waist , and sunbeams in [her]144-flower golden hair , was the most truly bridal figure in [the church]2432-the church . As [the doctor]940-the doctor turned from [the bride]1979-the bride , and sought [his]940-the doctor place beside [her]144-flower in the pew , [he]940-the doctor looked at the sweet face , bent so demurely over the prayer - book , and thought [he]940-the doctor had never seen [[his]940-the doctor wife]1166-his wife look more entrancingly lovely . Unconsciously [his]940-the doctor hand strayed to the white rosebud [she]144-flower had fastened in [his]940-the doctor coat as [they]1981-they strolled round [the conservatory]1858-the conservatory together that morning . [Flower]144-flower , glancing up , surprised [his]940-the doctor look . [She]144-flower did not think it right to smile in [church]1832-church ; but a delicate wave of colour swept over [her]144-flower face , and [her]144-flower cheek leaned as near [the doctor]940-the doctor 's shoulder , as the size of [her]144-flower hat would allow . [Flower]144-flower felt quite certain that was a look [the doctor]940-the doctor had never given [Jane]101-jane .

The service commenced . [The short - sighted clergyman]1986-the short - sighted clergyman , very nervous , and rather overwhelmed by the unusual facts of a special license , [a blind bridegroom]1987-a blind bridegroom , and the reported presence of [a duchess]1988-a duchess , began reading very fast , in an undertone , which [old Margery]147-margery could not follow , though [her]147-margery finger , imprisoned in unwonted kid , hurried along the lines . Then conscious of [his]940-the doctor mistake , [he]940-the doctor slowed down , and became too impressive ; making long nerve - straining pauses , fled in by the tinkling of [the duchess]304-the duchess , and the chinking in [Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob 's trousers - pockets .

Thus [they]1990-they arrived at the demand upon [the congregation]1991-the congregation , if [they]1990-they could show any just cause why [these two persons]1992-these two persons might not lawfully be joined together , NOW to speak and the pause here was so long , and so over - powering , that [old Margery]147-margery said " nay "[940-the doctor] ; and then gave a nervous sob . [The bridegroom]1951-the bridegroom turned and smiled in the direction of the voice ; and [the doctor]940-the doctor , leaning forward , laid [his]940-the doctor hand on the trembling shoulder , and whispered : " Steady , [old friend]4297-old friend . It is all right . "[101-jane]

There was no pause whatever after the solemn charge to [the couple]1995-the couple ; so if [Garth]111-garth and [Jane]101-jane had any secrets to disclose , [they]1990-they had perforce to keep [them]1996-them for after discussion .

Then [Jane]101-jane found [her]101-jane right hand firmly clasped in [Garth]111-garth 's ; and no inadequacy of [the Church]2432-the church 's mouth - piece could destroy the exquisite beauty of [the Church]2432-the church 's words , in which [Garth]111-garth was asked if [he]111-garth would take [her]101-jane to be [his]111-garth own .

To this , [Garth]111-garth , and [old Margery]147-margery , said [they]1990-they would ; with considerable display of emotion .

Then the all - comprehensive question was put to [Jane]101-jane ; [the Church]96-the church seeming to remind [her]101-jane gently , that [she]101-jane took [him]111-garth in [his]111-garth blindness , with all which that might entail .

[Jane]101-jane said : " [I]111-garth will "[111-garth] ; and the deep , tender voice , was the voice of [The Rosary]127-simpson .

When the words were uttered , [Garth]111-garth lifted the hand [he]111-garth held , and reverently kissed it .

This was not in the rubric , and proved disconcerting to [the clergyman]1999-the clergyman . [He]111-garth threw up [his]111-garth head suddenly , and inquired : " Who giveth [this woman]4298-this woman to be married to [this man]4299-this man ? "[2001-the duchess , who up to that time had been feeling a little bored] And as , for the moment , there was no response , [he]111-garth repeated , the question wildly ; gazing into distant corners of [the church]2432-the church .

Then [the duchess , who up to that time had been feeling a little bored]2001-the duchess , who up to that time had been feeling a little bored , realised that [her]2001-the duchess , who up to that time had been feeling a little bored moment had come , and rejoiced . [She]2001-the duchess , who up to that time had been feeling a little bored sailed out of [her]2001-the duchess , who up to that time had been feeling a little bored pew , and advanced to the chancel step . " [[My]2001-the duchess , who up to that time had been feeling a little bored dear good man]4300-my dear good man , "[2001-the duchess , who up to that time had been feeling a little bored] [she]2001-the duchess , who up to that time had been feeling a little bored said ; " [I]2006-the only people completely unconscious of anything unusual in the order of proceedings give [[my]2006-the only people completely unconscious of anything unusual in the order of proceedings niece]2386-my niece away ; having come north at considerable inconvenience for that express purpose . Now , go on . What do [we]4302-we do next ? "[2006-the only people completely unconscious of anything unusual in the order of proceedings]

[Dr. Rob]217-dr. rob broke into an uncontrollable chuckle . [The duchess]304-the duchess lifted [her]304-the duchess lorgnette , and surveyed [him]111-garth . [Margery]147-margery searched [her]147-margery prayer - book in vain for [the duchess]304-the duchess 's response . It did not appear to be there .

[Flower]144-flower looked in distressed appeal at [the doctor]940-the doctor . But [the doctor]940-the doctor was studying , with grave intentness , a stencilled pattern on the chancel roof ; and paid no attention to [Flower]144-flower 's nudge .

[The only people completely unconscious of anything unusual in the order of proceedings]2006-the only people completely unconscious of anything unusual in the order of proceedings appeared to be [the bride]1979-the bride and [bridegroom]2008-bridegroom . [They]2006-the only people completely unconscious of anything unusual in the order of proceedings were taking each other " in the sight of [God]145-god , and in the face of [this congregation]4303-this congregation . "[101-jane] [They]2006-the only people completely unconscious of anything unusual in the order of proceedings were altogether absorbed in [each other]573-each other , standing together in the sight of [God]145-god ; and the deportment of " [this congregation]4303-this congregation "[101-jane] was a matter [they]2006-the only people completely unconscious of anything unusual in the order of proceedings scarcely noticed . " [People]533-people always behave grotesquely at weddings , "[101-jane] [Jane]101-jane had said to [Garth]111-garth , beforehand ; " and [ours]2006-the only people completely unconscious of anything unusual in the order of proceedings will be no exception to the general rule . But [we]2006-the only people completely unconscious of anything unusual in the order of proceedings can close [our]2006-the only people completely unconscious of anything unusual in the order of proceedings eyes , and stand together in [Sightless Land]78-sightless land ; and [Deryck]107-deryck will take care it is valid . "[111-garth]

" Not in [Sightless Land]78-sightless land , [[my]111-garth beloved]2659-my beloved , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth ; " but in [[the Land]4264-the land where [they]533-people need no candle neither light of the sun]4308-the land where they need no candle neither light of the sun . However , and wherever , [I]111-garth take [YOU]2659-my beloved as [[my]111-garth wife]2580-my wife , [I]111-garth shall be standing on [the summit of [God]145-god 's heaven]4310-the summit of god 's heaven . "[111-garth]

So [they]2010-they stood ; and in [their]2010-they calmness [the church]2432-the church hushed to silence . The service proceeded ; and [the minister]2012-the minister , who had not known how to keep [them]2010-they from clasping hands when the rubric did not require it , found no difficulty in inducing [them]2010-they to do so again .

So [they]2010-they took [each other]573-each other [these two , who were so deeply each other]2014-these two , who were so deeply each other 's already solemnly , reverently , tenderly , in the sight of [God]145-god , [they]2010-they took [each other]573-each other , according to [God]145-god 's holy ordinance ; and the wedding ring , type of that eternal love which has neither beginning nor ending , passed from [Garth]111-garth 's pocket , over the Holy Book , on to [Jane]101-jane 's finger .

When it was over , [she]101-jane took [his]111-garth arm ; and leaning upon it , so that [he]111-garth could feel [she]101-jane leaned , guided [him]111-garth to [the vestry]2016-the vestry .

Afterwards , in the brougham , for those few precious minutes , when [husband]2017-husband and [wife]4282-wife find [themselves]2010-they alone for the first time , [Garth]111-garth turned to [Jane]101-jane with an eager naturalness , which thrilled [her]101-jane heart as no studied speech could have done . [He]111-garth did not say : " [[My]111-garth wife]2580-my wife . "[111-garth] That unique moment had been [theirs]2010-they , three years before .

" [Dearest]2680-dearest , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , " how soon will [they]2010-they all go ? How soon shall [we]2010-they be quite alone ? Oh , why could n't [they]2010-they drive to [the station]746-the station from [the church]2432-the church ? "[101-jane]

[Jane]101-jane looked at [her]101-jane watch . " Because [we]2010-they must lunch [them]2010-they , [dear]2179-dear , "[101-jane] [she]101-jane said . " Think how good [they]2010-they have all been . And [we]2010-they could not start [our]2010-they married life by being inhospitable . It is just one o'clock ; and [we]2010-they ordered luncheon at half - past . [[Their]2010-they train]4316-their train leaves [the station]746-the station at half - past four . In three hours , [Garth]111-garth , [we]2010-they shall be alone . "[111-garth]

" Shall [I]101-jane be able to behave nicely for three hours ? "[101-jane] exclaimed [Garth]111-garth , boyishly .

" [You]101-jane must , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane , " or [I]111-garth shall fetch [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary . "[111-garth]

" Oh hush ! "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said . " All that is too precious , to - day , for chaff . [Jane]101-jane "[111-garth] [he]111-garth turned suddenly , and laid [his]111-garth hand on [hers]101-jane " [Jane]101-jane ! Do [you]101-jane understand that [you]101-jane are now actually [[my]101-jane wife]2580-my wife ? "[101-jane]

[Jane]101-jane took [his]111-garth hand , and held it against [her]101-jane heart , just where [she]101-jane so often had pressed [her]101-jane own , when [she]101-jane feared [he]111-garth would hear it throbbing .

" [[My]101-jane darling]3940-my darling , "[101-jane] [she]101-jane said , " [I]111-garth do not understand it . But [I]111-garth know ah , thank [God]145-god ! [I]111-garth know it to be true . "[111-garth]

CHAPTER XXXVIII

PERPETUAL LIGHT

Moonlight on [the terrace]312-the terrace silvery , white , serene . [Garth]111-garth and [Jane]101-jane had stepped out into the brightness ; and , finding the night so warm and still , and [the nightingales]2020-the nightingales filling [the woods and hills]2021-the woods and hills with soft - throated music , [they]2022-they moved [their]2022-they usual fireside chairs close to the parapet , and sat there in restful comfort , listening to the sweet sounds of the quiet night .

The solitude was so perfect ; the restfulness so complete . [Garth]111-garth had removed the cushion seat from [his]111-garth chair , and placed it on the gravel ; and sat at [[his]111-garth wife]1166-his wife 's feet leaning against [her]1166-his wife knees . [She]101-jane stroked [his]111-garth hair and brow softly , as [they]2022-they talked ; and every now and then [he]111-garth put up [his]111-garth hand , drew [hers]101-jane to [his]111-garth lips , and kissed the ring [he]111-garth had never seen .

Long tender silences fell between [them]2022-they . Now that [they]2022-they were at last alone , thoughts too deep , joys too sacred for words , trembled about [them]2022-they ; and silence seemed to express more than speech . Only , [Garth]111-garth could not bear [Jane]101-jane to be for a moment out of reach of [his]111-garth hand . What to another would have been : " [I]111-garth can not let [her]101-jane out of [my]111-garth sight , "[111-garth] was , to [him]111-garth , " [I]111-garth can not let [her]101-jane be beyond [my]111-garth touch . "[111-garth] And [Jane]101-jane fully understood this ; and let [him]111-garth feel [her]101-jane every moment within reach . And the bliss of this was [hers]101-jane as well as [his]111-garth ; for sometimes it had seemed to [her]101-jane as if the hunger in [her]101-jane heart , caused by those long weeks of waiting , when [her]101-jane arms ached for [him]111-garth , and yet [she]101-jane dared not even touch [his]111-garth hand , would never be appeased .

" Sweet , sweet , sweet thrill , "[101-jane] sang a nightingale in the wood . And [Garth]111-garth whistled an exact imitation .

" Oh , [darling]2691-darling , "[101-jane] said [Jane]101-jane , " that reminds [me]111-garth ; there is something [I]111-garth do so want [you]2691-darling to sing to [me]111-garth . [I]111-garth do n't know what it is ; but [I]111-garth think [you]2691-darling will remember . It was on that Monday evening , after [I]111-garth had seen the pictures , and [Nurse Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary had described them to [you]2691-darling . Both [our]4321-our poor hearts were on the rack ; and [I]111-garth went up early in order to begin [my]111-garth letter of confession ; but [you]2691-darling told [Simpson]127-simpson not to come for [you]2691-darling until eleven . While [I]111-garth was writing in [the room]424-the room above , [I]111-garth could hear [you]2691-darling playing in [the library]3143-the library . [You]2691-darling played many things [I]111-garth knew music [we]4321-our had done together , long ago . And then a theme [I]111-garth had never heard crept in , and caught [my]111-garth ear at once , because it was quite new to [me]111-garth , and so marvellously sweet . [I]111-garth put down [my]111-garth pen and listened . [You]2691-darling played it several times , with slight variations , as if trying to recall it . And then , to [my]111-garth joy , [you]2691-darling began to sing . [I]111-garth crossed [the room]424-the room ; softly opened [my]111-garth window , and leaned out . [I]111-garth could hear some of the words ; but not all . Two lines , however , reached [me]111-garth distinctly , with such penetrating , tender sadness , that [I]111-garth laid [my]111-garth head against the window - frame , feeling as if [I]111-garth could write no more , and wait no longer , but must go straight to [you]2691-darling at once . "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth drew down the dear hand which had held the pen that night ; turned it over , and softly kissed the palm .

" What were they , [Jane]101-jane ? "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said .

" ' Lead [us]4325-us , [O Christ]298-o christ , when all is gone , Safe [home]381-home at last . ' "[111-garth] " And oh , [[my]111-garth darling]3940-my darling , the pathos of those words , ' when all is gone ' ! [Whoever wrote that music]4328-whoever wrote that music , had been through suffering such as [ours]4325-us . Then came a theme of such inspiring hopefulness and joy , that [I]111-garth arose , armed with fresh courage ; took up [my]111-garth pen , and went on with [my]111-garth letter . Again two lines had reached [me]111-garth : "[111-garth]

" ' Where [Thou]4329-thou , Eternal Light of Light , Art Lord of All . ' "[111-garth] " What is it , [Garth]111-garth ? And whose ? And where did [you]111-garth hear it ? And will [you]111-garth sing it to [me]301-so now , [darling]2691-darling ? [I]301-so have a sudden wish that [you]2691-darling should sing it , here and now ; and [I]301-so ca n't wait ! "[301-so]

[Garth]111-garth sat up , and laughed a short happy laugh , in which all sorts of emotions were mingled .

" [Jane]101-jane ! [I]2024-i like to hear [you]2691-darling say [you]2691-darling ca n't wait . It is n't like [you]2691-darling ; because [you]2691-darling are so strong and patient . And yet it is so deliciously like [you]2691-darling , if [you]2691-darling FEEL it , to SAY it . [I]2024-i found the words in the Anthem - book at [Worcester Cathedral]97-worcester cathedral , this time last year , at even - song . [I]2024-i copied them into [my]2024-i pocket - book , during the reading of the first lesson , [I]2024-i am ashamed to say ; but it was all about what [Balak]299-balak said unto [Balaam]300-balaam , and [Balaam]300-balaam said unto [Balak]299-balak , so [I]2024-i hope [I]2024-i may be forgiven ! They seemed to [me]2024-i some of the most beautiful words [I]2024-i had ever read ; and , fortunately , [I]2024-i committed them to memory . Of course , [I]2024-i will sing them to [you]101-jane , if [you]101-jane wish , here and now . But [I]2024-i am afraid the air will sound rather poor without the accompaniment . However , not for worlds would [I]2024-i move from here , at this moment . "[2024-i]

[So]301-so sitting up ; in the moonlight , with [his]2024-i back to [Jane]101-jane , [his]2024-i face uplifted , and [his]2024-i hands clasped around one knee , [Garth]111-garth sang . Much practice had added greatly to the sweetness and flexibility of [his]2024-i voice ; and [he]2024-i rendered perfectly the exquisite melody to which the words were set .

[Jane]101-jane listened with an overflowing heart .

" [The radiant morn]4331-the radiant morn [hath]4331-the radiant morn passed away , And spent too soon [her]4331-the radiant morn golden store ; The shadows of departing day Creep on once more . "[298-o christ] [Our]2025-us life is but a fading dawn , [Its]2026-its glorious noon , how quickly past ! Lead [us]2025-us , O [Christ]298-o christ , when all is gone , Safe [home]381-home at last . " Where [saints]4332-saints are clothed in spotless white , And evening shadows never fall ; where [Thou]4333-thou , Eternal Light of Light , Art Lord of All . "[1166-his wife] The triumphant worship of the last line rang out into the night , and died away . [Garth]111-garth loosed [his]111-garth hands , and leaned back , with a sigh of vast content , against [[his]111-garth wife]1166-his wife 's knees .

" Beautiful ! "[1166-his wife] [she]1166-his wife said . " Beautiful ! " [I]101-jane certainly feel ' [Safe home]4334-safe home at last ' not because ' all is gone ' ; but because [I]101-jane HAVE all , in having [you]101-jane , [Jane]101-jane . "[101-jane]

"[111-garth]

A long sweet silence . Then [Jane]101-jane said , suddenly : " Oh , but the music , [Garthie]148-master garthie ! That exquisite setting . Whose is it ? And where did [you]111-garth hear it ? "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth laughed again ; a laugh of half - shy pleasure .

" [I]111-garth am glad [you]2029-you like it , [Jane]101-jane , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , " because [I]111-garth must plead guilty to the fact that it is [my]111-garth own . [You]2029-you see , [I]111-garth knew no music for it ; the Anthem - book gave the words only . And on that awful night , when [little Rosemary]228-nurse rosemary had mercilessly rubbed it in , about ' [the lady]3361-the lady portrayed ' ; and what [her]228-nurse rosemary love MUST have been , and WOULD have been , and COULD have been ; and had made [me]111-garth SEE ' [The Wife]837-the wife ' again , and ' The ' the other picture ; [I]111-garth felt so bruised , and sore , and lonely . And then those words came to [my]111-garth mind : ' Lead [us]4346-us , [O Christ]298-o christ , when all is gone , safe [home]381-home at last . ' All seemed gone indeed ; and there seemed no home to hope for , in [this world]4095-this world . "[111-garth] [He]111-garth raised [himself]111-garth a little , and then leaned back again ; so that [his]111-garth head rested against [her]2030-her bosom . " [Safe home]4334-safe home at last , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said , and stayed quite still for a moment , in utter content . Then remembered what [he]111-garth was telling [her]2030-her , and went on eagerly .

" So those words came back to [me]111-garth ; and to get away from despairing thoughts , [I]111-garth began reciting them , to an accompaniment of chords . "[111-garth]

" ' [The radiant morn]4331-the radiant morn hath passed away , And spent too soon [her]4331-the radiant morn golden store ; The shadows of departing day ' "[111-garth] " And then suddenly , [Jane]101-jane [I]2031-i SAW it , pictured in sound ! Just as [I]2031-i used to SEE a sunset , in light and shadow , and then transfer it to [my]2031-i canvas in shade and colour,-so [I]2031-i heard a SUNSET in harmony , and [I]2031-i felt the same kind of tingle in [my]2031-i fingers as [I]2031-i used to feel when inspiration came , and [I]2031-i could catch up [my]2031-i brushes and palette . So [I]2031-i played the sunset . And then [I]2031-i got the theme for life fading , and what one feels when the glorious noon is suddenly plunged into darkness ; and then the prayer . And then , [I]2031-i HEARD a vision of heaven , where evening shadows never fall : And after that came the end ; just certainty , and worship , and peace . [You]4351-you see the eventual theme , worked out of all this . It was like making studies for a picture . That was why [you]4351-you heard it over and over . [I]2031-i was n't trying to remember . [I]2031-i was gathering it into final form . [I]2031-i am awfully glad [you]4351-you like it , [Jane]101-jane ; because if [I]2031-i show [you]4351-you how the harmonies go , perhaps [you]4351-you could write it down . And it would mean such a lot to [me]2031-i , if [you]4351-you thought it worth singing . [I]2031-i could play the accompaniment Hullo ! Is it beginning to rain ? [I]2031-i felt a drop on [my]2031-i cheek , and another on [my]2031-i hand . "[2031-i]

No answer . Then [he]2031-i felt the heave , with which [Jane]101-jane caught [her]101-jane breath ; and realised that [she]101-jane was weeping .

In a moment [he]2031-i was on [his]2031-i knees in front of [her]101-jane . " [Jane]101-jane ! Why , what is the matter ; [Sweet]302-sweet ? What on earth ? [Jane]101-jane mastered [her]101-jane emotion ; controlling [her]101-jane voice , with an immense effort . Then drew [him]2031-i down beside [her]101-jane .

Do [you]4351-you know , [[my]111-garth own boy]4147-my own boy , that not only [[your]4351-you proud and happy wife]4355-your proud and happy wife , but [ALL women who can sing]4356-all women who can sing , will want to sing [your]4351-you music ? [Garthie]148-master garthie , do [you]4351-you realise what it means ? The creative faculty is so strong in [you]4351-you , that when one outlet was denied it , it burst forth through another . When [you]4351-you had [your]4351-you sight , [you]4351-you created by the hand and EYE . Now , [you]4351-you will create by the hand and EAR . The power is the same . It merely works through another channel . But oh , think what it means ! Think ! [The world]2266-the world lies before [you]4351-you once more ! "[111-garth]

[Garth]111-garth laughed , and put up [his]111-garth hand to the dear face , still wet with thankful tears .

" Ever since [I]111-garth can remember , "[111-garth] said [Garth]111-garth . " And the door between was always open . After [[my]111-garth mother]2312-my mother 's death , [I]111-garth kept it locked . But the night before [my]111-garth birthday , [I]111-garth used to open [it]4393-that room ; and when [I]111-garth woke early and saw it ajar , [I]111-garth would spring up , and go quickly in ; and it seemed as if [her]4396-your mother dear presence was there to greet [me]111-garth , just on that one morning . But [I]111-garth had to go quickly , and immediately [I]111-garth wakened ; just as [you]4398-you must go out early to catch the rosy glow of sunrise on the fleeting clouds ; or to see the gossamer webs on the gorse , outlined in diamonds , by the sparkling summer dew . But , somehow , [Margery]147-margery found out about it ; and the third year there was a sheet of writing - paper firmly stuck to the pincushion by a large black - headed pin , saying , in [Margery]147-margery 's careful caligraphy : ' Many happy returns of the day , [Master Garthie]148-master garthie . ' It was very touching , because it was meant to be so comforting and tactful . But it destroyed the illusion ! Since then the door has been kept closed . "[111-garth]

Another long sweet silence . [Two nightingales]2035-two nightingales , in distant trees , sang alternately ; answering [one another]2160-one another in liquid streams of melody .

" Yes , [[my]101-jane own boy]4147-my own boy , "[101-jane] [she]101-jane said ; " it is . "[111-garth]

[Her]101-jane tears fell on [his]111-garth upturned fate .

Then [Garth]111-garth sprang to [his]111-garth feet . The sense of manhood and mastery ; the right of control , the joy of possession , arose within [him]111-garth . Even in [his]111-garth blindness , [he]111-garth was the stronger . Even in [his]111-garth helplessness , for the great essentials , [Jane]101-jane must lean on [him]111-garth . [He]111-garth raised [her]101-jane gently , put [his]111-garth arms about [her]101-jane , and stood there , glorified by [his]111-garth great love .

" Hush , [sweetest wife]4401-sweetest wife , "[111-garth] [he]111-garth said . " Neither light nor darkness can separate between [you]101-jane and [me]101-jane : This quiet moonlight can not take [you]101-jane from [me]101-jane ; but in the still , sweet darkness [you]101-jane will feel more completely [my]101-jane own , because it will hold nothing [we]4402-we can not share .
